item.text: @#/ /mdo la pa bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi ni Sh+k+ra ma Na sU tra/ bod skad du/ mngon par
'byung ba'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig nyid kyi dbu ni
rin chen 'od ldan dang / /btsun mo pad+ma kha bye ma rnyis mdangs ldan pas/ /slong ba
dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang brnyes gyur cing / /chos rnams ston mdzad zhi
ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'das gyur
cing | |srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad zad byed zhir gyur la/ /sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya
mtsho las brgal ba'i/ /zam pa gcig pu bde gshegs chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la yon tan
phul byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas/ /mchod pa cung zad byas kyang rgya che nyid 'gyur ba/ /bde bar gshegs
pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyad kyis/ /rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal
lo| |thub gsung rnam par brtags na dad pa mi skyed pa'am/ /phan pa mi 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la/ /tshig btu ba
dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang rnam bral ba/ /rnam par g.yengs phyir 'bras stsol 'di bdag nyung zad cig /ji ltar pad+ma kha bye'i
dbus gnas bung ba ni/ /'khor zhing pad+ma la ni cung zad gsog par byed/ /de bzhin thub pa'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i tshal nang nas/ /
rang yid rab tu dga' byed cung zad bsdu bar bya/ /thub pa'i gsung ni ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /dad ldan mi la nyin
re'ang rgyas par nyer 'gro ste/ /rnam par dpyad na tshigs bcad phyed mtha'ang mi dpogs na/ /rin chen mdo brgya bsdu ba 'di ni
smos ci dgos/ /phyogs sgo rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab/ /rab gsal zhes byas yi bdag por gyur pa na/ /
bsod nams stobs kyis dgra las rgyal bas rgyal phran gyis/ /btud pas nor bu'i cod pan 'od kyis zhal gtsang
byas| |glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrig 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ /'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skabs gyur la/ /gzigs
nas 'gro ba'i chags sogs nyes pa zhi bzhed pas/ /thugs brtan thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab/ /de nas brtsams te sbyin
dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams/ /nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag
spel| |'gro la phan phyir shin tu dka' ba brgya phrag mdzad/ /thugs rje cher ldan drang srong mchog 'di tshe gzhan du/ /nyid kyis 'gro phan
don mdzad mi skyo ji snyed de/ /brjod pa 'di na shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang / /gang dag phyir ni cung zad yongs su brjod par bya/ /stag mo
shi bi'i glang po spre'u dka' thub dbang / /tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas/ /don kun sgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po tshe gcig thogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'
dga' ldan gnas su skye ba bzhes/ /der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la legs gzigs nas/ /skyabs med g.yo zhing phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la/ /thugs rje chen pos
thugs ni spro ba bskyed gyur te/ /gzhan gyi don mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgongs gyur/ /de bas 'di ni ji ltar mi yul nyer gshegs te/ /skye dang rga shi na ba'i 'jigs pa
gzigs nas ni/ /rab byung blo gros nges mdzad byang chub yang dag brnyes/ /de bzhin chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa mang por bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par
mdzad pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pas shin tu chod pa rnams la thugs rjes yongs su bskul ba/ gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa de thugs
la dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/ gang ngas skye ba mang por yongs su 'khor ba na rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / mgo dang / mig dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams gtong ba
dang | shin tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod
par byas pa dang / rtag tu lhod pa med pa'i spro ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang / yod pa dang / med pa'i don la rnam par dpyod pa dang
ldan pas gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs pa'i srog chags rnams la
mchog tu snying rje bskyed nas byams pa'i stobs dang / zla 'od dang / shi bi dang / glang po dang / thams cad sgrol dang / bzod par smra ba dang / spre'u'i bdag po dang / mig bzang
dang | sman chen po la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed du smon lam byas shing bsags pa/ e ma'o/ /kye ma bdag gis 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ yongs su
'dren pa med pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod chags kyis dbang du 'gro ba/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa/ sems la mi bzad pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/ khro ba
mang ba/ lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing gis rnam par brlag pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas kun tu bcings pa/ legs par spyod pa la 'jug pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes
par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la bdag sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can ma brgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bya'o/ /ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bya'o/ /
dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa
yin na/ de ni don de bya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na gdul bar nus so/ /gdul bar nus so/ /zhes de ltar
rnam par dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/ su ni 'grib/ su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni nyam thag par
gyur| su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/ gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /ces mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbugs dbyung bar bya/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni
ngan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/ mtho ris dang / thar ba'i 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba la lag nas
drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed
par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/ gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa
'jug par mdzad pa na srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa bskyed par 'os pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa yongs su smin par nus pa
dang | la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang / la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol ba dang / la la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'thob par gzhol ba dang / la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / la la
ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams nye bar bsags pas rkyen la rags las pa gang zhig ma thos pas dam pa'i chos las yongs su nyams par gyur par gzigs so/ /gzigs
nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o/ /bdag gis yun ring po nas yang dag par rtogs pa rdzogs par gyur cing nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to zhes dgyes
shing ngas bya ba ni byas so/ /ngas khur bskur bar dka' ba ni mthar phyin te/ gang nga'i yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye bo rnams yun ring por
mi thogs par pad+ma'i tshal yongs su smin cing kha bye la ma reg pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur gyur gyi phyi bshol mi bya'o/ /'dir gnas bzhin du'ang dngos po thams cad
rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas na gzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag mi'i 'jig rten du song la/ der phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla
na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/ 'di rnams skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'di rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba/ skyabs med pa/ yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog
chags rnams dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes su 'brel ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu
gdungs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i thugs la dgongs pa nges par bskyed nas/
dzam+bu'i gling du 'jug par mdzad pa na rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang / bud med de/ gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu
gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res
'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta na ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor
ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i
dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems
dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' yul ji lta ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma
he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i yul
gang yin pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / 'bras dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong
mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po btul bar 'gyur ba yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag la gzhan
dag byang chub sems dpas yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba
blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs
par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu dzam+bu'i gling du nying
mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar
'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba
len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing / bde ba mang bas
bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du'ang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /
sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su
nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las
byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs
pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud ma gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med par
gzigs nas/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag la gzhan
dag byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams
sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par
mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams
sbyor ba len snyam na de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ khro bag
can ma yin pa/ phra ma can ma yin pa/ ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin bzang ba/ bsam pa dge ba/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs mtho ba/ nye du'i rigs
dang ldan pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/ rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa/ khengs pa med pa/ byams pa'i
sems dang ldan pa/ sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/ bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la e ma'o bdag
sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs
so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
rigs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan zhes bya ba nas bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ khro bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel
bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye
ma| bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'ang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams
sbyor ba blangs so zhes kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs pa lngas
gzigs nas dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag /shes par gyis shig /nga dzam+bu'i gling du babs nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba
len gyi/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du nye bar phal cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug po/ 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod dang / sA ke ta dang / yangs pa can dang / tsam
pa dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / wA ra NA sir nying mtshams sbyor ba long zhig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa'/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /de ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/
dzam+bu'i gling na rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrug pa lags so/ /de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs
byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'don gyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pham skra'i lab can dang / kA t+yA'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/ /
rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze sgyus rgal dang / bram ze rnas rdeg dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram
ze dmar po'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u
kun rgyal dang / drang srong nyon mongs med pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can no/ /'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa
bsham pa bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas
kyang bdag cag yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta der ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po dag/ de'i phyir rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad brdungs shig/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha spyad thams
cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te gsungs pa/ grogs po dag /'di la lhag par sgra gang che/ bcom ldan 'das/ dung gi sgra lags so/ /grogs po dag/ ji
ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang dzam+bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par
'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/ /mi rtag pa'i dung bud par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/ /bdag med pa'i
seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs nas tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan zan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/ /rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma
'jig /brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ /nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ /grogs po dag /khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul
dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long zhig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di
ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyi/ ma la/ de la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas lha
rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing / lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
na bzhugs pa rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas nam gyi gung la glang po cher bstan te dga' ldan gyi lha'i
ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po
'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/ gang
du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems
can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /
shes ldan dag/ sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/ /ji ltar sprin ni rgya chen legs 'dus pa/ /chu mang bsags pa rlung gis bskyod pa ltar/ /de bzhin blo ldan de
ni lhums 'jug pa/ /ston ka'i sprin rum zla rgyas ji bzhin no/ /gang tshe rtsal ldan mnyam med nyer gshegs la/ /de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gling bar na/ /mun gyis khebs bsal phyogs
kun shin tu ni/ /gsal snang byung gyur 'di 'dir chos nyid do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa de
nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhi mthong ste/ glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la skyil mo
krung gis 'chag pa dang / seng ge'i gdan la 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o/ /rgyal po zas
gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang / mtshan mkhan rnams la rmi lam 'di ji ltar ston pa yin dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /gang btsun
mos rmi lam du mthong ba glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sras bltam par
'gyur ro/ /steng gi nam mkha' la 'chag go zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ge'i gdan la 'dug ste chos ston to zhes bya ba ni de'ang seng ge'i gdan
la bzhugs te 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed do zhes bya ba nas/ gal te de rab tu byung bar gyur na lha
dang | lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed la mngon par bstod par 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas
'phos te yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar
'jog pa ni/ lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha mchog bzhi la brgya byin gyis smras pa//
khyed rnams song la lha mi rnams kyi ni/ /shin tu mchog gyur yum de ji ltar su'ang / /gnod mi byed par gus pas yongs su srungs/ /de rnams shin tu 'bad byas dga'
pa dang / /brgya byin lung ni spyi bos mnos nas su/ /rnam kun mda' mdung ral gri lag na thogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni srung bar byed/ /g.yul du rgyal gyur lha bzhis
spas pa dang / /de ni nyin mtshan sna tshogs rgyan 'chang zhing / /lha mo rang khyim nang nas rnam rol pa/ /dga' ba'i tshal na spyod pa lta bur spyod/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu
'phrul chen mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o/ /lha/ btson thams cad thar bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas btson thams cad thar
bar byas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o/ /lhas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi dbus su dman pa dang / long pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa
dang | slong mo ba rnams la sbyin pa byin la bsod nams dag byas pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug
phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin/ bsod nams ni bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang /
long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni byas pa dang /
de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams gang
mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni byas so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas
'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna
tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /dper na/ nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du gang gis tshe byang chub
sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang
rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /ji ltar nor bu tshon shel 'od gsal dang / /rab gtsang ka shi'i ras kyang gos pa med/ /de bzhin thub chen lhums na bzhugs pa na//
mngal gyi dri ma cis kyang gos pa med/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na
de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /dper na/ nor bu bai DUR+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po/ rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna
lnga sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan la brgyus la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/ /'di ni nor bu'o/ /skud pa 'di la
nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i
yum gyi lhums na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhums kyi nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /ji ltar dri med nor bu bai DUR+ya/ /'od gsal lag par bzhag pa snang bltar//
de bzhin thub chen yum gyi lhums bzhugs pa/ /shes shing sems dpas yum ni yang dag lta/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan nas
'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus ngal ba'am/ lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/ /las kyi rnam
smin zad pas mtho ris 'phos/ /gang tshe 'di ni lhums zhugs bzhugs pa na/ /de'i yum ngal bas 'dzin par mi byed par/ /de tshe gyur pa 'dir de chos nyid do/ /chos nyid kyis
gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum da phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i
bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go /ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs pa spyod pa
dang | brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i
gnas las slar ldog par byed do/ /srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / /rdzun mi smra dang chang la mi brkam dang / /'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ /'di ni don grub
yum gyi chos nyid yin/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum 'di lta
ste| skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/ /nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ /de
yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ /skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtong pa med/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag gis
rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod
pa skyes/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ lha/ btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i rgya
mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sras
yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga'i ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu
rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas rgya mtsho chen po las chu myur bar khug cig ces bsgo ba dang / des de nyid na 'dug bzhin du
rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu drangs te de rnams la btsun mo 'thung du bcug pa dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo
sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o/ /bdag lus lum bi nI'i tshal du zhugs la shing gi rtsar yal ga'i mthar 'dug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas
rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul de lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes par rig nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs bshams te glang
po'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor
te| btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig tu chas nas lum bi nI'i tshal du phyin to/ /de nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos lum bi nI'i tshal mthong ba na sems rtse gcig
par gyur pa dang / de khyogs las babs te/ shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog yang dag par rgyas pa mthong bas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ de der song nas me tog dang / 'dab
ma'i g.yur gyis dud pa'i yan lag la 'jus te/ bud med rgan pas bskor nas gnas so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ btsun mo sgyu
'phrul chen mo sras bltam par nye bar gnas kyi/ ma la/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang po bltam pa na blang bar bya'o/ /de nas yang bsams pa/ btsun mo sgyu
'phrul chen mo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas bdag gi mdun du bltam mi phod kyi thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bud med rgan mo
zhig gi cha byad du sprul te/ des gang gis bud med rgan mo de rnams phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag po zhig sprul nas de rnams bros pa dang / bdag
nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'jug go /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ni mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su
'jug pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du gnas pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag skyes bu tha mal pa bzhin
du mngal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis yum gyi dku g.yas pa brtol la 'byung bar bya'o zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi
dku g.yas pa brtol te byung ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di bdag gis
byang chub sems dpa' 'di blangs so zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur bar mkhyen nas ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje'i snying po can gyi skur byin gyis brlabs te lhums su ni yum 'dzin pas nyon
mongs par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs nas yang bar mdzad de bzhugs pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dzin par ma nus pa dang 'dar bar gyur to/ /byang
chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka thong / thong / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa la
bzhag go /bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun por zhing tshig tu yang gsung pa/ kau shi ka /phyogs 'di gang yin byang
chub sems dpa'/ shar phyogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /sems can thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ lho
phyogs lags so/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ byang phyogs lags so/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang
yin| nub phyogs lags so/ /nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro/ /skye 'chi mthar byed de ni bltams pa na/ /sa la gom pa bdun ni bzhud nas su/ /'di nga'i skye ba tha mar
gyur yin zhes/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma gcig pus gsungs/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas byung ba'i de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin
tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing / 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang /
slar 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa
de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang pa'ang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes
ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/ /gang che rnam 'dren bltams par gyur pa na/ /de tshe sa ni rir bcas shin tu g.yos/ /gang gis 'jig rten par
yang skad cig gis/ /snang byed 'od gsal de yang byung bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas sa g.yos pa chen po dang / snang ba rgya chen po mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
la bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che ba'i bu skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /chos nyid
kyis gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums na bltams pa na ral gri shugs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri
ma dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/ /ji ltar 'od gsal tshon shel bzang po dang / /ka shi ras gtsang phan tshun gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin thub de
lhums nas byung ba na/ /gser sbyangs me chen nang nas bton pa 'dra/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa
de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug /mi nyal te/ 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do/ /de ni mi 'dug nyal ba'ang ma yin te/ yan lag lnga ldan tshul khrims
kyis brgyan pas/ /de ni 'greng bzhin shin tu dge ba yi/ /gzhon nu de 'dir brgya byin dag gis blangs/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums
nas bltams pa de'i tshe de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/ /dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dra'i gdugs/ /lha yi gtso bos
dbu yi steng nas 'dzin/ /gdub 'khrol 'od zer gyis 'bar lag pa dang / /rnga yab bzang gis 'di la g.yob par byed/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
thub pa bltams pa'i mod la bar snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang / chu dron mo gcig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad
do| |dri med rab dag bsil dang de bzhin dro'i/ /chu yis rkang gnyis gtso bo khrus mdzad de/ /rigs rgyud gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs/ /klu rnams de la'ang mchod
pa byed par gyur/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la bskrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'babs par gyur te de la de'i yum khrus chu'i bya ba
byed do/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo gzhon nu bltams pa na/ /lha de rnams ni shin tu yid dga' bas/ /der ni chu bzang phyung bar gyur pa la/ /de yum der ni chu yis bya ba byed/ /lha yi rol
mo shin tu sgra snyan rnams/ /shin tu dga' ba mchog tu rdung bar byed/ /de rnams gos dang phreng ba 'thor byed cing / /gzhan ngag rab tu 'dud cing de bzhin bstod/ /chos nyid kyis
byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la lhas par snang las lha'i ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /
tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro/ /lha'i me tog man+dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/ /gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /mkhas
pas btud pa'i sangs rgyas bltams pa na/ /dri zhim dri mchog char ni phab pa dang / /de dang des na rang spobs tshul mthun pa'i/ /rab dga'i sems kyis bstod pa rjod par byed/ /
'dis ni byang chub mchog dag thob 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal zad pa'i 'gro phan mdzad gyur la/ /'gro ba mi shes rab rib mig ldongs la/ /sman pa mchog 'di mig ni rab stsol
'gyur/ /'di ni rmongs pas mig khebs long ba yi/ /'gro ba'i sgron ma chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /lta ngan gyis brlags log pa'i lam zhugs la/ /ma 'tshol
drang ba'i lam ni ston par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro'i lam ni ma lus 'gog 'gyur zhing / /lha yi gnas kyi sa ni 'byed 'gyur zhes/ /'og min par na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni/ /lha
yi gnas su yang yang sgrog par byed/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin bu btsas pa na tshangs
byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags
so| |rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po bu btsas pa na pad+ma chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar
snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /ko'u sham bi na rgyal po dmag brgya ba bu btsas pa na
dmag brgya ba 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /
grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab
snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/ de ni de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe dga' bo la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya btsas pa dang / grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya btsas pa dang / 'dun pa la
sogs pa rim gro ba lnga brgya btsas pa dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rta lnga brgya 'brangs so/ /lha rnams kyis gter lnga'i kha'ang nye bar bstan to/ /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams
dang | mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rab tu btud cing thams cad kyis kyang dpya phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'dod pa
thams cad grub pas na gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' la thog mar mtshan btags so/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
shAkya thub pa bltams pa'i mod la yab yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag /ci ga gzhon nu gang dag
dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam
par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che
dang | glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/ /bu dpa' ba/
rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong 'byung ba de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing
'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med pa/ chos dang mthun pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos
ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya
bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nas/ lha/ mang lags te/ gzhon nu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du gdags par 'gyur
zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ snga ma bzhin du 'di ni 'dir chos nyid yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal pos gzhon nu bltams nas skyes bu yi/ /mtshan shes bram ze la dris de
tshe smras/ /rgyal bu gal te khyim na gnas gyur na/ /nges par 'di ni mi dbang dag tu 'gyur/ /brtul bar ldan zhing rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis/ /spyi la dbang ba'i 'khor los
bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gling rnams kun tu mngon rgyal ba'i/ /chos kyi rgyal srid dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /rin chen gyur pa 'di ni rin chen bdun/ /mi mchog bsod nams
las kyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gi mthu yis sa ni ma lus pa/ /'di ni lung mi gcog par spyod par 'gyur/ /gser las legs byas lte ba shin tu zlum/ /rtsibs stong ldan
zhing myu khyud ma nyams bzang / /dang por sa la rnam par rgyal 'gyur gang / /'khor lo de 'dis dang por thob par 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad legs skyes sa la ni/ /rab
gnas gangs can rtse 'dra'i glang po'i mchog /rgyal po la 'os mkha' la 'gro ba yi/ /rin chen mchog ni gnyis pa 'dis 'thob 'gyur/ /tho rangs dus su phyogs kun ma lus
pa'i/ /sa rnams bskor nas slar ni ldog gyur gang / /rma bya'i mgrin 'dra spu ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /rin chen rta ni 'di yis thob par 'gyur/ /rin chen dri med
bai DUR+ya rang bzhin/ /kun tu dpag tshad tsam du snang byed pa/ /dri med mtshan mo ci 'dra nyin de bzhin/ /rin chen mchog ni bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig reg dri gzugs
dang mdangs ldan pa'i/ /bud med dam pa dregs ldan rnams kyi mchog /lha mo bzhin du yon tan kun ldan pa/ /bud med rin chen de 'dir 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang yang 'di
ni rgyal la mu tig dang / /gser sogs shin tu mang po 'bul ba yi/ /nor ldan mtshungs par nor mang khyim bdag ni/ /rin chen thob nas rnam par spyod par 'gyur/ /'gror
dang kun tu gnas dang rnam ldog dang / /ma lus dpung la mkhas par byed pa yi/ /dpal ldan bdun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /mi yi rin chen blon po zhes bya yin/ /dpal
zhing brtul phod yan lag mchog gzugs ldan/ /bu stong dag ni 'di la 'byung 'gyur zhing / /gang gi gzi brjid shin tu stobs che zhing / /sa bdag gzhan dag 'dud
par byed pa 'byung / /gal te khyim ni nyes mang gis dkrugs pa/ /rab 'bar shing ni bya yis sdong ba ltar/ /nye bar zhi phyir nags su des song na/ /de 'dir ring por mi thogs
sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sras 'di deng ni 'di 'dra ba/ /gzhon nu 'gro ba'i rin chen gcig bltams pa/ /'gro ba gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gro ba/ /de ltar sngags kyi tshig las
mthong ba lags/ /shes ldan dag /gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgra rnam par grags
par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/ /lha| gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/ /zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas
pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs
stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon
nu'i sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / de'i phyag dang / zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang / zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa
ni| dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu'i
phyag dang / zhabs dra bar 'brel ba lags te/ de'i phyag dang / zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ni/ dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no/ /lha| 'di ni gzhon
nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku mdud pa dang /
sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha|
gzhon nu ni 'doms kyi spa ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ dper na/ glang po che cang shes kyi'am/ rta cang shes byung ma thag gi bzhin no/ /
lha| 'di gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i sku ci srid par 'dom yang de srid la/ 'dom ci srid par sku'ang de srid pas shing n+ya gro
d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i ro stod kyis spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re
re nas skye ba'ang mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni
mdog gser 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser gyi 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang / dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/ lha/ 'di ni
gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung
mgo gnyis dang / ltag pa lags te/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra
ba dang | sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar
ba dang | 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu ni
ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang / srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor
thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping+ka'i
skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rda'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon
nu'i spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen
po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| 'di dag ni gang dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra
rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so/ /bdag nyid legs bsgoms sku la ni/ /sku yi tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa'i/ /
thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /de ni bdag gis brjod par bgyi/ /'di zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ /sa la mnyam par 'bab pa yin/ /'di zhabs phyag gi mthil la ni/
'khor lo shin tu dbyibs legs skyes/ /'di zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang / /de ni sor mo ring zhing mdzes/ /phyag zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / /shing ba la lta bur 'jam pa
dang | |'di'i zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon/ /byin pa e ne ya dang mtshungs/ /mi mchog sku yang ma btud par/ /phyag gis pus mo'i lha nga slebs/ /'doms kyi sba ba
sbubs su nub/ /n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab/ /ro stod spu ni re re nas/ /skye zhing de spu g.yas su 'khyil/ /mdog ni gser sbyangs 'dra ba dang / /kun nas 'dom gang 'od dang ldan/ /bcom
ldan de ni pags srab cing / /'di sku bdun ni mtho ba ste/ /bcom ldan thal gong rgyas pa dang / /sku stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / /sku drang kho lag che ba dang / /dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang //
bcu phrag bzhi yi tshems rnams ni/ /yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang med/ /mnyam dang thags bzang nyid du ni/ /de yi tshems ni legs par gnas/ /rab dkar 'gram pa seng ge 'dra//
ro bro mchog dang ldan pa dang / /ljags ni shin tu srab pa dang / /bcom ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/ /rdzi ma ba 'dra spyan mthon mthing / /smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu ni/ /dung
ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil/ /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di/ /gang zhig la ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'gro ba gnyis 'gyur gyi/ /gsum par 'gyur ba ma lags so/ /'di
ni gal te khyim gnas na/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal nyid 'gyur te/ /dran ldan bu ni mang ba dang / /gnod pa chung zhing mkhas par 'gyur/ /gal te rab byung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gang
zag mnyam pa med par 'gyur/ /bshos dang btung dang na bza' dang / /gzims cha rnams kyang snyed 'gyur la/ /'di yi 'khor ni mi phyed cing / /lus can kun gyi yid du 'ong / /lha
rnams rjes su 'brang ba dang / /mi rnams kyang ni de bzhin te/ /chos kyi bdag po mchog 'gyur zhing / /mi yul dag tu'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ /mnyam pa med cing
'dra ba med/ /rnam 'dren mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags te/ gang dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma lags
zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de bskrun pa'i yum nongs par gyur te/ nongs ma thag
tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' ma ma rnams la gtad nas/ ma ma/ khyed kyis gzhon nu 'di dus
dus su sku mnye byos shig /dus dus su khrus byos shig /dus dus su zas byin cig /dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig /ma ma/ dga' ba'i lag pa
gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su sku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yang de'i tshe
dri shin tu yid 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te dga'
bas pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog
las yang dag par 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser la
mgar ba mkhas pas rgyun brdungs pa/ la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no/ /chos nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs
chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen pos da phrag pa nas phrag par spo bar byed pa ni/ dper na/ ston ka'i pad+ma skye bo'i tshogs
chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
bltams pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la lta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzum pa ni/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems
dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan des de nyin dang / mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu
gzigs so/ /las bcas las byung dri med spyan gyis ni/ /gzugs chen po dang de bzhin phra rab rnams/ /nyin dang mtshan du khor yug dpag tshad gcig /mdun na gnas pa
bzhin du'ang gzigs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba
yin te/ dper na/ gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan
cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byams
pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa zhig gnas te/ de la tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba yod pa dang / de de'i tshe phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed
pa na byang chub sems dpa' bltams te/ 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen po gsal bar gyur pa'i snang ba de mthong ba dang / nyon mongs med la smras pa/ mkhan po 'dir
ni nyi ma thams cad dag /gcig car byung bar gyur tam ci/ /'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/ /'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/ /nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni
rgyun du rno/ /bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/ /yan lag reg na 'od gsal bas/ /nges par thub pa de yi 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od can ni/ /nges par lhums nas bltams
gyur la/ /bltams nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/ /'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/ /dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten gsum ni snang byas yin/ /mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan
po bzhud/ ci re zhig 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ram/ 'on te bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba rang nyid kyis blta bar mdzod cig /drang srong nyon mongs med
kyis smras pa/ de ltar na ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim nyi 'og gi rgyal po dang / mkhar gyi rgyal po dang / tshong ba dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim
bdag brgya stong dpag tu med pas kun tu khyab nas 'dug gi/ gang gi tshe de dben par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di
snyam du/ kye ma'o/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par
'phags nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang sgor phyin pa dang / ji tsam na sgo srung gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la/ lha/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ drang
srong nyon mongs med 'dir mchis so zhes rig par byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos te dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu rangs pa byung nas
mchog tu gus pas mchod de 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po/ legs par 'ongs so/ /dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
bdag ni 'dir/ /khyed sras blta ba'i phyir mchis te/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na ni gzhon nu
gnyid log gi sang kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig /nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ /mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don gnyer
rnams kyi gnyid/ /mig la yun ring mi gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ma ma'i par na 'dug pa drang srong nyon mongs med la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med
kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam brtags te smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'di mtshan mkhan rnams kyis ji skad lung bstan/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ rin
po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ /rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog gis chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/ /nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas
'gyur/ /mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi
'khor los bsgyur/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha'i nges pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas/ khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /bdag ni bar skabs der
'chi ba'i dus byed par mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas dngangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes bu bud med rnams kyis
mthong ba na/ /ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dge byed da ni 'dir mthong nas/ /drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur/ /gang las bdag gi gzhon nu
'jigs pa'am/ /tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang / /de ni myur du legs par bdag la smos/ /khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur/ /drang
srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las/ /rdo rje ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku la ba spu ni/ /
nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par mi nus so/ /me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / /mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad dang / /drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug non yang / /
gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyi
'jigs 'joms na/ /mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ /tshangs bcas lha
yang rtag tu srung byed pa/ /mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni/ /gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob par du mod/ /chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di
dang phrad nas ni/ /don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang dag smra ba dam pa mtshungs med pa/ /'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang / /rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol
'gro de dag /skyed cing bsod nams ldan la rims nad bral/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so/ /nyams pa dang
nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rkang kho nas grong khyer nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos pa dang / grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo
rnams bsal nas spos dang / phye mas khyab par byed du bcug go /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer nas byung ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin du phyin pa dang /
mi sbyin la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu mthong ste/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur na ngas ni de slob par mi 'gyur te/ nga ni bar skabs su dus byed par 'gyur gyi khyod ni de'i thad
du rab tu byung la/ nga rgyal dang / dregs pa nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par bya ste/ rigs kyis dregs par mi bya/ rus kyis dregs par mi bya/
rigs rgyud kyis dregs par mi bya ste/ khyod kyis kyang yun ring po mi thogs par bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur gyi zhes smras nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa tshol 'dod na/ /shar phyogs su ni khyod 'dug dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
zas gtsang mas gzhon nu ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa la yang dang / yang du lta zhing nga'i bu ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni sa'i steng na su la'ang med do snyam du sems shing shin
tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring por ma lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas/ gser gyi gzhong bar 'bras dang / shar bsres pa'i chan
gsol ba na de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang / dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal po btsun
mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des kyang ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal po blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na de rnams kyis
kyang dbrog par ma nus so/ /de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gi /ma la
bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de
dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa
g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyi/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags
so zhes btags so/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ /shAkya rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su'ang rung ba la khye'u 'am
bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la
gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang po che la bskyon te dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor
te grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa dang / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi sgra bcu gnyis dang bral bar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa' de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin
du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa/ grong khyer 'di 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i sgra dang / rta'i sgra dang / shing rta'i sgra dang / dpung bu chung gi sgra dang / dung
gi sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / be de'i sgra dang / rwa dung gi sgra dang / gar gyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni gyis/ bsnyen gnas la ni
nye bar gnas/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mnos shig ces bya ba'i sgra ste sgra bcu gnyis dang bral zhing gzhon nu de nang du zhugs pa ni thub pa bzhin
du zhi bar gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnod
sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gan du khyer ba dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams
cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag byas so/ /de mthong ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ lhas kyang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di
ni lha'i yang lha yin pas gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis
dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang / yi
ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par btang nas yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas
smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes so/ /de nas des yi ge gnyis dang / gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag thams cad kyang
ngas shes kyi gzhan dag smros shig /srin bu go chas smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis
yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yi ge 'di ming ci yin smros shig /des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis
shig byung nas mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'o/ /nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha/ byang chub sems
dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ /
byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags la/ nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa dang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par bzang len dang / lhar bcas zhes bya ba 'phong gi slob dpon gyi gan du 'phong gi gnas su
gtad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnas lnga po rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa
dang | tshabs che ba la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas bzang len dang / lhar bcas 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams
cad bslab kyi/ lha sbyin 'di ni gdug pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad du gnod par 'gyur na mi rung gi 'di la gnad du bsnun par bslab par mi bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas dus
gzhan zhig na lha sbyin gyis ngang pa lcags mdas bsnun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la bzhugs pa de'i pang bar de lhung ngo / /de nas byang chub
sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste sman gyis byugs pas sos so/ /lha sbyin gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ngang pa 'di ni ngas yongs su bzung ba yin gyi bskur cig/
byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ngas ches sngar yongs su bzung ste/ gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe yongs su
bzung ngo / /der byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang / bzod pa ma yin pa dang / phebs pa ma yin pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha sbyin la sogs pa
shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya byung ba dang / lha sbyin gyis ras kyis bcings nas shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/ /ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs der bzhud pa dang / lha
sbyin gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ci la sdod/ byang chub sems dpas kyang ras bcings te shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/ /de nas lha sbyin ras kyis bcings pa dang
byang chub sems dpas kyang bzung ste rkang ba gyen du bstan nas gan rgyal du bsgyel ba dang / der yang byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang / mi bzod pa dang / bag mi
phebs pa'i sems gnyis pa bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya mda' gzhu thogs te phyi rol tu byung nas ta la la tshabs byed pa la zhugs pa dang / la las ni ta la
gcig phigs so/ /la las ni gnyis so/ /lha sbyin gyis ni gsum mo/ /byang chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / shing ta la bdun phigs pa las ji srid rlung gis bskyod
de thams cad 'gyel ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram na shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye ba
mtshan mo ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la nyin par ni mtshon gyis kyang gcad par mi nus ba zhig yod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma pa'i lha rnams kyis gang gis shing dge ba'i
snying po rtsa ba steng du bton nas ro hi ta ka'i nang du bcug pa de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag cig sprul to/ /de rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / legs par rab sang
kyis thos nas shing 'dir grong khyer brlag par ma gyur tam snyam nas srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
'khor brgya stong dpag tu med pas drangs su zin kyang ci tsam du bskyod par yang ma nus so/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha| byang chub sems dpa' sbron cig /rgyal pos smras pa/
kho bos gzhon nu la bka' stsol bar mi nus so/ /'char kas smras pa/ khyed rnams kyis ca co'i sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs shig /ci nas kyang ngas byang chub sems dpa'
gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis sgra gsang mthon po dang chen pos ca co'i sgra bsgrags so/ /'char ka byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba
dang | byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'char ka /ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig yin/ 'char kas rnam pa de dag rgya cher gsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gsungs
pa| gal te de ltar na 'byin du 'dong / de nas 'char ka dang / byang chub sems dpa' chas pa dang / ci tsam na khung nas sprul gdug pa zhig byung ngo / /'char kas byang chub
sems dpa' zin par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes ral gri rnon pos rked pa bcad pa dang / sbrul gyi dug gi dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog ste de nag por gyur nas de'i ming yang 'char ka
nag po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der bzhud de phyin pa dang / lha sbyin la gsungs pa/ khyod kyi stobs ci tsam pa blta yis
bskyod cig /lha sbyin gyis 'bad de cung zad cig bskul to/ /dga' bos ni cung zad drangs so/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi nyams sad par mdzad cing shing dge ba'i
snying po phyag gis blangs te 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram nas 'phangs te byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag /shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin
yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang / shu ba dang / phol mig byung ba la phyugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyi dum bur byos la khyer te rang rang gi khyim du zhog cig /yang yangs pa can du
glang po che rin po che zhig skyes pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa bI rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po zas
gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po che rin po che 'di byung gi /dong la de kho na la dbul
lo snyam mo/ /de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che'i
dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che'i dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes
te| de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang po che'i dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ /lha sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re zhig
de 'khor los bsgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/ /ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa
des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis so/ /des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la lha
sbyin gyi mthu sad kyi/ ma la/ bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste goms pa bdun du bor ro/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /sus bsad/ lha sbyin gyis so/ /mgron rnams la mgron gyi
mchod pa bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /phyogs gang du bsad/ pha gir ro/ /'dir sus drud/ dga' bos so/ /des dgongs pa/ 'dir gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis
'di la mthu sad kyi/ ma la/ ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs rim pa
bdun las 'das te bor ro/ /de lhung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i bshong / glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/ /
dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du drud/ /byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/ /rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ gal
te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis 'di la
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phal po che byin na de ltar na ni de rnams la dga' bas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du gos
dang | rgyan gyi phung po bzhag nas smras pa/ deng khyed kyis shAkya'i bu mo rnams la rgyan dang / gos rnams byin cig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ser skya'i grong
khyer du deng gzhon nu gos dang / rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyi/ shAkya'i bu mo thams cad shog cig ces dril sgrog tu bcug go /de nas shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya 'ongs pa dang /
thams cad la byang chub sems dpas gos dang / rgyan rnams byin no/ /de nas shAkya dbyig pa can la grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo yod pa dag /des de la smras pa/ khyed la
yang gzhon nu gos dang / rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyi song / de nas grags 'dzin ma/ ci/ bdag la byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan su zhig khyor 'gyur snyam du bsams nas
byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang / ci tsam na gos dang / rgyan thams cad byin zin nas ci'ang ma lus pa dang / des byang chub sems dpa'i mgul na shin tu mdzes shing
rin che ba'i mu tig phreng gcig lus pa mthong nas de de la dga' bas bag 'khum pa med par rang nyid kyis bkrol te rang gi mgul du btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i
thad nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te bu mo 'di phebs shing brtan pa las na 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus kyi 'di blang bar bya'o
snyam du bsams nas/ grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ song las
kyi mtha' ci tsam pa la ltos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsgo ba gsan te shing rta bzang po la zhugs nas phyi rol tu gshegs te/ yab rgyal po zas
gtsang ma'i las kyi mtha' gzigs shing byang chub sems dpa' las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa rnams kyi gan du byon pa dang / bshol lnga brgya dang / zhing rmed cing zhing pa'i mi de rnams kyis
kyang gshol gnon cing 'dren pas stobs nye bar nyams pa mgo lus rdul gyis yog pa dang / rlung dang / than pas lus la gdungs pas lus rtsub cing mdog ngan pa/ rkang pa dang /
lag pa gas pa dang / dengs shing dri ma can gyi gos gyon pa/ rkang pa dri ma can/ ltogs pa dang / skom pas mdog ngan zhing / lkog ma dang / mkhur ba dang / mig gi logs skams
ba dang / glang de rnams kyang rmon pa lcags gzer rnon po can gyis lus bral bas rgyab dang / mjug ngo'i phyogs khrag gis yog pa/ ltogs pa dang / skom pas dbugs brtsegs
shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs brtsegs pa ring du 'dren la/ gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang / 'bu'i tshogs kyis za ba/ thong lcags
kyis rkang pa la rma byung zhing / kha dang / sna nas kha chu dang / sna chu 'dzag pa la sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu ring gis yog pa rnams gzigs so/ /
gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /
shes ldan dag /khyed su'i yin/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lags so/ /des gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed deng phan chad bran du mi bya/ mngag gzhug
par mi bya/ rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas/ bde ba la reg par gnas shig /rmon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/ khyed cag kyang deng phan chad rtswa mchog
ma nyams pa za zhing chu ma rdul ma brnyogs shing dang ba dag la 'thungs shig /khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
yid byung ba de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing slas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas snum zhing sngo la 'dab ma mthug cing grib ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i shing gi
grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing dzam+bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/ 'dod pa las dpen pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'ang byang chub
sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te 'di ltar dro'i dus las
yol gyi bltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing dzam+bu'i drung du phyin to/ /de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing
gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems
dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab
par gyur na/ shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/
'di ltar du nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/ shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni
byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyam mo/ /de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar bltams tshe sa ni g.yos pa ltar/ /dzam+bu'i grib ma khyod sku mi gtong ba/ /blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste/ /kun gzigs khyod kyi zhabs
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas shing rtar zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gter skyong ba skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo ring ba
gter thogs te byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ gter 'di rnams bzhes shig/ byang chub
sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'di gang gi/ lha/ skyes bu gang zhig dus las 'das pa de rnams kyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'di rnams kyis chog
gi| re zhig de rnams kyi blun po yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas/ khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song zhig/ tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/ gang gis nga la
'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/ /de dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin/ /bdag kyang shi nas ring por mi thogs par/ /gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong / /de rnams kyis
yang sgra phyung ba/ gzhon nu/ gal te mi bzhes na bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go /byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang / de rnams rgya mtsho chen
po'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya
dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so/ /snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi nang nas gshegs pa na/ lha rnams kyis mi ro rnam par sngos
pa dang / rnam par rnags pa dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang / rnam par bam pa dang / rnam par zos pa zhig bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas skyo ba
'khrungs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' lam gzhan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par byas so/ /de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi'i bud med
kyi tshogs skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / ba gam dag na byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing 'dug pa dang / shAkya dus legs kyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang bzang
gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos sa la brkos te khrag byung yang mtshor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang sa 'tsho ma la gzigs pa na phyag
g.yas kyis mda' phye mar brlags so/ /kha lo pas lcags mda' phul ba dang de yang phye mar brlags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du
sems te/ 'dis ni gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam mo/ /de nas kha lo bsgyur bas shing rta drangs pa dang / shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo'i ri dwags skyes zhes bya bas
byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs te byon pa mthong ba dang / yang steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing / /
yab kyang shin tu bde ba yin/ /kye ma gang gi khyim thab gyur/ /bud med de yang mya ngan 'das/ /skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra gsan nas/ /mya
ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du/ /mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra gsan pas ri dwags skyes la dgyes te mgul
nas mu tig phreng cig phog ste/ 'phangs nas shing rta de la bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do/ /phreng ba de'ang de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal
po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam nas sa 'tsho ma bud med nyi khris skor ba dang / ri dwags skyes kyang
bud med nyi khris skor ba byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /de ltar na grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dwags skyes la sogs pa btsun mo stong phrag drug cu byung
bar gyur to/ /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te byang chub sems dpa' lo bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de
nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che zhig sbyin par bya'o snyam nas phal po che
byin no/ /mtshan mkhan gyis gal te byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na gdon mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
to| |de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga shin tu 'ang mang du byin te/ 'di ltar yang 'di la mngon par dga' bas rab tu 'byung
bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye| kha lo sgyur ba/ re
zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur bar shoms shig dang / der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung par 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha
lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/ kye/ kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /lha/
bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ga na
ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyi/ lha/ da de'i dus la bab par
dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas
mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang
mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can
mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur
ba| rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ring por mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ nga'ang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid
las ma 'das sam/ lha'ang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin
