nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
pho brang gi nang du byon nas de'ang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ dar yol rgas shing sgur la mgo skya ba/ /lag na
'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/ /'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo
sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang / mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' ba'am/ lha/ ma lags so/ /
de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha/ gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshags pa ni/ mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la brten
cing lus 'dar zhing mchi la/ des skra se ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar
yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/
rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas/ lha/ de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/
nges 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nga yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha'ang rga ba'i
chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar pho
brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /lha/ gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/ de nas rga ba las ma 'das pa lta
zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par
bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gi/ ma la/
bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che byin te ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ kha
lo sgyur ba'i tshig de thos pa dang / /gzhon nu la ni yab de dogs bzhin du/ /de tshe slar dga' nags su mi 'gro'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar bcas mang du byin/ /de nas chos
nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed pa gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye/ kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms
shig dang / de la nga gzhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kye/ kha lo sgyur ba/
re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /de la nga bzhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes kha
lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na bder song ste phyin nas byang
chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/ lha/ /de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba
dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa
nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/ lha/ 'di ni bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ nad kyis thebs pa
zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di gang gis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/ lha/ 'di ni bros thebs ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ nga'ang nad kyi chos
dang | nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha'ang snyun gyi chos dang / snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /
'di ltar pho brang du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems
dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ mi ni lus rid skya bo rbab rbab
po| |rang dbang med pa'i nad thebs 'dir gzigs nas/ /nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang / mthu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/
lha| ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha| gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na/ mi skya bo rbab rbab po ring pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i
mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi skya bo rbab rbab pa rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo
mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ 'di ni bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /des 'di skad
ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mi 'di gang gnod pa 'dis 'gum pa'i gnas mchis
te| lha| de ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nga yang nad kyi chos dang / nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha yang snyun gyi chos dang / snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur
cig| pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du
gshegs nas nga'ang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang /
ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /'dir smras pa/ de tshe dga' nas bdag ngor mi
gzhug phyir/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang / /reg bya yid du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yang byin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
shAkya thub pa skyed mos tshal gyis gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kha lo sgyur ba la bka' stsal pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
pas ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla bre bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun nas me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang / bud med skra
bshig pa rnams du zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla bre
bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun nas me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang / bud med skra bshig pa rnams du zhing rjes bzhin du
'brang ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing / bu pho dang / bu
mo dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lags la de dag gis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas/ lha/ 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha
lo sgyur ba/ nga'ang 'chi ba'i chos dang / 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha'ang 'chi ba'i chos dang / 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo
sgyur pa/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas nga 'chi ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo
sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces
mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ tshe zad pa yis 'du shes bral gyur cing / /sems med mi yi ro zhig gzigs nas ni/ /'chi las bdag ma 'das pa
lta zhig ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /'dir
smras pa/ grong khyer dam pa la dpal ldan yid 'ong der/ /lha yi lhar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pos kun dgyes pa/ /mig stong dga' ba'i tshal
na gnas pa bzhin/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par
bya dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas/ de rnams kyis mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa/ lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig byim
nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig sprul to/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyis gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa zhes bya ba la
sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa
zhig khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi skra bregs shing lag pa na
lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba ci yin/ lha/ de ni
rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa
legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad
pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/ lha| 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba
gang na bde logs su sgyur cig/ lha| bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang nga ba der
bsgyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye| mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs
nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba yin/ des 'di skad
ces smras so/ /gzhon nu/ bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kye| mi khyod ji ltar na rab tu byung ba zhes bya/ gzhon nu/ bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par
sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang / kha spu
bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /kye| mi khyod kyis dul
ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par
rig nas skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyi ma med par rab tu byung ba legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
pas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas don 'di kho na bsam par
bya'o| |kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der pho brang du gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa kye ma'o bdag ni skra dang / kha spu
bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos rmi lam rmis ba/ dbang po'i rtog lhung ba dang / shAkya rnams phyag dar gyis khengs
pa dang / sa ldog pa dang / dpal khyim nas byung ba dang / phyi rol na skad cig cing du zhing dgod pa la bdag nyid lta ba dang / nyi ma gang nas shar ba de nyid nas nub pa'o/ /byang chub
sems dpas de gsan pa dang / dgongs pa/ nga ni shAkya rnams kyi dbang po'i tog gi gnas yin pa dang / nga grong khyer nas 'byung ma dpal byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa/ dpal gyi mal khri chag pa dang / pha'i rgyud chad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas de gsan pa dang / de de bzhin te/ da ni grags 'dzin
ma'i dpal gyi gnas su gyur pa dang / zas gtsang ma'i pha'i rigs rgyud kyi gnas su gyur pas nga rab tu byung na shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud chad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma mkhan
rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /'di skad
ces kyang smras so/ /gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na/ /de slad dgung bdun bar du srungs shig dang / /mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa lta'i/ /rin chen sna bdun
'byung bar the tshom med/ /khyod sras rin chen bdun po yis/ /dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho la ni thug pa'i sa/ /chad pa med pas skyong bar 'gyur/ /'on te sa ni
spangs nas su/ /bsnyengs med nags su bzhud na ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas/ /'gro ba sgrol ba mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang zas gtsang dang /
zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas bzhi lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /mtshan mkhan dang / bltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams
kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyi/ de lta bas na bdag cag
gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rab rim pa
bdun dang / 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te/ sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag
tshad gcig khor yug tu grag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' khang bzang gi gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa/ gzugs bzang ba rnams dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo rnams
kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go /skas shin tu che ba spor rung ba mi lnga brgyas bteg pa byas so/ /chibs bsngags ldan gyis phyogs ni zangs ma'i glegs bus g.yogs shing
gser gyi sil dkrol gyi dra ba btags pas bskor to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi bskyes pa med par zhugs nas/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang /
sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad dag nye bar len cing 'byor pa chen pos bzhugs so/ /mtshan mo ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs
yan lag bzhi dang / shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/ lho phyogs na ni bre bo zas so/ /nub phyogs na ni zas dkar ro/ byang phyogs na ni bdud rtsi zas so/ /grong khyer gyi dbus kyi
'dram po byed pa ni shAkya ming chen dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de shar sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ rgyal po
zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha| mel tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur zhes smras te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig
rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/ /gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song / /'di ni mi nyal rtag tu mkhas/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /lho sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig
mal tshe byed/ /su zhig mel tshe byed/ bre bo zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha| mel tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes
smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/ /gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song / /gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song / /de bas ma
nyal mel tshe byos/ /nub sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ zas dkar gyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha| mel tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe
mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos/ /myos 'gyur bre bos 'thungs ba nyal/ /dgon pa nags
su nyal ba 'dras/ /de bas mnyal mel tshe byos/ /byang sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ /su zhig mel tshe byed/ bdud rtsi zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /
lha| mel tshe mdzod cig /mel tshe mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin/ /rgya mtsho'i chur ni nyal
ba dang / /ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin/ /de bas mnyal mel tshe byos/ /dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe
byed| srung ma rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag mel tshe bgyid do/ /mel tshe byos shig /mel tshe byas dang / legs par 'gyur ro/ zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod/ /bden par spros shig rdzun ma smra/ /mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /de nas nam nangs nas shAkya ming
chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha| dgung sangs lags te/ dgung bdun la dgung gcig ni thal/ dgung drug ni lus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
gis smras pa/ lags kyi zhag drug 'das nas gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur na bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin 'dong ngo / /deng shin tu dgung
gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ mi dbang shAkya'i sras po thub pa 'di/ /bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs//
thugs rnams dgyes par mdzad pa dka' thub tshal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshegs par bzhed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag
la gzhan dag gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dwags skyes dang / bud med drug khri spangs nas rab tu 'byung
ngo zhes gzhi de las kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gi/ ma la/ bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan
cig dga' mgur spyad pa dang grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam nangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam
mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ bud med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i/ /tha ma deng gi 'di yin te/ /
phyin chad khyim du bud med dang / /nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de nas bud med de rnams gar dang / glu dang / rol mos ngal zhing lci la dub nas kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la
gos dang / lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/ bla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du rdol zhing gnyid log go /byang chub sems dpas bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la
gos dang / lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/ bla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du rdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes so/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyo ba 'khrungs pa dang tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ rlung gi shugs kyis pad+ma'i tshal ltar sa gzhi 'dir/ /lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas
'gyel 'gyur te/ /skra rnams zhig cing mdoms dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba/ shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar 'gyur/ /tshul dang 'dra ba'i bud med na chung
tshogs 'di dag /dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas/ /sems can byis pa'i spyod yul la ni deng dga' na/ /sems dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin
nam ci/ /'dod pa tha chad 'dam dang mda' mdung dug me 'dra/ /rmi lam lta bu yin te tshwa chu'i ro dang mtshungs/ /'dod pa phung byed rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /
mtha' ngan sprul gyi kha 'dra bdag gis spang bar bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal chen po la gzims pa na/ mtshan mo de nyid la rmi lam lnga rmis pa/ sa chen po
nyid gzims mal du byas shing ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug/ phyag g.yon pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug/ phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por
'jug/ zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang / 'greng pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nas byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang / bya kun nas dkar la
mgo nag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug pa'i bar du lta ba dang / bya sna tshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug
pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i ro'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag pa'o/ /de lta bu rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa/ nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas
ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /grags 'dzin mas kyang rmi lam du mthong ba/ bdag gis so kun lhags pa dang / dung gi dpung pa
chag pa dang / zla bas la lhung ba dang / skar ma rnams ni du ba'o/ /grags 'dzin mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa de byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs
pa| khyod kyi so ni kha nang gnas/ /zla ba 'di ni mkhar gnas kyis/ /yid kyi gdung ba bsal nas ni/ /dogs med bde bar gnyid log cig/ de nas grags 'dzin ma 'di snyam du sems
te| rmi lam 'jigs pa rmis pa na/ /bdag yid dogs dang bcas par 'gyur/ /deng gi mtshan mo sdug pa dang / /'dra la dag tu mi 'gyur grang / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di
snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ji ltar rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen gyis bsgrub par bya dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs
la ltos so snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nags kyi spre'u
ni spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing / /yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra ba'i thugs/ /gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog na/ /de las shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs/ /blo gros bzang
po bzhengs shig bzhengs/ /sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod la/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nas ni/ /'gro ba dag ni bsgral bar mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa ni/ /kau
shi ka ma mthong ngam/ /nga ni ri dwags bdag po rgyas bskor ltar/ /mi ni mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs/ /rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang po yis//
grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongs su bskor/ /zas gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag /glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus/ /mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon
thogs te/ /khyams dang rta babs khang bzang gzhi nang gnas/ /pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang / /de bzhin grong khyer sgo dag kyang / /bcad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste/ /de bzhin
kun nas bsrungs par gyur/ /ru dung pa Ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis/ /khyams dang rta babs khang bzang nang gnas shing / /glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ /rgyun du nga mi
gtang phyir srung bar byed/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ nges pa mar me mdzad kyi lung bstan dang / /sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yab/ /khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas
dgongs mdzod la/ /khab dag spangs te nges par 'byung bar mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par/ /deng nyid nags su gshegs 'gyur ba/ /bdag cag tshangs sogs
bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
gnyid kyis myos par byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/ grogs po/ byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzang nas babs kyi skas long zhig /des skabs
blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' babs pa dang / de nas brgya byin gyis brnga byas ma thag tu zhabs 'bring ba 'dun pa gang na pa der gshegs na ji tsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non
par gzigs nas ni byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslangs nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/ 'dun pa longs kyi khyim nas myur bar ni/ /nga yi rta po rin chen
bsngags ldan long / /sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyod dka' thub tshal/ /thub rnams dgyes pa mdzad par nga gshegs so/ /'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mig phye nas smras pa/ lha khyod skyed
mos tshal gyi dus ma bab/ /dos pa khyod dang 'ga' yang 'khon ma mchis/ /khyod la dgra bo su yang ma mchis na/ /dgung phyed khyod la bcibs pa ci zhig bgyi/ /byang chub sems
dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang / /nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na/ /nga yi deng dus tha ma la/ /nga yi tshig 'di ma gcag cig /'dun pas gsol pa/ gzhon nu/
mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung pa mchis pas bdag bcibs pa mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ lan dang / yang lan gyis gdon mi za bar skye bo
sad par 'gyur gyi/ bdag nyid song la rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam nas/ de nas nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo phye nas rta'i rgyal por bsngags ldan
bzung bar brtsams pa na mjing kyog byed la phar bros tshur bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa 'khor lo
dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba mnga' ba/ skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/ bsngags ldan tha ma yi ni khur long ste/ /
dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol cig/ byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun/ /bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya/ /chos nyid kyis dud 'gro'ang gdams na phyi
lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mi g.yo bar 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te/ rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bstad do/ /ji tsam na shAkya
ming chen 'dram po byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par chas pa mthong ngo / /de nas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas
smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di ci mdzad/ ming chen/ 'gro'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ni rigs pa ma lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ ming chen/ 'di nyid rigs pa yin te/
gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na dang ci khyim na 'dug phod
dam| 'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o/ /gang zhig 'bar ba'i khyim chen las/ /mkhas rnams myur du 'byung ba la/ /legs min smra bar mi 'os kyi/ /de ni bsngags
par 'os nyid yin/ /de bzhin rga nad 'chi ba yis/ /rab 'bar srid pa'i gzeb las ni/ /'byung bar 'dod gyur gang yin la/ /'dir ni mi rigs ci zhig mthong / /de ltar
gsung drag pos spyos pa dang / ming chen gdong las mchi ma char bzhin du 'bab cing chong 'debs pa la zhugs te/ kye hud/ deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang / /shAkya dag ni thams
cad kyis/ /yang dang yang du bsams pa yi/ /re ba 'bras bu med par gyur/ deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni/ /sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pa/ /lag bsgreng bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing //
mi bzang sgra ni 'byin par 'gyur/ /sa mtsho grags 'dzin ri dwags skyes/ /de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa'ang / /don grub dang ni bral ba yis/ /shin tu sdug bsngal myong
bar 'gyur/ /zhes smras nas/ de dngangs pas grags 'dzin ma bslang ste smras pa/ don grub 'di ni shes gyur gyi/ /khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/ /sdug bsngal
nyams thag du ma 'ong / /khyim thab sdug pa de zlog cig /khyed kyi khyim thab gshegs gyur 'di ni mthong dka' ste/ /khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i
tha ma yin/ /kyi hud phongs pa bdag gis mtshan mo khus btab kyang / /sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis ma nyes so/ /des ni de ltar khus btab kyang / /'di ltar lha rnams
byin brlabs kyis/ /dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin/ /'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag gis yab la ma
bltas par 'gro ba ni nga'i tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis non
par gyur to/ /de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te ji ltar nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi phar gyur cing 'jig rten gyi bla ma dang / 'jig rten gyi thu bo yin mod kyi/ de ltar na'ang pha
dang | ma ni skyes bu'i slob dpon du gyur pa dang / lhar gyur pa dang / tshangs par gyur pa yin zhing shin tu phan pa byed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas yang phyi zhabs gnyis la
btud de bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bdag kyang yid la brtser ldan zhing / /bdag kyang nye du rnams la dga'/ /'on kyang 'khor ba rang
bzhin ngan/ /'di mthong nas ni mchi ba lags/ /gal te rga nad 'chi ba dang / /sdug pa'i gnyen bral las byung ba'i/ /gnod byed sdug bsngal ma mchis na/ /khyod ni spong bar su zhig
byed| |gang phyir mi 'dod bzhin du ni/ /rab che gnyen gyi dkyil 'khor dang / /mdza' bshes chung ma dbang phyug rnams/ /yun mi ring bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de bas ma chags
yid kyis ni/ /'khor ba las ni rnam grol phyir/ /brtser ldan nye du spangs nas ni/ /skye bo med nags bsten pa lags/ /lus can 'du ba nges par ni/ /mthar ni 'bral 'gyur nyid
lags pas/ /bdag ni rjes su dgongs nas ni/ /rmongs pas thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ ces gsungs nas chas so/ /de nas ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma bslang ste
smras pa/ don grub 'di ni bzhud lags kyi/ /sa bdag de ni zlog par mdzod/ /sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas/ /sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchi/ /ma stes te
de'ang gnyid ma sad do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu myu gu dang / mang ku ra dang / 'od zer can dang / lo ma gyon pa ste bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dag /khyed
rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' gdeg par nus sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shin tu'ang nus lags so/ /khyed rnams la stobs ci tsam yod/ myu gus smras pa/ bdag
gis ni sa la ri ji snyed yod pa phrag pa gcig tu thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus pa de tsam gyi stobs yod do/ /mang ku ras smras pa/ bdag gis kyang
sa la chu ji snyed yod pa de thams cad phrag pa gcig tu thogs nas 'gro nus so/ /'od zer can gyis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang sa la rdul ji snyed yod pa de thams cad phrag
par thogs te nyam nga ba chung dus 'gro nus so/ /lo ma gyon pas smras pa/ bdag gis kyang sa la rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma ji snyed pa de thams cad phrag pa gcig tu
thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag/ stobs 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gdeg par nus kyi/ de nas myu gu dang /
mang ku ra dang / 'od zer can dang / lo ma gyon pa ste bzhis chibs rin po che bsngags ldan khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/
byang chub sems dpa' ci la bzhugs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'di rnams ni bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' bteg ste/ bar
snang la khyer ro zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de rnams kyis bsgul bar yang ma nus nas ngo
mtshar skyes te gsol pa/ gzhon nu/ bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi bas rin po che
bsngags ldan la bcibs te 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus chibs rin po che bsngags ldan dang / 'dun pa steng
gi nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song
ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste/ g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang spyod lam zhi ba dang / g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams
kyis rgyal mtshan dang / bdan bsgrengs nas lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang / mdun nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo / /nam mkha'i
ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor ro/ /a ga ru'i phye
ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / tam la'i 'dab ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man+dA ra bas kyang gtor to/ /lha'i rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so/ /gos rnams kyang gtor
ro| |'dir smras pa/ mkha' la lha rnams gzha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g.yab mo 'debs byed cing / /kha cig byang chub sems
dpa' la ni bstod byed de/ /nam mkha' la ni rol mo brgya phrag sgyur bar byed/ /kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing / /me tog man+dA ra bas 'thor bar byed/ /kha cig dag ni
bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing / /bde bar gshegs la rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang / /kha cig dag kyang g.yas nas rjes bzhin 'brang / /g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin
'brang / /brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang / /lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par byed/ /zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar/ /bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun
bdar nas/ /dka' thub nags ni thub rnams dgyes byed pa/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsngags ldan la dbugs
dbyung ba'i phyir gsungs pa/ ma skyo ma skyo stobs ni gzung bar bgyis/ /'gro don ngal ba gcig ni de ring long / /mi ring byang chub thob nas 'gro ba rnams/ /bsam gtan rnam
thar gyis tshim byed por bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tshad bcu gnyis su zhugs nas nang bar grong khyer dpe med du byon to/ /de nas lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
byung nas 'di slar yang rang gi grong khyer du 'jug par mi 'gyur ram snyam pa la sku thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan
pa yi| |lam gyi mchog ni ma thob par/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar/ /nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la bskor ba lan gsum
byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /byang chub sems dpas chibs las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa/ rgyan dang / rta khyer la slar song zhig/ 'dir
smras pa/ kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang / /rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin/ /nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su/ /da ltar 'di nyid du ni rab 'byung bya/ /'dod pa 'di ni spu
gri'i so 'dra zhing / /me 'obs 'bar dang mtshungs shing mtha' ngan pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir snying rjes nga spangs te/ /dgon par song nas khyim du phyir mi ldog /de nas mdun pa gdong
pa mchi mchar bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa/ seng ge stag gis gtams pa dang / /phyugs rdzis gtams pa'i nags tshal du/ /'ba' zhig sku gnyen dang
bral bas/ /'phags pa ji ltar spyod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ skye dgu 'di ni skye na gcig pu skye/ /de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gcig
pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi/ /'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/ /'dun pas gsol pa/ kyi hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ma gzigs te/ /zhabs
'jam glang chen rta la chibs goms pa/ /sa gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas gtams rtsub par/ /ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nags su rgyu/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'chi
bdag 'jigs pa de ni lan 'ga' yang / /skyed la med min bde bar goms la min/ /mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin/ /dpa' dang btsun min skye bo dga' la
min| |rga bas 'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag /bskyed nas 'ong bar 'gyur zhes grag /don ma byas shing ma brtsams par/ /'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dun pas
gsol pa/ rgyal po bgres po ni sras kyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs
la ma bab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas ut+pa la sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubs nas byung nas gtsug phud bregs te/ steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang / lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug phud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te gzhon nu ni rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'di bzlog par mi nus so snyam nas dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la gsungs
pa| khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du ma bkri zhig /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / 'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang / yang du
byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing song ste/ ser skya'i gzhir phyin pa dang der ca co skyes te ji tsam na rgyal po zas gtsang ma la smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu byon gyi dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/
grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir yang sgra gsang chen po bsgrags so/ /rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du zhugs pa dang / btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsngags ldan gyi mgul
du 'jus te ngu bar brtsams so/ /bsngags ldan yang dbugs khong du song ste de nyid du dus byas so/ /shi nas de sgra gcan gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigs su nying mtshams
sbyor ba blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis drang srong ngan spong gi bsti gnas su gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe drang srong ngan spong gi bu lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems
khong du chud cing 'dug pa de lta bu de byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po/ ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug/
des gsol pa/ bdag gi bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu chags pa las de rnams snga mkho bzhin du ma
gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po/ gang gi mthus bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan pa de rga ba
dang | na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas so/ /gal te des rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid
byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na skyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin pa zhig /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / drang srong ngan spong gi bus byang chub sems dpa' la
brtag par brtsams so/ /de nas gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba'i cha byad du mthong nas yun ring du brtags te ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol pa/ kye/ rab tu byung ba de khyod kho na ma lags
grang | byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po/ de ltar nges so/ /de nas ngan spong gi bu ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bltas nas byang chub sems dpa' thog
mar gdan la spyan drangs te/ me tog dang / 'bras bu bstabs so/ /grong khyer dpe med na khyim bdag phyug pa dang / nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhes bya ba nas de la khye'u bcu
btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de dag thams cad kyang rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /ji tsam na bdag nyid chen po de rnams la ma rgan mos sha na'i gos
dag cig byin pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum| mkhyen par mdzod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba rga ba dang / na ba dang / shi ba
mthong nas kun tu skyo ba'i yid kyis nags su song nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag cag rnams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gnas par mi nus pas na bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /sha na'i gos 'di zas gtsang ma'i sras la khyod kyis phul cig /bdag nyid chen po de ni
bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud par 'gyur la khyed kyis kyang 'bras bu chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog
'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /rgan mo des kyang 'chi kar gos de dag bu mo la gtad
nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras so/ /de'i bu mo yang nad kyis thebs te 'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de la khyod kyis
'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang gis sras la phul cig ces gsol ba btab bo/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas
das de dag shes nas blangs te/ de nas rngon pa rgas khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te/ lag pa la mda' gzhu thogs nas byang chub sems
dpa' gshegs pa'i lam kar bsdad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyis lam der byon nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos dur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigs
so| |gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa/ kye nang rje/ sha na'i gos 'o ni dag ni rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa yin gyi/ ka shi ka'i ras phran 'di dag khyer la 'o ni dag nga la byin
cig| des gsol pa/ gzhon nu/ bdag la gzhan dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bkrongs nas ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi des/ g.yar
'chi bar 'gyur lags pas bdag 'di dag mi 'bul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ kye nang rje/ nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te/
su zhig gis nga bkrongs par nus/ khyod kyis nga bkrongs par su zhig yid ches kyi bag tsha ba med par byin cig /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems
dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang / sha na'i gos dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang / de
'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o/ /sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas tshig smras ma thag tu sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/
da ni bdag rab tu byung zin gyis 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /
byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang / de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des shing ka ra wa'i ra'i lo ma las lhung bzed byas nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal
po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pa des 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / lta ba dang / rnam par lta
ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i
khab na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa la rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de lta bu ni 'ga' yang med do snyam mo/ /'dir smras pa/ ji ltar mig can 'gro ba
ltar| |rab tu byung ba bsgrags par byas/ /'dis ni brtag par mdzad nas su/ /rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhed/ /khyim gnas 'di ni sdug bsngal te/ /'di ni rdul gyi gnas
yin zhing / /rab tu byung ba bar snang ltar/ /mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung / /rab tu byung nas sku yis ni/ /sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang / /gsung gi sdig pa spangs nas
ni| |'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad/ /de nas ma ga d+ha yi ni/ /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs nas/ /mgon po shes bzhin dran ldan pa/ /bsod snyoms phyir ni
gshegs pa der/ /bzo sbyangs ma ga d+ha yi ba dag /khang bzang 'di na 'dug pas mthong / /mthong nas sems dang de nas ni/ /blon po rnams la 'di skad smras/ /mtshan
mchog gis ni rgyas gyur cing / /kho lag phun sum tshogs pa dang / /gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi/ /'di la she ldan dag ltos shig /spyan mi 'deg la yid gzhungs
shing / /dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs 'di/ /gang du gnas par gshegs 'gyur ba/ /rgyal pos pho nya rjes bzhin btang / /de nas pho nya la bsgo ba/ /dge slong
de ni gar 'gro zhing / /gang du gnas ni btab pa yi/ /rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar bgyi/ /de ni bsod snyoms gshegs pa na/ /sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni/ /shes bzhin
dran dang ldan pa yis/ /lhung bzed myur de gang bar mdzad/ /bsod snyoms spyad pa byas nas kyang / /thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas/ /skya bseng la ni mngon gshegs te/ /de la
gnas ni btab par 'gyur/ /gnas btab pa ni shes nas kyang / /pho nya gcig gis bsdad byas nas/ /gzhan ni myur du slar log ste/ /rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa/ /rgyal po chen
po dge slong de/ /seng ge'am stag gi phru gu dag/ ris sul dag na gnas pa ltar/ /skya bseng gi ni steng na gnas/ /pho nya rnams kyi tshig thos nas/ /sa bdag shing rtar zhugs
nas ni/ /de ni blon pos yongs bskor nas/ /myur ba kho nar dong bar gyur/ /bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sar zhon te/ /de ni bzhon pa la babs nas/ /rkang gis nye bar song nas ni/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / /rgyal po 'dug nas dgyes pa dang / /mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas/ /de ni ma khengs mi brlang bar/ /don 'di dag ni rab smras so/ /
dge slong lang tsho dang po la/ /bab par yang dag gnas gyur cing / /'di 'dra gzi brjid ldan pa la/ /bsod snyoms spyod par mdzes ma lags/ /khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni/ /
bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na/ /nyid kyi gdung ni zhu yi gsungs/ /rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na/ /yul gyi ljongs
ni nor dag dang / /'bru dag gis ni gang gyur pa/ /ko sa la zhes grags pa yod/ /bur ma shing pa nyi ma'i rus/ /shAkya dag ni de na gnas/ /rgyal po nga ni rgyal rigs te/ /nga ni
'dod pa'i don mi gnyer/ /sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas/ /rin chen kun dang ldan pa 'byor gyur kyang / /mi ni nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /so ga tsha dus
shing gi me bzhin no/ /'dod pa rnams ni sha kho na 'brel ces gsungs/ /mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'dam rdza ba 'dra/ /sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi/ /rtswa ba'i
gtso ste blo ngan rnams kyis bsten/ /rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang / /'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na/ /'jigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag /bor ba de ko
slar yang ci ltar blang / /rtsed mo sna tshogs yangs par gyur pa yi/ /lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi/ /nga yi blo ni thar pa la rten pa/ /'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod
par mi nus so/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas/ /'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyam pa la/ /mi dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas/ /'jigs pa che
las de ni thar bar bya/ /'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba gzigs/ /spang phyir gang du nga yi yid/ /dga' ba dag tu 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal po gzugs
can snying pos gsol ba/ kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ /des gsungs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /rgyal pos gsol
pa| kye rab tu byung ba gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la'ang dgongs shig/ byang chub
sems dpas gsungs pa/ de bzhin du bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas
der gshegs so/ /de nas spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te/ de rnams gang gi tshe rkang pa gcig gis nyin thun gcig 'greng ba de'i tshe byang chub sems
dpa' thun gnyis su bzhugs so/ /gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor bas nyin thun gcig 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyis su bzhugs
so| |de nas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas dge sbyong 'di ni chen po zhig go /zhes smras pa/ dge sbyong chen po/ dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas
de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed bzhugs pa 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ de na kha cig gis gsol pa/ brgya byin nyid do/ /kha cig gis gsol pa/
bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do/ /kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag ni bdud nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ drang srong 'di dag ni slar yang ltung ba lam log par
zhugs pa'o/ /lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par nus pa ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpas lam de nyid nus pa med par mkhyen nas/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces
gsungs so/ /ring 'phur/ gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ bdag la mi bde ba med kyi ci
bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ ring 'phur khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rang gi mngon par shes pas rtogs par gyur /des gsol pa|
tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dad pa de la ni nga yang
dad la/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ltar bdag la'ang brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
dang | shes rab yod pas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de snyed mngon sum du byas te/ ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon
sum du mi bya snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon sum du ma byas
pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir dang / gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/ gcig pu bden pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag
nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/ /chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas yang sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gang
na ba der gshegs te byon nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ring 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi
mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas sam/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ mad de/ bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag
mngon sum du byas so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ring 'phur/ bdag gis kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag rang gi
mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ de ltar na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi'ang de tsam la/ bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di
la'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thos kyi tshur spyon/ 'o skol gnyis kas 'khor 'di yongs su drang par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur byang chub sems
dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/ /de'i rtogs pa dag la'ang dga' ba dang / mgu bar gyur
to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong par nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang
chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa med par rig nas/ rang byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rangs
byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /lhag spyod/ gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /des gsol pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gau
ta ma| bdag la mi bde ba med kyi khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig /khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
mched kyi bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang dad la/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod brtson 'grus dang /
dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni bdag la yod na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du shes
med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du byas nas bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag ci'i phyir mngon sum du mi bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa/
bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/ gcig pu dben par bag yod par bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de mngon
sum du mdzad par gyur to/ /chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs
so| |lhag spyod/ khyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas sam/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/
mad lags te/ bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag mngon sum du bgyis so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa lhag spyod/ bdag gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ de ltar na khyod kyi
ji tsam pa bdag gi'ang de tsam la/ bdag gi ci tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thos kyi tshur spyon/ 'o skol gnyis
kas tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa dam pas
rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/ /de'i shes pa rnams la yang dga' ba dang / mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di
ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong par nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpas lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegs so/ /de nas rgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyi 'khor gsum dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi 'khor gnyis te drang srong lnga
byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga po dang lhan cig gang+gA'i lho phyogs na lteng rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong rdal ga na ba der rgyu zhing
gshegs te byon nas de phan tshun 'chag pa na phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/ nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ chu klung nai rany+dza nA bsil bar 'bab pa/ gse gu can 'jug ngogs
bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang / shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye
ma'o| |sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ chu klung nai rany+dza nA bsil bar 'bab pa/ gse gu can 'jug dogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing
ma sngon po dang / shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/ kye ma spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nus
so| |bdag spong ba don du gnyer ba yin pas/ ma la bdag gis kyang nags khrod 'dir rten la spang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing
gi drung du bzhugs nas/ tshems la tshems gtad/ ljags rkan la bcar nas/ thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsngams/ shin tu mngon
du bsngams so/ /de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsngams/ shin tu mngon du bsdams pas/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur te/ dper na/
mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phyi nag log tu bcings/ mngon du bsngams/ shin tu mngon du bsngams na de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul
byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshems la tshems gtad/ ljags rkan la bcar te/ thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsngams/ shin tu
mngon du bsngams pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la
snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag
la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba 'gags pa
dang | rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du song nas de'i dbu la dbu'i tsher ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na/ mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung pa'i spyi bor lcags
kyi phur pa rnon po btab na/ de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa
na| dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa
nye bar bzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad pa rtsub pa ba tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta
bu nyams su myong ba'ang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par
bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam
bar bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa
dang | 'byung ba 'gags pas rlung thams cad snyan gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyus par gyur to/ /dper na/ mgar bas sbud pa bus na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun gra
gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ rlung thams cad kyi rgyun snyan gnyis kyi bu ga
nas rgyus par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs
te| ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la
snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba bgags
so| |de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur te/ dper na/ mgar ba mkhas
pa'i spud pa bus na gang bar gyur/ shin tu gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa
na phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i
bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang /
'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags pa dang / de'i tshe dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na/ mi stobs
dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i mgo phreng bas yang nas yang du bcings na/ de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems
dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa
yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par
'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam
gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags pa
dang | de'i tshe khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na/ ba lang gi bshan pa mkhas pa'am/ ba lang gi bshan pa'i slob ma mkhas pas ba lang bsad pa'i
gri rnon pos ba lang gi lto dral na de'i khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi zad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms
par zhugs pa na khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bsam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de lhag
par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bsam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang /
shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba ba gags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags pa de'i tshe sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes
so| |dper na/ mi shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phyin log du bzung ste me dong gi nang du dpyangs na/ de'i lus la lus kyi gdung ba shin
tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang
de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis thams
cad kyi thams cad du zas mi bza' ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha rab tu mang po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na bder
dong ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ gal te khyod mi'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzad/ ngo tsha bar mdzad/ smon par mdzad na/ bdag
cag gis khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas lha'i mdangs bsgrub par bgyi'i khyod kyis bdag gir mdzod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/
gal te bdag gis mi'i kha zas mi bza' bar dam bcas la bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha rnams kyis lha'i mdangs bsgrubs nas da
bdag gir byed pa ni bdag gi rdzun yin la/ bdag gi rdzun gang yin pa de ni bdag gi log pa yin no/ /bdag gi log pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis na 'di na sems can kha
cig lus zhig ste shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes par 'gyur gyi/ mal bdag gis lha rnams kyi tshig ni thams cad kyi
thams cad du spangs la/ kha zas nyung ba dang / cung zad chang chung bza' ba'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u yi khu ba'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/ yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras
bu'i khu ba btung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe lha rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs nas zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung
zad dang / chang chung gsol ba'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u yi khu ba'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/ yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsol lo/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kun tu zhum ste/ skam zhing
sku dbal chung bar gyur to/ /dper na/ ldum bu i si ta'i sdong bu dang / ka li ka'i sdong bu 'jum/ kun tu 'jum pas sha chung zhing bskams par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub
sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad zhum/ kun tu zhum ste/ skem zhing sku dbal chung bar
gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dag chang chung gsol ba na/ dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyings/ kun tu rnyings te/ 'khums
shing 'bar 'bur du gyur to/ /dper na/ ku ba rtsa ba nas bcad na rnyis/ kun tu rnyis pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung
ba dang | chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyis/ kun tu rnyes te/ 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin te/ brtson
'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang /
chang chung gsol ba na/ spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song zhing shin tu phug tu song ste zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang ngo / /dper na/ khron
pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug tu song zhing shin tu phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bar gtam du bya ba de bzhin du de'i tshe
byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song / shin tu phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin
tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ de'i tshe rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can du gyur te/ dper na/ rtswa khang lo gnyis sam/ gsum lon pa'i
phyam dgu po mtho dman du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can
du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba
dang | cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ sgal pa'i tshigs 'di lta ste/ skra'i lan bu lta bur gyur to/ /mjug do ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bur
gyur to/ /de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na kha sbub tu 'gyel la/ lan 'ga' 'dug par 'dod na gan rkyal du 'gyel lo/ /de ro stod la brten nas ro smad 'jog
par byed/ ro smad la brten nas ro stod 'jog par byed do/ /de phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs te/ de'i phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs/ yongs su byugs pa de'i
tshe ba spu rnams drung rul bas sa la lhags par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ bdag gis til 'bru gcig gis
zas bza' bar bya'o zhes te des til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol to/ /de til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol ba na yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad
zhum kun du zhum ste skem zhing sku dbal chung bar gyur to/ /til 'bru gcig gis ji lta bar 'bras bu gcig dang / sran go la 'bru gcig dang / rgya
sran 'bru gcig dang / mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang / mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig dang / rtsa'i gding ba la mnal bar mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas
gtsang gis dka' ba la spyod pa'i gnas skabs de thos nas nyi ma re re zhing rtog pa nyis brgya lnga bcu gtong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis
kyang nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /de dag nyi ma re re zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gtam skyel bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di 'dra ba'i dka' ba
spyod de/ /til 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru gcig dang / sran gol 'bru gcig dang / rgya sran 'bru gcig dang / mon sren gre'u 'bru gcig dang / mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi
zas gsol zhing rtswa'i gding ba la mnal to zhes smra'o/ /de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyis non pas lhag par dang kan zhing mig mchims pa rnams te gdungs
nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par rtswa'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do/ /grags 'dzin mas kyang de thos pa dang / khyim thab kyi mya ngan gyis mnon to/ /til 'bru gcig za ba
dang | de'i rum mi bde ba de nyid du zhu bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di'ang shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis kha zas shin tu ngan
pa bza' bar bya'o snyam ste des kha zas shin tu ngan pa gsol bar mdzad do/ /de la zas phal pa ni 'di yin te/ be'u byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de
rnams kyi gcin dang / lci ba yin no/ /de ji srid de'i sku las mdangs de yal bar ma gyur pa de srid du zas gnyis pa mi gsol to/ /yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar mdzad do/ /dur khrod
chen por gshegs nas kyang mi ro dbu rten du bcug/ zhabs la zhabs bzhag ste/ snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes yid la mdzad pas glo
g.yas bas mnal bar mdzad do/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams dang / grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma rnams lhags nas shing bus de'i snyan gnyis kyi bu gar 'dzugs par byed/ rna
ba gnyis ka nas 'dren par byed cing 'di skad ces/ kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za ba la ltos/ kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za ba la ltos zhes smra bar yang byed do/ /de'i tshe phyag dar dang / bong
rdog dang / gseg mas kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams sam/ grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma de rnams la ngan sems skyed pa'am/
sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub chen po la dka' ba spyod pas na/ dge sbyong chen po/ dge sbyong chen po zhes mtshan du gyur te/ de ltar la
drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad par mdzad do/ /de nas lha gsum zhig byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der lhags te/ de nas lha gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ dge sbyong gau ta
ma ni nag po zhig go /gnyis pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ni nag po ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sngo bsangs zhig go /gsum pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di
ni nag po'ang ma yin/ /sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi dmar smug zhig go /byang chub sems dpa'i sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur to/ /de
nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig gnas pa 'di lta ste/ shing rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste/ nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang / de
nas mi me don du gnyer ba/ me tshol ba zhig 'dir 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te/ gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir
me 'byung ba dang / 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang / sems kyis thag srid bar mi gnas kyi de rnams kyi 'dod pa
la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa
de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te/ gnas pa ma yin pas lus dang / sems kyi thag sring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi ni de dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams bdag nyid
gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba dang po yin no/ /dper na/ shing
rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang / de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de la des gtsub stan byas te gtsub shing gzhag nas
gtsubs nas 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang / 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus kyis spong bar gnas
kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyis 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /
'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa yin no/ /de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid
du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de rnams shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub
par nus pa ma yin te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gnyis pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shing skam khong stong
chu med pa zhig chu dang / thag ring por skam la bzhag pa dang / de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de de gtsub stan byas te/ gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs
na yang 'di ltar shing de skam zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang / 'bar du btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang / sems kyis thag
sring bar gnas pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa la
'chums pa dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te de mi gnas pa yin no/ /de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug
bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus/ mthong bar nus/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs par byang chub par nus te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gsum pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
du dgongs te/ gang su dag sdug bsngal spong bar brtson par gnas pa de thams cad ni 'di tsam du zad de/ de las lhag pa'ang med/ de'i gong na lam 'di'ang shes par nus pa ma yin/
mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te shes par nus pa dang / mthong
bar nus pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag yab shAkya zas gtsang gi khyim na gnas
pa'i tshe zhing las kyi mtha'i drung du song nas shing dzam+bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste 'dod pa las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas
shing dben pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub ste gnas pa de mngon par dran te/ de ni lam yin/ de ni bsgrub pa yin/ shes par nus pa
yin| mthong bar nus pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa yin na/ de la bdag gis bskyed du yang 'di ltar rid cing nyams chung la zhan pas
sla ba ma yin te/ ma la bdag gis ci bder dbugs rdub pa dang / ci bder dbugs dbyung ba dang / ci bder 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi kha zas rags pa bza' zhing lus
mar sar dang / til mar gyis byugs la chu 'jam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste/ de ci bder dbugs rdub pa dang / ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /
ci bder 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing sku til mar dang / mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad do/ /de nas rim gro pa de
rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni sdom pa lhod pa/ bya ba mang ba/ mang pos 'tsho ba/ spong ba nyams par gyur pa yin te/ 'di da ltar
'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi kha zas mang du za la lus zhun mar dang / til mar gyi byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed de/ 'dis da ni cung zad kyang thob par mi nus so
snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' bor te dong ba las/ rim gyis wA ra NA sir phyin nas drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa'i rim gyis lus kyi stobs dang / mthu dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas rim gyis sde can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /de ni grong khyer sde can zhes bya
ba na nai rany+dza nA'i chu bo'i 'gram na bzhugs pa dang / bram ze lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi grogs bshes su gyur pa de sde can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa dang /
des byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas/ grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
sras mtshan mkhan gyis gal te rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de thos sam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag
rnams kyis kyang gal te de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag cag de'i btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab lags so/ /bram ze lhas smras pa/ bdag nyid
chen po de ni dka' thub kyis lus gdungs pas spong ba las bzhengs na khyed gnyis kyis de la thog ma kho nar bsod snyoms phul cig dang / de khyed cag gnyis kyi yun ring
po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas thos pa dang / ba stong pa zhes so/ /bzhos nas kyang ba lnga brgya la blud do/ /ba lnga
brgya bzhos nas nyis brgya lnga bcu la blud do/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu bzhos nas kyang brgya la blud do/ /brgya bzhos nas lnga bcu la blud do/ /lnga bcu bzhos nas nyi shu la blud do/ /
nyi shu bzhos te ma spar nas shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du blugs nas 'o thug bskol bar brtsams pa na/ bram ze rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'dir nges par bag ma len
tam| bag ma gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas bram ze mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang / 'o thug stong du bsgres pa bskol ba na bum pa bzang po dang / dpal
be'u dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dag byung ba snang ba dang / kun tu rgyu nye 'gro zhes bya bas mthong nas bsams pa/ 'o ma'i thug pa 'di sus 'thungs pa des ni
bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis bslang ngo snyam mo/ /de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni dka' thub kyis
sku lus nyam chung zhing sku la sbrebs pa dang / skyems pas nyen pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' 'o thug gsol na bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud par 'gyur
na| bram ze 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis brkam pa dag 'dir 'dus par gyur pas gal te byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ ri spos kyi ngad
ldang nas lha'i sman blangs te/ de shin tu gzugs bzang ba'i bram ze zhig tu mngon par sprul nas 'o thug de skol ba'i steng du 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis der
sman mthu ba skyed pa zhes bya ba blugs so/ /de nas dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa bskol nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /khyod nyid rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras de yin nam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni nga'i mkhan po yin te/ nga ni de'i slob ma yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
gyis 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa blangs so/ /blangs nas kyang dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa/ sbyin pa 'dis khyed gnyis ci zhig don du gnyer/
gang gi don du yon bsngo bar bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gsol ba phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pas/ /grags dang ldan pa don rnams kun grub pa/ /mi yi mchog gyur blo
mchog ldan pa de'i/ /don kun myur du shin tu grub gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza nA ra zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de/ rgal bar bzhed pa dang / sku
nyam chung ba nyid kyis rgal bar ma spyod pa na lha rnams kyis a rdzu na'i yal ga btud pa dang / de la 'jus nas byang chub sems dpa' rgal bar mdzad de chos gos mnabs nas
chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar bzhugs par rig nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres
ba yol gor blugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' la bstabs so/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang gsol nas yon bsngo bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza
na'i 'gram na phan tshun du bzhugs pa'i sa btsal ba dang / ci tsam na ri brag chen po me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig gzigs nas de de la
'dzegs te phyogs dben zhing gsal ba'i phyogs su skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /bzhugs ma thag tu ri de nyid du rnyil to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs
te| 'dir rgyu ci zhig yod na ri rnyil bar gyur/ ci nga 'od ba la lha rnams mngon par mi dga'am/ 'on te bgegs 'ga' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /lha rnams kyis byang
chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad kyis gzung bar rngo mi thog pa ni gnyis te/ dge ba'i rtse ba chad pa gang lags pa dang / dge
ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa gang lags pa ste/ khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas ma lags te/ 'on kyang mdun du bzhud cig
dang | de na rdo rje'i gdan mchis te/ der ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par
gyur cing thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltas lam bstan pa bzhin gshegs pa na de'i zhabs bzhag sar pad+ma dag byung bar gyur to/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi
las kyang chu bab nas pad+ma'i rdzing dag byung bar gyur to/ /gom pa bor nas mnan pa nas chen po 'di 'khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'byin par brtsams so/ /bya tsa sha dang / ri dwags dag
gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la skor ba byed do/ /rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang dal bu dal bus rlung gtong bar byed do/ /char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang
char pa cung zad 'babs par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga la 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan ma bzang po byung bar gyur pas deng nyid bdag gis bla na med
pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na klu'i rgyal po dus can zhes bya ba long ba zhig gnas te/ der de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i
gnas zhig byung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas byung ba na mig thob par 'gyur la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na slar long par 'gyur ro/ /de sa'i sgra grags pas gnas nas
byung ba dang / rgyang ring po kho na nas byang chub sems dpa' sku skyes bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan la/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ 'od 'dom gang
gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer dang / rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad
pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par brtsams pa/ dga' ba'i dbyangs kyis kun gang ba'i/ /sa yi sgra ni thos nas kyang / /klu yi gnas nas byung nas su/ /phyogs
