gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang / yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do/ /
tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chud ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das/ byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan
'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs
gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan
yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam
gleng ba gang yin pa/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon
mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi
tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na/ gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon
rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sdug
bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang /
chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas
bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag ni 'phags so/ /bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
lags kyi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /btsun pa/ de'i slad du 'dir
zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags
pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang / gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim
par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i
phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du
'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i
gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs
so| |wA ra NA si na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi ba dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste/ rigs
kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags ba skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos
so| |thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar gyi rigs kyi gtso
po'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'ang skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par
rab tu byung gi /ma la/ bdag cag gis kyang skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /
de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams wA ra NA
si nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu
'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri ma med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge
slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig bu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag
nyid gtod par gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gdod par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur
smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe 'di nyid la rang
gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar
byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni
bcom ldan 'das so/ /wA ra NA si na grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang bo dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags
pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim
nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bstan pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma
yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag
dang | lag bzang ste rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'ang skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
nas khyim med par rab tu byung gi /ma la/ bdag cag kyang skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas
grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag wA ra NA si nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par
bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan
pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang
gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra
bcom pa drug cu dang / drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga ni lha dang / mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyang lha dang / mi rnams
kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyi/ dge slong dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi
rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis shig ni gcig tu ma 'gro zhig /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /
de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags su 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos
ston te/ dge slong dag /nga ni lha dang / mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyang lha dang / mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba

yin gyi/ dge slong dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng zhig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer
gyi| ma la bdag gis de la/ 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sbrul
te| bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na/ /ji ltar bdag
nyid grol bar sems/ /bdag nyid dge sbyong ma bkrol bas/ /'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig
can yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /'ching ba gang yin
kun las grol/ /bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par/ /sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis
bdag shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su'ang dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed
kyang lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyi/ dge slong dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu zhing deng zhig ces bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las nyid
mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
te| rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer sde can du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig
gi drung du brten te nyin bar gyi gnas pas bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol tu nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/
dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras
bal gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der dong ba dang / drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul
ba| zhi ba dang / dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na
ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ga bud med gcig gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag /bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong /
btsun pa/ 'di na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol tu bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyis/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod
par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol
lags so/ /gzhon nu dag /ji snyam du sems/ bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba gang 'dam/ btsun pa/ bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyis/ bdag cag
ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lags so/ /gzhon nu dag /de'i phyir 'dug cig dang khyed la chos bshad do/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i
tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi po| 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba
dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan
gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /
chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs
su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed
dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas
grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar
chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis ba sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dir mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas
so snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom
ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshur spyon/ bcom ldan
'das| byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan
bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba
nas/ mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /btsun pa/ de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas
gnang ngo / /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas
gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bdag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi
lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang
dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde
can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas yul ma ga d+ha 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs
chung dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod
pa de ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza nI'i chu klung gi
'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs
pa 'di ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du
bya ste| 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas ga na ba der
gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces
kyang gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ tshur spyon/ dge sbyong chen po/ byon pa legs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ yun ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen
po| gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang /
bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang du nga zhag gcig
cig 'dug go /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na/ 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod la mtho ba tsams par gyur du mchi'o/ /'od srung / khyod kyis re zhig
gnang bar gyis shig dang mtho btsams par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gal te khyod la mtho mi 'tsham na/ dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde kho nar bzhugs shig /de nas bcom ldan
'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams
nas sku drang por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
khros pa'i mthus dud pa byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo / /klu gdug pas khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i
khams la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar
te| me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams gcad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig
tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma 'di ltar mdzes par klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma
gyur grang / kye hud nyon mongs/ bdag gi tshig mnyan to snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas
phyas spyad kyi/ ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi
byed cing de dul bar byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji
lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/
de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring
po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gson pa lta zhig /'od srung / gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod kyi lhung
bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/ 'od srung / klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur ba rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de/ ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug
nas khyer te 'ongs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag cag kyang
dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti
gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste/ me thab stong lnga brgya yod de/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod
na me spar bar ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song sti phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs te spar bar rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me
la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/ me de spar bar rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam
bgyid do/ /'od srung / me spar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po/ spar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me
de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi
bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me gsad par 'dod na gsad par ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams
lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag
zhugs la yongs su spyad pa nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong chen
po bdag gi nye 'khro na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i
rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung / me de bsad dam/ dge sbyong
chen po/ dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang dus gzhan
zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na spar bar ma nus so zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma
bzhin no/ /de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas gsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig
na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de
la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgribs kyang gdab par ma nus so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ dge sbyong chen po/ 'dir bdag gi me khang
thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang / skye bo'i tshogs chen
pos bsgribs na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam
bgyid do/ /'od srung / me de zhi bar bya'am/ dge sbyong chen po/ zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus

me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang
dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags
bsam tshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams/ dper na/ me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar
kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po 'ang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i
spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi yod do snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang bar sngar
langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu
skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong
nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po 'ang me la yongs su spyod do/ /'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu
'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung / ci nga me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nas nyon
mongs las/ /sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyi/ /me'am yang na chu dag la/ /yongs bsten yon tan ci zhig yod/ /de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha
dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhag nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams/ dper na/ me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu
'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi po lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na/
me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag pas ches lhag cing ches 'phag pa ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyog gcig tu
'dug go /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul
che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags
bas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na/ me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga
ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/ me'i phung po chen po lnga po de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches
bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po
'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas
'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal
te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyi/
kye ma| dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas
zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do/ /de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang / bca' bar rab tu mang po dang ldan/
skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/ zhag bdun po
'di la bdag la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyi/ kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po
'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de'ang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas
lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ byon tam/ 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas bzhud lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas
na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no bar shes na
de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung
snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo / /'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod
sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i
tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyi/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ dge
sbyong chen po/ de lta lags so/ /nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/ /dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde ba kho nar longs spyad du
gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs
shig dang / bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lteng
rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ 'od srung / de'i phyir song zhig nga'ang
'ong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang

gis dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba
der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas
'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ byon tam /
'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song na sring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing

dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs kyi/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig /dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge
sbyong chen po/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /shing dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa de dang / ha
cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang / bil pa'i nags dang / ka bid tha'i nags dang / skyu ru ra'i nags kyang de bzhin no/ /byang gi sgra
mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te
byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas
kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ byon tam/ 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod kyi lhung
bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma
btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyi gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig /dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde
ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag
kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya
ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu bab pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni
med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas byung snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di
sngon ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung / 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na nga
chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas nga gang na ba der
'ongs te phyin nas nga'i mdun du lag pas sa la bsnun pa las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /'od srung / rdzing 'di na lag pas brkos
pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang
dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem red du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag
pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung
bar bzhed pa na shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo / /de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gzung nas rdzing lag
pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo / /
mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag
pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma
gyar na da su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung / 'dir phye ma red nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gang na ba der gshegs te
byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa
nas byung bar 'dod pas shing ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dud par gyur te/ de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag
pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /'od srung / 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu
'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod
pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ de'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams
kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo
leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring bdag gcig
mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam
bgyid do/ /'od srung / 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so/ /de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam pa dang /
de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /nga 'di snyam
du dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i
dgongs pa shes nas brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod
pa'i sha na'i ras dgram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/ /'od srung / rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes
bya'o| |de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher brub nas bab bo/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i lteng na rdul gyis yog pa bla ga ba med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brub pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la/ bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams
nas| shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng
nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gson nam/ 'od srung
gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po/ zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srung / 'jug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ ngas ji ltar thugs
mnyam par gzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji ltar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam
par bzhag nas shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug par de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung ral pa can/ khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon
sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de'ang mi shes so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can 'di snyam du
sems te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag legs par
gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la ltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po/ ma ltas lags so/ /'od srung / de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa
shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la
smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /shes par gyis shig /bram ze'i khye'u dag /kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs pa spyod pa spyad na/ shes ldan dag /ci byed/ mkhan po/
bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag
kyang mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dang / /khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dag shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs

gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du 'or cig /mkhan po/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang /
blugs gzar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
mkhan po/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bdag cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dan bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung / tshur shog /
tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung
ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis brgya lnga bcu dang / chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i mjug gi
'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun gyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril pa spyi blugs dang /
blugs gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nas khyer ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/ chom
rkun nam/ me'am/ chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la/ bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo/ /de nas chu klung
'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan
pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang /
ga yA 'od srung gis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe
dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'od srung / 'di mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag /'di ni mchog yin te/ de ni ma yin no/ /
de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang
gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ brjed par
byas| mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyi/ ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong
chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i
chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /
khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po/ ma bltas lags so/ /'od srung dag /de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/
shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong
ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag/ shes par gyis shig /kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ shes
ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag /bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan
sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dag /de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig /de
nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung dag /tshur shog/
tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga yA gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu
zhing gshegs pa na ga yAr byon nas/ ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i
cho 'phrul lo/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang
bar gyur cing shar phyogs gyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang /
mnal bar mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer
rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha
dog go /cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar
bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub
dang | byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi
dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho
'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag /khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o/ /khyod kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o/ /'di ni rtog cig /'di ni ma rtog cig /'di
ni yid la byos shig /'di ni yid la ma byed cig /'di ni spongs shig /'di ni ma spangs shig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te mnos shig /'di ni bcom ldan
'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag /'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ /dge slong
dag |thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag /mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing /
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang kun tu 'bar ba
yin no/ /dge slong dag /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / /
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang kun tu 'bar ba yin
no| |gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
smra sngags 'dren pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o/ /de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su
bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa
rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can gyur pa'i dge slong stong po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal
ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te khyim
na gnas na ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna
bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang /
khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po chen yin no/ /de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/
pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par bdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang
mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab
tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba lung bstan to zhes thos so/ /thos
nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha|mkhyen
par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /lha| de khum zhig /lha ches gtso bo bas
ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o/ /grong ba dag /shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong
ma bzhin te/ lha| de khum zhig /lha ches gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong pa dag /shAkya rnams kyi gzhon
nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du te/ gal te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o/ /gal te skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad
pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra
rnam par grags par gyur na de'i nyan thos su khas blangs bar bya'o/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas smon
pa'i gzhi lnga la smon par byed de/ kye ma'o/ /bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs
su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang / de
la'ang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes
nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ma
ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon pa byed de/ kye ma'o/ bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag
cig ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin
pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de skra dang / kha spu
bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pas de ga yA na/ ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad
pa| bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo
sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha|mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes
bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de lba na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de ga yA na ga ya'i mchod rten la sngon thams
cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs
gcig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha| de dag la bkur sti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'e nang rje/ tshur/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas/ kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
byos la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang
gsol cig /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi
rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig /lha|bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po
bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu
'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos
phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes bya ba nas/ reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste snyun gsol lags so//
kye| mi khyod dang / ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas/ 'di skad ces
bdag /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad
kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la cang
mi gsungs pas gnang ngo / /de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs gcig tu ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yul ma
ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa ga na ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams
kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur
ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
na| ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal
yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos rta dang / shing rta brgya stong snyed dang lhan
cig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i
'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/
khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gi de dag thon cig /rgyal pos
smras pa/ gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcug go /yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go /de nas yang bsams pa/
bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/ /lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po
chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus kyang kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba
dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig /rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang bkug go /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri
nyis stong dang / zhabs 'bring pa rta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas
kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ji tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang / gdugs
dang | ral gri dang / nor bu'i rnga yab dang / lham khra bo rnams phud do/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das
ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum du gsol pa/
btsun pa/ bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/ /rgyal po/ lags so/ /rgyal
po| de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying
po yin no/ /rgyal po yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
do| |kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do/ /kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong
nas cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i
bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci/ dge sbyong chen po/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung
ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thug kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas
tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/ lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/ /me spangs nas ni brtul shugs
'di dag spyod/ /khyod kyis ji ltar me yi mchod spangs pa/ /don de 'od srung nga la smra bar gyis/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/ 'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin no/ /'dod
pa dag dang bud med kho na smra/ /de dag phung po'i dri mar rab mthong ste/ /des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min/ /khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang / /de bzhin ro
la yid ni mi dga' na/ /lha mi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid/ /dga' ba yin nam 'od srung dri yi smros/ /phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis/ /'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma
mchis/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri'i go 'phang mchog mthong ste/ /des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min/ /go 'phang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas/ /mchod sbyin brtul
zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis/ /grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/ /dmus long gyur nas skye shi'i rjes bzhin mthong / /skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa/ /go
'phang 'dus ma byas te gzod mthong na/ /thub pa gau tam rnam par 'dren khyod ni/ /skye bo'i phal chen don brtson bden la zhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis
rtogs pa legs rtogs te/ /khyod kyis nyes par bsams ma yin/ /rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams las/ /gtso bo gang yin de blangs so/ /'od srung / 'khor skyo ba skyed cig /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi lteng gi bar snang
la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon
par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston
pa lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ /'od srung / de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'od srung / nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/ /khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin
no| |'od srung / nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/ /khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung / khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po
ni lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid ni dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod do snyam mo/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gzugs la skye ba'ang yod/ 'jig pa'ang yod/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'ang
rig par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba'ang yod/ 'jig pa'ang yod/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'ang rig par bya'o//
rgyal po chen po/ yang rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas gzugs de yongs su shes so/ /rgyal po chen po/ rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas rnam par shes pa yongs su shes so/ /rgyal po chen po/ rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na
gzugs la bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes na bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ rigs
kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed na tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin
no zhes smra'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ rigs kyis bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/
mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed na tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag
rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/ 'o na/ bdag gam/ sems
can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po'am/ gso ba po'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu'am/ byed pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa po'am/ shes pa po'am/ kun
nas shes pa po'am/ slong ba po'am/ kun nas slong ba po'am/ smra ba po'am/ kun nas smra ba po'am/ tshor ba po'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung / 'byung
bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa gang gis de dang / der bde ba dang / sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor
te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems
mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes su ltung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag
ce'am/ bdag gi med kyi/ dge slong dag /skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na'ang sdug bsngal 'di 'gag go /skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa na'ang 'du byed rnams 'gag
par 'gyur te/ rgyu dang / rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su
chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag /ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa'i mi las 'das pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho
zhes bya ba nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen to zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag /ngas de ltar mkhyen
cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam/ sems can nam/ zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gang nam yang ma byung / 'byung bar mi
'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas gang gis de dang / der sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan
dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsungs so/ /de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/
'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i
rkyen gyis ming dang / gzugs/ ming dang / gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred
pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid
mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di med pas 'di med la 'di
'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags
pas ming dang / gzugs 'gag /ming dang / gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gags /
tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'gags te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag
par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/ /rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal
'gag ste/ rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /dge slong dag /de la yongs su mya ngan las
'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/ de ni bsil bar gyur pa/ de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong dag /zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di yin
te| 'di lta ste/ phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga
d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam/ mi rtag /btsun pa/ 'di mi rtag lags
so| |mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/ /mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur
ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de dag 'di ni bdag yin no/ /bdag ni 'di yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu
khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa/ ma lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag gam/ mi rtag
btsun pa/ 'di ni mi rtags lags so/ /mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ btsun pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/ /mi rtag pa sdug bsngal
bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/ /bdag ni 'di yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu
khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa/ ma lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na khyod kyi gzugs gang ci'ang rung / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/
nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ ngan pa'am/ gya nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/ /bdag ni 'di ma yin
no| |'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang | 'du byed gang ci'ang rung ba dang / rnam par shes pa gang ci'ang rung ba 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi'i'am/ rags pa'am/ phra
ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ gya nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/ /bdag ni 'di ma yin no/ /'di ni
bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba
ni gzugs la'ang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yid byung na 'dod chags
dang 'bral lo/ /'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di
las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang / lha
brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /
de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las
brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan
