gdugs byas nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis dpag tu med pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ bzod pas dpag tu med pa/ brtson 'grus kyis dpag tu med pa/
bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa/ shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa/ byams pas dpag tu med pa/ snying rjes dpag tu med pa/ dga' bas dpag tu med pa/ btang snyoms
kyis dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma 'dres pa
gsum dang / snying rje chen pos dpag tu med pa ste/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med pa
dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya bar zungs shig /de bas na chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
mkhan po ji na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga ta pra ti
bim+ba pra tiSh+Tha a nu shaM sa sam+ba dan+ti nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod
pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig rim gro'i gnas su lhags te 'dug nas bar
skabs der gtam 'di lta bu zhig glengs so/ /khyed cag la bram ze'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bya zhes tshol ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid par spro ba skyed pa dag snang la de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du lhags na/ btsun pa dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan
bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig
yod pa bdag cag gis mi shes te/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang mthun par lan gdab par bya/ gang don 'di dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la
bdag cag gis zhu'o/ /'on tang bcom ldan 'das da bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya
cher bye ste lan gdang par bya'o zhes bgros so/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa| bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rim gro'i gnas der lhags te 'dus pa dang / bar der bka' mchad 'di lta bu zhig glengs te/ khyed cag la bram ze'am/
khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bgyi zhes tshol ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi bar spro ba skyes pa dag gda'
la| de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du mchis nas/ btsun pa dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig
mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis pa bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na/ de'i tshe de dag
la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang mthun par lan gdab par bgyi/ gang don de dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu bar bgyi'o/ /'on tang bcom
ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher bye ste lan gdab par bgyi'o snyam
bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ don de dag nyid bdag cag zhu zhing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i

gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par gyi/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams
la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de nyid zhu bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /
dge slong dag /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin
pa po la phan yon 'di lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ gzhal med khang chen por gnas pa dang / bong steng bzang por grags pa dang / spro ba mang ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / grags pa
dad ldan pa dang / bde ba mang ba ste/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /gzhan yang / phyug
po dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / nor rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba dang / bdag dbang ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang / nor dang / 'bru

dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs mang ba dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / lug dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba
dang / blon po dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang por 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang
zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang / gzugs bzang po dang / blta na sdug pa dang / mdzes pa dang / mdog gser ltar bzang ba dang /
mgo gdugs ltar zlum pa dang / lag pa ring ba dang / dpral ba dbyes che ba dang / smin mtshams bar ma chad pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan
pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon
gsum pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor bzang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang / bu stong gis bskor bar 'gyur te/
de'i bu'am/ chung ma'am/ bran nam/ nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de la gus par nyan pa dang / bka' nyan par byed de/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang / de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha
rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la/ gnas bcu po lha'i tshe dang / lha'i
mdog dang / lha'i stobs dang / lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dang / lha'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis dga' bar
byed de/ dge slong dag /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon lnga pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag
pa'i phan yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes snying pos
bsgyur/ ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ tsai t+ya pra dak+Shi Na gA thA/ bod skad
du| mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab blo ldan 'jig rten na/ chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba/ /shes rab
chen po shA ri'i bus/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ /mchod rten bskor ba bgyis pa yi/ /rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba/ /skal pa chen po'i 'jig rten mchog /rnam par
'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ ston pas de la bka' stsal pa/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yi/ /yon tan gang yin
phyogs tsam bstan/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yi/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci/ /lto 'phye che rnams mchod byed 'gyur/ /dal ba rnyed dka' thob
gyur nas/ /skad cig gcig tsam bar du yang / /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mi khom brgyad rnams spong bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dran dang ldan
zhing blo gros ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing mdzangs pa dang / /thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi/ /tshe ring ba
yang de yis 'thob/ /grags pa chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dzam+bu'i gling du rus kyi mchog /cho rigs yongs su dag par yang / /blo ldan
de ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /kha bzhin dag kyang bzang ba dang / /mdog sdug pa dang mkhas pa dang / /bde bar gnas pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod
rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang / /ser sna med cing gtong phod dang / /sbyin pa dag la dpa' bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /yid du
'ong zhing blta na sdug /mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang / /longs spyod rgya chen spyod par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'du byed stong par mthong nas kyang / /
de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur/ /myur du dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skye bar 'gyur/ /bu smad 'khor dang ldan pa
dang | |stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bram ze che zhing mtho bar skye/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing thos dang ldan/ /rig byed
gsang sngags ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho bar skye/ /phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang / /nor dang 'bru rnams ldan par
'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi mnga' bdag rje/ /sa steng mtha' dag dbang byed pa'i/ /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal
por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /chos bzhin 'khor lo skor bar byed/ /mchod
rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris 'gro /sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba dang / /rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas
pas ni/ /lha yul dag nas 'phos nas kyang / /de ni mi yi nang dus skye/ /rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mngal gyi skyon gyi dri ma yis//
de la gos par mi 'gyur te/ /de ni nor bu dag pa bzhin/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /ma ltor bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de ni bde bar btsa' ba dang / /bde bar nu
zho 'thung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /phas kyang g.yog 'khor mang po yis/ /de la gso zhing gnas par 'gyur/ /ma mas rtag tu rim gro byed/ /mchod
rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /nye du rnams kyi snying du sdug /de bzhin pham lhag par byams/ /skyes nas longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /
sha za dang ni srin rnams kyis/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /longs spyod dag la skyon med spyod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa brgya yang de dag rnams/ /zhar
ba grum por yong mi 'gyur/ /lus kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mig kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /dkyus ring mthon mthing sdug pa
dang | |lha yi mig kyang de yis 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /lus bde sems kyang brtan pa dang / /de bzhin brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / /dpung mgo zlum zhing brtan par
'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /stobs dang byad gzugs phun sum tshogs/ /yan lag thams cad mtshan rnams kyis/ /legs par brgyan cing ldan par 'gyur/ /
mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i brgya byin du/ /lha yi dbang po chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/
'thab bral lha yi rgyal po dang / /de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan dang / /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /tshangs pa'i
'jig rten tshangs pa yis/ /dbang phyug nyid du de 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams bye ba snyed kyis mchod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag dang / /khrag
khrig phrag brgya dag tu yang / /shes rab ldan pa rtag tu mchod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/ /lus gtsang
gos kyang gcang ba dang / /dkar po'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs/ /de ni le lo
med pa dang / /shin tu bsgrub pa thob pa 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu yang brtan/ /rtsal brtan cis kyang mi tshugs
shing | |don rnams myur du 'grub par byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /gdangs snyan gsang yang mtho ba dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro can/ /gnod pa med cing nad
med 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa yi/ /gnas der myur du de 'gro zhing / /shas cher skye ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor
ba byas pas ni/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /sems kyi tshad med bzhi po dang / /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i dbang yang 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang / /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / /byang chub yan lag 'bras bur 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mngon shes drug
ldan zag pa med/ /nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi/ /dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dod chags zhe sdang spangs pa dang / /
'khor rnams thams cad spangs pa yi/ /rang rgyal byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ /mtshan rnams
kyis ni brgyan pa dang / /gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur/ /lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /
smon lam btab pa'ang bskor ba yin/ /'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis/ /bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la/ /bskor ba
byas pa'i yon tan gang / /de ni tshig tsam nyi tshe yis/ /legs par bstan par mi nus so/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /shA ri'i bus ni zhus nas kyang / /mchod
rten phyag byas yon tan gang / 'jig rten mgon pos bstan pa yin/ /rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya/ /drel mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang / /rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams/ /
rin chen sna tshogs bkang ba yang / /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig por ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /kam po dzi yi bu mo brgya/ /nor bu rna cha gdub 'khor thogs/ /gser
gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang / /mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa/ /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /gangs
kyi glang chen brgya snyed dag /lus chen nam tshod yangs pa dang / /sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang / /gser dang nor bus brgyan pa dang / /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig
bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems gyis gom pa gcig bor ba/ /dzam+bu'i chu klung gser srang
'bum grangs snyed/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'jim gong gcig bor ba/ /dzam+bu'i
chu klung gser gyi pho brang 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma
spungs/ /dzam+bu'i chu klung gser snod 'bum bzhag pa/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis
me tog phreng ba thogs/ /dzam+bu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i
sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba/ /dzam+bu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum/ /de na de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /
dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul byed pa/ /dzam+bu'i chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten
la| |dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs/ /gser gyi ri bo lhun po tshad 'bum yang / /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /'di ni dpag med de
bzhin gshegs| /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ded dpon bla na med pa la/ /phul ba'i phan yon bstan pa yin/ /bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis mchod/ /mya ngan 'das
'og gang gis mchod/ /sems dge ba ni mtshungs 'gyur na/ /bsod nams la ni khyad par med/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab//
bsam mi khyab la dang rnams kyis/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra se na
dzi ta gA thA/ bod skad du/ gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal gdugs dang cod pan dang / /rnga yab ral gri
nor bu lham bzhag ste/ /thal mo sbyar te legs par phyag btsal nas/ /'jig rten mgon po la ni zhu ba zhus/ /phan bar dgongs pa thugs rje'i
bdag nyid can/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mya ngan 'das pa na/ /mchod pa bgyis pas bla mchog ji lta bur/ /srid pa gzhan du mi rnams bde ba thob/ /bcom ldan mi yi
seng ge snga phyi'i mtha'i/ /chos rnams kun la mngon sum spyad gyur pas/ /kun dga' bzang pa yi ni mngon sum du/ /gsal rgyal zhus lan 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ /ji
ltar mchod rten dag la mi rnams kyis/ mchod pa byas pas srid pa gzhan dag tu/ /rnam smin 'dod pa sna tshogs ci thob pa/ /zhus pa'i don de rgyal pos mnyan par gyis//
bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang ni/ /sku gzugs rnams la rdul phran ci song ba/ /de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyi/ /lha yul sa steng nges par rgyal srid 'thob//
gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas/ /tha mar skye dang rga la sogs pa yi/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs
rgyas go 'phang 'thob/ /su dag 'di ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/ /de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon tan ldan/ /dbang po bsdams shing 'od 'bar nyi ma bzhin/ /'jig
rten dag na mig tu sdug par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/ /de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang / /pad+ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs/ /nad dang
mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs las thar/ /su zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa/ /bran du mi skye ma dag gzhug skye mi 'gyur/ /dbul por mi 'gyur rigs dman mi
'gyur zhing / /dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ /mya ngan yongs mod lus kun brten pa dang / /longs spyod
mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/ /dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis/ /chos dang rjes mthun chos la
sgrub pa dang / /tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan/ /'jig rten dag na don kun grub par 'gyur/ /mchod rten mchog la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis//
lha dang mi yi nang na skye ba dang / /sred med bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/ /bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis/ /
lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing / /lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te/ /rtag tu skyid cing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur/ /gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mos
g.yogs pa yi/ /thub pa'i dbang po mchod rten byas pa yis/ /mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan dag tu/ /lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar
zhing mdzes par 'gyur/ /su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa/ /de dag sa steng rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa/ /ma lus gnod
med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten dag la dga' bzhin du/ /rnam mang rgya chen gdugs ni btags pa yis/ /lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na gdugs
'dra ba/ /lha dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur/ /mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can/ /dri med bsod nams 'byung gnas gyur pa la/ /ba dan mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs
pa dang / /mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten cod pan btags pa yis/ /mi dbang dpal dang lha dbang dpal thob cing //
bde ba'i mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas/ /rnam par grol ba'i cod pan khyad par 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas/ /tshig btsan grags pa
chen po dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran/ /de dag gis ni rgyan rnams sna tshogs 'thob/ /mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la/ /
dad pa'i sems kyis phreng ba 'dogs byed pa/ /gser phreng rin chen mang pos legs spras pa/ /bsod nams las ldan de yi mgo la thogs/ /ston pa'i mchod rten dag la
rgyan 'phyang 'dogs/ /de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang / /gdu bu dag dang dpung rgyan mchog rnams kyis/ /lus brgyan 'jig rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur/ /su dag
bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni/ /lha dang mir skye lus mdog sdug pa dang / /rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub
dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis/ /shin tu blta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes/ /byed bzhin bzang zhing pad+mo'i mdog dang ldan/ /srid pa'i skyon rnams dang yang 'bral
bar 'gyur/ /su dag spos mchog sbyar ba'i 'bru mar gyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten nyug byed pa/ /de dag spos kyis mchod cing tsan dan gyis/ /lus byugs
nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag thub dbang mchod rten la/ /spos chu gtsang zhing dad pas khrus gsol pa/ /de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang / /
gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan med/ /su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku gzugs khang / /tshon rtsi sna tshogs dag gis mdzes byed pa/ /de ni bde gshegs mnga'
ba'i yon tan rnams/ /sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur/ /su dag dpyid ka'i dus su gtsang ma'i chus/ /mchod rten nye 'khor
rdul rnams zhi byed pa/ /de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du/ /rdul yab gser gyi yu ba can gyi g.yo ba/ /dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis/ /'phags
pa dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pas ni/ /rkang pas sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang / /yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur/ /su dag dkon mchog gsum la me
tog dang / /'bras bu gser thog byung ba 'bul byed pa/ /de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan/ /phreng ba rgyan chen me tog char
rnams kyis/ /su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod/ /de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/ /chu byad yid 'ong sna tshogs legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas mchod
rten dag la dri zhim phul/ /bdug spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyar dang / /a ga ru yi bdug spos phul ba yis/ /de yi lus kun spos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /su dag bde
bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /dga' bzhin rnga yab rnams ni 'bul byed pa/ /thugs dga' rgyal rnams snying rje rnga yab thogs/ /che ba de la cher yang g.yob par byed/ /
shin tu dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i/ /me long sdug gu thams cad mkhyen la 'bul/ /de dag tshe rabs brgyud pa rnams su yang / /lha mi rnams kyis blta bar 'os par 'gyur/ /su
dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa'i khyad par ci yod ci 'byor pa/ /'tsham par 'bul byed de dag dri med cing / /mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub thob//
mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la mgos btud gus phyag 'tshal/ /de dag lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis/ /cher yang che bar bkur ba'i
gnas su 'gyur/ /su zhig dang pas thub pa'i mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la skor ba byed pa de/ /phyi ma'i tshe la dgra chen rnams kyis btud/ /bzang po'i snod
'gyur yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yis/ /bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la/ /lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni//
srid pa kun tu mdzod rnams shin tu rgyas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo'i sgra phul bas/ /zab cing rigs pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /yan lag lnga rdzogs yid
'ong tshig dang ldan/ /sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed/ /su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan bstod byed pa/ /de dag gling bu'i sgra dang glu snyan dang / /sgra snyan yid
du 'ong ba thob pa dang / /so so yang dag rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rtswa shing so phag gis/ /'jig rten bla ma'i spyi
gab rig pas byed/ /yang na gzhan dag byed du 'jug kyang rung / /de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rgyal ba'i gtsang khang byed/ /de
dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /lha dbang gnas 'dra'i khang khyim 'od 'bar ba/ /dus rigs kun tu bde ldan thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i
gnas rnams su/ /bskal pa dga' byed rtag tu dga' bzhin du/ /rtson par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang / /tha mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag 'ja' khugs 'dra
ba'i rta babs mdzod/ /thub pa'i chab sgor sbreng byed de dag ni/ /srid pa gzhan du khang khyim sgo dang bcas/ /rnam par brgyan pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang
dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang / /bsrung phyir dad pas 'obs dang sgo 'dzugs pa/ /de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis/ /dpal yon rnams dang dbral bar
yongs mi nus/ /mi rnams su dag mchod rten rnying pa rnams/ /gzhan gyi ngor byed ma yin rang gi blos/ /ral tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni/ /lus bzang yon tan
dam pas brgyan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rnying bsal byas/ /'dod chags chags med zhe sdang sdang mi 'gyur/ /gti mug rmongs med lta ngan chags
mi 'gyur/ /mi rnams rab tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur/ /su dag glang chen dril dbyangs spa bar brgyan/ /dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag /ston pa dang ni 'phags
pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /de dag bla med theg chen thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo su dag 'jig rten mgon po la/ /rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams/ /'bul ba
de dag rin chen bdun po dang / /byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni gos phul bas/ /bsod nams byams pa'i ngo tsha'i gos gyon
te| |dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med/ /mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'drar 'gyur/ /dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis/ /ut+pa la sngon po kha
bye 'dra mig /gsal zhing sdug la mig gi dkyus ring mdzes/ /dri ma med pa'i lha yi mig dang ldan/ /su dag mchod rten mar me dngar ba 'bul/ /de dag mig tu sdug cing mi
rab rgyas/ /mig gi dkyus ring mthong ka'i mdog dang ldan/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis blta bar 'os/ /mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar thal sbyar 'khod/ 'byor dang mtshan
ma mar me'i sdong bu 'bul/ /de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan/ /rin chen rags pa'i 'od ldan lus kyang thob/ /rgyal la phul ba'i
mar me 'chi ba na/ /dga' ba'i sems kyi 'dir ni dga' bzhin du/ /snying po skul bar byed pa de dag ni/ /spyan lnga dag kyang nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams
gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod pa gzhan gyis byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rang don de ma byas kyang / /mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur/ /
tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs nas lhags pa la/ /su dag dga' bzhin mal stan sbyin byed pa'i/ /mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na/ /gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog
rnams 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /kha zas kha dog ro la
sogs ldan 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /btung rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /btung ba kha dog
ro la sogs pa 'thob/ /su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /dam chos tshul bzang thos nas nyams su len/ /de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i /srid
pa'i rgya mtsho myur du brgal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dge ba'i las 'di thams cad ni/ /'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs smin gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub dam pa yi/ /'bras
bu bde blag kho nar thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po dga' mdangs ldan pa yis/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas kyang / /thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ /
rgyal po rgyal byed tshal nas byung bar gyur/ /gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ e ka gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa
gcig pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/ /'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma
yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin/ /lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/ /ri dang nags
su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun tu yul zhig ga la yod/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu ra gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs
su bcad pa bzhi pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skur gyur pa ni thams cad la/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis mnga' ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags
ldan pa'i/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang / /gang du byang chub la reg dang / /zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang / /bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang / /'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang / /seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/ /gnas de la ni bdag phyag
'tshal/ /steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang / /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang / /sku bcas sku ni med pa yi/ /mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rkang gnyis
dam pa shar dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs char bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba bstan dka' zhes bya ba/ /des ni tshigs bcad 'di gsungs so/ /gang gi tshigs bcad 'di bzhi
yis| |de bzhin gshegs la bstod byed pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rA dza b+he rI gA thA/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/ /thams cad legs par 'dus nas su/ /shin tu dad pa'i sems kyis nyon//
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig /kha stobs la sogs rnams kyis 'gying / /dge slong tshig ngan
'don pa dang /drang srong chen pos gsan pa na/ /de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams/ /bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /khyed cag kha stobs la sogs pas/ /gcig
la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa/ /khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang / /de dag mthun pa ma yin no/ /rtag tu yang dag dga' byed pa'i/ /chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa/ /'di ni khyim
nas khyim med par/ /rab tu byung ba rnams dang mthun/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /'tshe ba med par ngas bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba/ /
dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig /shes rab ldan pa'i mi yi 'di/ /thos nas sdig pa rnam spongs la/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i chos la spyad par
gyis| |sngon gyi spun drung gyur pa yi/ /klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba/ /gcig gi mang ni rnga zhes bya/ /gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o/ /gnyis ka srog gcod las ldog cing //
tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grags/ /klu yi skye gnas la smod cing / /mi yi srid pa 'dod par gyur/ /tshul ldan mang du thos pa yis/ /dge sbyong bram ze mthong
ba dang / /mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni/ /bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang / /bcu bzhi bco lnga gang yin pa/ /
de la yan lag brgyad pa yi/ /gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam 'jog/ de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas/ /yul gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / /de dang nye ba'i gnas
de na/ /rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so/ /klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po/ /de gnyis 'od bar des shes nas/ /khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su/ /du ba can gyi
dbugs 'byin cing / /khyed gnyis chos spyod ma yin te/ /g.yon can tshul ngan 'chos pa'o zhes/ /rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis/ /yang dang yang du skrod par byed/ /dman
pas bskrad pa thos pa dang / /nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te/ /de tshe phu bo rnga la ni/ /tshig rnams kyis ni go byas pa/ /kye rnga mi yi 'jig rten dag 'di na/ /tshig ngan mngon
du smra bas gdung byed cing / /sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis/ /mche ba gdug pas bdag cag skrod par byed/ /'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe/ /
thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed/ /gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis kyang / /tshig ngan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus/ /deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang / /pho brang
gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste/ /rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su/ /'di nas bdag cag 'dod par bya/ /klu yi rgyal po stobs po che/ /de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /yid la bab par
byed pa yi/ /tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo/ /gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing / /bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa/ /de la yid kyis gnod par
mi bsam ste/ /byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam pas bsngags/ /ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis/ /yud tsam zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i/ /lo ma'ang bcad par mi bya na/ /yal ga
ljon shing smos ci dgos/ /nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung / /slar yang skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /lag pa rlon bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/ /grogs la
'khu bas yun ring bde mi thob/ /skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing / /bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang / /des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur te/ /glang
chen gyis ni ko'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin/ /ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar/ /mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa/ /de yi mdza' bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te/ /
shing shun tshon gyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/ /gal te mkhas pas dgra bo dag /mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/ /sems la skyon ni med byas dang / /de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur/
rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang / /sa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/ /byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gi khur chen yin/ /mi gang sems ni
mi rgod cing / /byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor/ /byas pa chud gzon mi byed pa/ /de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /chos bde byams pa bde ba ste/ /'jug dogs bde
ba'i chu klung bzhin/ /grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang / /nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde/ /khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang / /stobs
ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig /de phyir khengs par mi bya ste/ /khro ba rnam par spang bar bya/ /khengs dang khro ba 'ongs 'gyur na/ /grags
pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang / nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang / /rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la//
snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung / /rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/ /tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la/ /bzod pa chen po bya dgos
so| |rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas/ /mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung / /gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te/ /rang gi yul yin de dag rang
gi mi/ /mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe/ /chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong / /ngan ba rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam/ /brnyas thabs byas pa de
yang chu bzhin 'thung / /dar ba rnyed pa dga' ba ste/ /rgud pa med pa yin pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gal te nor med
phyogs nyung ngam/ /mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam/ /dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs lngan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams chos min byed pa dang / /'dod pa'i
longs spyod mngon dga' zhing / /dad tshung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang / /gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang / /gzhan
la'ang gdug pa'i tshul ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams dad pa med pa dang / /khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug
dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / /gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang / /bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams
dang tshul ngan pa dang / /log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang / /gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ngo tsha med cing brdzun du smra/ /don med phra ma
tshig rtsu ba dang / /dbyen dang khyal pa smra ba'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ya rabs tshul med shin tu khengs/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba
dang / /phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gang tshe mi yi rus rnams dang / /rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i/ /mi dang lhan
cig 'dug pa na/ /de tshe nga rgyal byar mi rung / /gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis brnyas
pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /sdang bas 'khrug par gyur pa na/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul
na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung / /shes rab ldan pas de bzod bya/ /kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing / /mdza'
bshes ngan dang phrad pa na/ /byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi/ /gnas su mi ngan rten byed med/ /shes rab ldan pas de bsams nas/ /mi shes mi dang 'grogs byed
kyang / /mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir/ /gzu lums kho nar khro mi bya/ /ji ltar thal bas bkab pa'i me/ /rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la/ /rlung rnams kyis ni
legs bus na/ /shin tu rab tu 'bar 'gyur te/ /rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su/ /chen por mched cing 'bar ba yis/ /rtswa dang gel ba mang po dag /ljon shing chen po
sreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las/ /byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/ /phung khrol chen po byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir khro ba byung ba na/ /
zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ /byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/ /bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la/ /ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed
cing / /mod la yongs su spong byed pa/ /de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gal te 'di na byis pa dag /sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur/ /blo spangs shes rab ma 'chal na/ /
mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni/ /blo gros spangs shing shes 'chal ba/ /de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can/ /khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho/ /
mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med/ /rjes su bzung phyir phan pa de smra na/ /legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis mi
rtogs| |mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de/ /de nyid dpyad pa legs par mnyan nas su/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang / /gzhan gyi don dag legs
par spyod par byed/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam gyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams kun tu spyod mi 'gyur/ /gal te bde dang sdug bsngal
ldan gyur kyang / /rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med/ /blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te/ /rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsu ba khro mi 'gyur/ /phongs pa'i gnas na mya
ngan mi byed pa/ /gzhan gyis gnas la 'bebs par byed re skan/ /ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi/ /dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te/ /bar ma'i gnas la ston
par byed pa dag /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid yin/ /ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon/ /ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas/ /de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su/ /go 'phang bar
ma bsten par bya/ /res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis/ /dus la bab na sa bdag bzhin du smros/ /res 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis/ /dus la
bab na me lce bzhin du spor/ /res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra bar zhum par bya/ /dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis/ /res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bya/ /dus la bab na thub
'dra nags su song / /res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/ /dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang / /nor phyir bran bzhin bkol bar mi bya ste/ /khro ba'i dbang
du gyur par mi bya'o/ /res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/ /rtse zhing sha dang chang yang spyad par bya/ /res 'ga' ri drags lta bur 'jigs bzhin song / /dus su gcan
zan bzhin du nyams rtsal bstan/ /dang por dus dang dus min dang / /bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang / /dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/ /de nas don rnams legs par
brtsam/ /bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang / /bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis/ /nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod gyis/ /
'khon gyis 'khon zhir nams kyang mi 'gyur bas/ /bzod med rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs/ /khros pa rnams la rtag tu dad pa dang / /gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag
tu bcab par gyis/ /gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang / /'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gcugs gyur phyir bzod/ /gang zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa/ /de ni
bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs/ /gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /blo gros chung du mi bzod de/ /pad+ma la ni rdo char bzhin/ /gshe dang
gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shin tu bzod byed de/ /glang chen me tog char pa bzhin/ /khro ba dang ni rdzun dag dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /
mkhas pas shes rab ldan gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni thams cad bzod/ /rdo ba bsregs kyang 'ju mi 'gyur/ /char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med/ /de bzhin
bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa/ /de la mkhas pas bzod par byed/ /bden pa ma yin pa yang bzod//
de las gzhan pa bstan du med/ /'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pa nor gyi phyir/ /sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bya/ /gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te/ /
gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra/ /yal ga snyegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing / /chags bral sems la chags par mi bya ste/ /bzang zhing sdug pas sa steng gang bas na/ /
'jig rten yangs pa gzhan du 'gror zad mod/ /gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang / /smod par byed cing bstod par mi byed na/ /mkhas dang blun 'grogs ched ka mi che
bas| |rang rgyal bzhin du mi smra de 'gro rigs/ /gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas/ /g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed/ /kyal pa dbyen rdzun tshig rtsub smra
byed pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams 'tsho bar byed gyur nas/ /phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang / /lus dang ngag yid sdom
pa med gyur pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing / /sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam
rmongs tshul 'chos pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/ /bkur sti 'dod cing tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu byed/ /nang yang ma
dag phyi yang ma dag pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams zhes med gyur nas/ /ya rabs tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal ldan/ /byis pas
mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed la/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang dang gang du bza' btung dang / /gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang / /gang du 'tsho
ba der song la/ /chags 'byung gnas su ma 'dug cig /lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs/ /rtag khengs mchod med nga rgyal gang yin spongs/ /'bras bu
ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs/ /phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs/ /me yis gang ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/ /byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod
chags spongs/ /mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i chags pa spongs/ /dgra bo mtshon thogs lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs/ /klu mo lta bu mi bzod chung ma spongs/ /mgo la me 'bar
lta bu'i bu rnams thongs/ /'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thongs/ /btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa thongs/ /khyim gyi phyir ni
gcig btang ste/ /grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo / /ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te/ /bdag gi don dus btang ngo / /mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing / /srog
gi don du yan lag btang bar bya/ /nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog /thams cad btang gi 'dir ni chos srung ngo / /chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med
pa nyid/ /chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ /chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'gro bar 'gro /chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed
dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /nor zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyar bar/ /'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba/ /sems can nang na mi yi snying por chud/ /gang zhig
dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing / /nga rgyal 'tshe ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni/ /dpa' bo rtul phod ya rabs thabs ldan
yin| |gang zhig de dang de la legs bslabs pas/ /don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang / /des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/ /dam pas legs pa yin zhes
bsngags pa mdzad/ /nye rngas smras pa/ /rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing / /'di ltar bdag ni rab tu dad/ /bdag gi lus 'di skams pa'am/ /yang na sems ni med kyang sla/ /
sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par/ /lhung yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid/ /tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas/ /tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang sla/ /skye ba gcig tu 'di
yi phyir/ /ji lta bur ni mi zad spyad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe gang du rab gnas shing / /de dang der ni skyes pa na/ /mi dge'i grogs dang 'grogs
pa yis/ /nga yi mi dge las rnams byas/ /dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na/ /mi dge'i las rnams sdangs pa yis/ /bdag gis mi dge'i las rnams bsal/ /bcom
ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas/ /de phyir dge slong rnams la ni/ /thub pas lung yang bstan par mdzad/ /sngon tshe nga ni
rngar gyur te/ /kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin/ /lha sbyin rnga sgar gyur to zhes/ /skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis/ /chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi/ /don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos
nas| |dge slong thams cad gus bcas pa/ /chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis/ /klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ u dA na brga/
bod skad du/ ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal bas
ched du brjod gsungs pa/ /bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa rnams sol la/ /yid la dga' ba bskyed de nyon/ /thams cad mkhyen pa skyob
pa po/ /thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba/ /sku yi tha ma 'dzin pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos
can yin/ /skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ /de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la/ /ci zhig dgar yod mgur ci yod/ /mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas
pa dag /ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed/ /rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /bor ba gang yin 'di dag ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba/ /de mthong 'di la ci zhig dga'//
gang gi nub mo kho na nas/ /mngal du dang por 'jug pa'i mi/ /de ni sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing / /song ba las kyang ldog pa med/ /snga dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /phyi dro kha cig
mthong mi 'gyur/ /phyi dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /snga dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med mang po dang / /dar la bab pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na/ /de la mi 'di gzhon
zhes te/ /gson pa'i gdeng drod ci zhig yod/ /kha cig mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar/ /de bzhin kha cig gog tsam na/ /de bzhin kha cig
yongs rgyug na/ /la la rgan dang la la gzhon/ /la la dar la bab pa'i mi/ /rim gyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te/ /'bras bu smin pa ltung ba bzhin/ /dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams/ /ltung
bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltar/ /de bzhin skyes par gyur pa'i mi/ /rtag tu 'chi bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /dper na rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/ /'jim pa las ni snod byas pa/ /thams
cad tha mar 'jig pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na thags ni brkyang ba la/ /spun ni gang dang gang bcug pa'i/ /spun gyis rting la gtugs par ltar/ /mi rnams
srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na nges par bsad pa dag /gom pa gang dang gang bor bas/ /bsad sa'i drung du bsnyen pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /chu klung drag
tu 'bab pa'i rgyun/ /ldog pa med pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin mi yi tshe 'gro ba/ /slar ni ldog par 'gyur ba med/ /dka' ba nyid dang 'thung ba dang / /de yang sdug bsngal
ldan pa dag /myur ba kho nar 'jig 'gyur te/ /chu la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin/ /dper na phyugs rdzi dbyug thogs kyis/ /phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar/ /de
bzhin nad dang rga ba yis/ /mi rnams 'chi bdag drung du skyel/ /chu bran gyi ni chu lta bur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa yis/ /mi rnams tshe yang zad
'gyur zhing / /srog kyang nye bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /mel tshe byed la mtshan mo ring / /lam kyis dub la rgyang grags ring / /dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i/ /byis pa
rnams la 'khor ba ring / /bdag la bu yod de bzhin du/ /nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag /phyi rol nang na bdag med na/ /su yi bu yin ci zhig nor/ /skyes pa bud
med rnams kyi rigs/ /brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang / /longs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yang / /'chi bdag dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bsags pa kun gyi
mtha' zad cing / /bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' na bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba ni/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na/ /sems
can thams cad 'chi 'gyur zhing / /dge sdig 'bras bur nyer 'gro ba'i/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang / /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang / /bsod nams byas pa bde
'gro ste/ /gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas/ /zag med mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang / /sku
lus 'di ni spong mdzad na/ /skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/ /gang du gnas na 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na
med| |ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na'ang min/ /byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis lus 'di btang nas 'gro ba dang / /de kun 'jigs par mkhas pas rtogs
gyis te/ /chos la gnas gyis tshangs par spyad pa spyod/ /rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang / /sems dang bral ba'i shi ba mthong nas ni/ /brtan pas btson ra 'dra ba'i
khyim spangs kyi/ /'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/ /rgyal po'i shing rta shin tu bkra ba'ang 'jig /de bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga bar 'gyur/ /dam pa rnams kyi
chos 'di dam pa ste/ /mi mchog gzhan rtogs byed cing rga mi 'gyur/ /rga ba khyod ni blun zhing ngan/ /khyod ni mi rigs byed pa ste/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs 'di yang / /khyod
kyis mngon par bcom par gyur/ /gang zhig lo ni brgyar 'tsho ba/ /de yang 'chi bdag nyid kyis khrid/ /'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na na ba'ang 'chi bas 'joms/ /rtag
tu ldog pa med par 'gro 'gyur zhing / /nyin dang mtshan du rab tu 'jig pa dang / /skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa/ /chu tshan nang du gdungs pa'i nya dang 'dra/ /tshe
'di nyin dang mtshan mo dang / /'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na/ /chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/ /phyir mi ldog par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /chu chung
nang gi nya lta bur/ /gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yis/ /tshe 'di shin tu thung 'gyur na/ /de la dga' bar byar ci yod/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir/ /lus 'di
yongs su rga ba dang / /nad kyi tshang 'di myur 'jig cing / /snag gi tshogs kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par/ /stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas/ /dur
khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar/ /sa yi steng du 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /rgyun du nad kyis mngon gdung zhing / /rtag tu mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang / /rga dang 'chi bas 'tsher
'grib pa'i/ /lus 'di dor bcir mi rung / /myur du 'jig cing na ba dang / /rnag dang ldan pa'i lus 'di yis/ /grub dang bde ba bla med pa/ /zhi mchog don du gnyer
bar gyis/ /dgun kha dang ni dpyid ka dang / /dbyar kha 'di dag bya'o zhes/ /byis pa rnam par sems byed pas/ /bar chad mthong bar ma gyur to/ /bu dang nor phyugs
'byor pa la/ /mi yi yid ni rnam chags pa/ /'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro /nyal grong chu bos bdas pa bzhin/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ /bu rnams skyabs
su mi 'gyur zhing / /pha yang ma yin gnyen 'dun min/ /khyod la skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /'di ni bya ba byas zin don 'di bya/ /de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di bya zhes/ /
de ltar mi ni yongs su shom pa na/ /rga dang nad bcas 'chi bas mngon du bcom/ /de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' mnyam par zhog /brtson bskyed la skye dang rga ba'i

mtha' ma ltos/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa mngon par zil non la/ /dge slong dag go skye shi'i pha rol 'gro bar gyis/ /mi rtag pa'i tshoms te dang po'o// //kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas/ /'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes gyis te/ /khyod ni kun rtog ma byed dang / /des na khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /
'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung / /'dod pa dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /dga' ba rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /dga' ba rnams las
'jigs par 'byung / /dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug bsngal te/ /dang po mngar la 'bras bu tsha/ /me
sbron lag nas ma bor pa/ /mjug tu phyis ba sreg byed bzhin/ /nor bu'i rna cha bu dang bu mo la/ /yongs su chags sems gang yin la ltos na/ /lcags shing gres
ma las byas chings ma gang / /de dag dam po min zhes 'phags pa gsung / /'dod pa'i chings ma gang yin de lhod kyang / /rab tu dgrol bar
dka' zhes 'phags pa gsung / /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi lta bar/ /de dag gtubs nas myur du 'gro bar byed/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min
gyi| |skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/ /'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni/ /'on kyang brtan rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul/ /mi rnams
la ni rtag pa'i 'dod pa med/ /'dod can gang la chags de mi rtag pas/ /yang srid med phyir sems kyis rab spongs la/ /'chi ba'i gnas mi 'gyur bar byos zhes
gsungs/ /'dun pa skyes shing zad par mi byed dam/ /sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang / /'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang / /de ni gong du 'pho ba yin
zhes gsungs/ /mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/ /blo gros ldan pas rim pa bzhin/ /skad cig skad cig cung zad tsam/ /rang gi dri ma bsal bar bya/ /lham mkhan
gyis ni ko ba dag /yongs su spyangs nas lham byed ltar/ /'dod pa gang dang gang spangs pa/ /de de bde ba phun sum ldan/ /gal te bde ba kun 'dod na/ /'dod pa thams
cad yongs su spongs/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas/ /mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /ji srid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de srid par du ngoms mi 'gyur/ /de
las gang dag shes rab kyis/ /ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob/ /'dod pas ngoms par mi 'gyur pas/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa skyid/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms
pa'i mi/ /srid pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa chags pa'i mi gang yin/ /de dag kye ma chos min dga'/ /cung zad gson por 'dug pa na/ /bar chad mthong bar mi
'gyur ro/ /blo ngan longs spyod kyis bcom pas/ /pha rol tshol bar mi byed cing / /bsam brlag 'dod la sred pa yis/ /bdag dang gzhan yang phung bar byed/ /kAr ShA
pa Na'i char bab kyang / /'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa mnog chung nyes mang ba/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis khong du chud/ /lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang / /
lhag par dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams/ /sred pa zad pas dgyes par 'gyur/ /gangs can dang ni mnyam pa yi/ /gser gyi ri bo yod
gyur kyang / /nor des gcig kyang mi tshim par/ /rtogs par gyis la legs par spyod/ /gang dag sdug bsngal de yi rgyu shes pa/ /de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' mi 'gyur//

'jig rten dag na zug rngu'i rgyur shes nas/ /de dag gdul phyir brtan pa slob par byed/ /'dod pa'i tshoms te gnyis pa'o// //lus can rnam par rtog pas rab bcom pa/ /'dod chags mi bzad gtsang bar rjes lta bas/ /'dod chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te/ /rang gi 'ching ba de
yis dam por byed/ /gang dag rnam rtog nye bar zhi dga' zhing / /mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de/ /de yi sred pa rab tu spangs pa yis/ /rang gi 'ching ba de dag
rul bar byed/ /'dod pa mun nag 'dra bas g.yogs/ /srid pa'i dga' bas bkab pa dang / /bag med 'ching bas bcings pa dag /tshed mar chud pa'i nya dang
'dra| |skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa/ /'khri shing bzhin du sred pa 'phel 'gyur zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u
dang 'dra/ /mi dag dran par byed dang chags byed dang / /yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag /de yis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khyams/ /tshal nang 'bras bu 'dod pa'i
spre'u dang mtshungs/ /mi gang rtag tu bde ba 'dod byed pa/ /skye dang rga bar nye bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar/ /rgya nang ri bong yongs
su rgyug pa bzhin/ /sred pa rnams kyi mdud pa'i sems can dag /srid dang srid min dag la sems chags shing / /kun sbyor ro la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/ /yang dang
yang du sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo grub dang bde rnams dang bral zhing / /bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho
'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ /'di na sred pa de 'dra spong byed pa/ /srid dang srid min dag la sred bral zhing / /dge slong srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa/ /lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan
'da'/ /gang zhig 'jig rten spang dga' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'dis bkol ba/ /de yi mya ngan 'phel 'gyur te/ /rtswa la char pa bab pa bzhin/ /gang zhig 'jig rten
spang dka' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'di spong ba/ /de yi mya ngan ldog 'gyur te/ /pad+ma las ni chu thigs bzhin/ /de phyir ji snyed 'dir lhags pa/ /khyed la smra yi khyed bde
zhig /u shir phyir ni rtswa bzhin du/ /sred pa rtsar bcas drung nas phyung / /skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogs na/ /yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur bas/ /sred pa drungs nas phyung
zhig dang / /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /yang dang yang du nyer len cing / /yang dang yang du mngal du 'jug /gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhan 'gyur bas/ /sems
can 'ong dang 'gro bar byed/ /'dir ni spang dka'i sred pa de/ /spongs las bon chod cig dang / /de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing / /de ni yang du 'khor
mi 'gyur/ /dal 'byor chud ni ma gzan par/ /gang gis lha dang mi rnams su/ /don gnyer bcings nas 'jog byed pa/ /yul la sred pa de las rgol/ /sems can dmyal
bar skyes na yang / /dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong / /gang phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa/ /yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi/ /'khri shing dra bas khebs byed pa/ /gdung
bar byed pa ma btul na/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni yang dang yang / /rnam pa kun tu ldog mi 'gyur/ /dper na ljon shing rtsa nas ma bton na/ /bcad kyang phyir zhing skye ba kho
nar zad/ /de bzhin sred pa'i phra rgyas ma bton na/ /yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog /dper na bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa'i mtshon/ /de yis rkun pa'i mthu
yis bdag gsod ltar/ /de bzhin nang gi sems las byung ba yi/ /sred pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed/ /de ltar sred las sdug bsngal dag /'byung ba'i nyes
dmigs shes gyis te/ /sred spongs nye bar len med dang / /dran ldan dge slong kun tu rgyus/ /sred pa'i tshoms te gsum pa'o// //bag yod 'chi
med gnas yin te/ /bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/ /bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi/ /de yi khyad par de rig pas/ /mkhas pa rnams ni bag
dang bcas/ /bag yod pa la rab dga' ba/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul dga' ba yin/ /de la rgyun du bsgoms pa dang / /rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan pa'i/ /brtan pas grub
bde bla med pa/ /mya ngan 'das la reg pa yin/ /gang tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas/ /bag med bcom pa de yi tshe/ /shes rab khang bzang steng 'dzegs nas/ /mya nga med
pas gdung bcas dang / /brtan rnams ri bo'i spo dag las/ /sa steng byis pa rnams la blta/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang / /yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ /mkhas
pas gling du byas nas ni/ /chu bo chen po mngon du zlog /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dran dang ldan pa dang / /spyod pa gtsang zhing brtags nas byed pa dang / /yang dag sdom dang chos kyis
'tsho ba dang / /bag yod rnams kyi grags pa mngon par 'phel/ /lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste/ /thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab/ /nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i/ /
skyong ba mya ngan med pa yin/ /dman pa'i chos la mi rten cing / /bag med pa la bsten mi bya/ /log par blta la 'dod med dang / /'jig rten 'phel bar mi bya'o/ /'jig
rten pa yi yang dag lta/ /chen po su la yod gyur pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bag med pa la sbyor byed pa/ /
skye bo byis pa bsam brlag yin/ /tshong dpon nor rnams srung ba ltar/ /mkhas pa bag dang ldan par bya/ /bag med pa la mi sbyor zhing / /'dod la dga' ba mi gsog
dang | |rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob kyang / /dus 'dir bag med mi bya ste/ /ri dwags ma yin seng ge ltar/ /bag
med pa dag bsad par 'gyur/ /bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa'i/ /mi gang yid la gnas skabs 'di bzhi 'byung / /bsod nams mi 'thob bde bar mi nyal
dang | |gsum pa smad 'gyur bzhi pa dmyal bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams ma thob sdig pa'i 'gro ba dang / /'jigs dang bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chung / /rgyal po'i chad pa
chen pos gcod 'gyur zhing / /lus zhig sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tshod/ /gang zhig bdag bde lta 'dod pa/ /des ni gong ma bzhin du bya/ /byis pa'i shing
rta bzhin 'gyur bags/ /brtan pas brtson 'grus zhan mi bya/ /dper na byis pa'i shing rta dag /lam chen bzang po bor nas su/ /lam ngan dag tu 'gro byed pas/ /
mig chags sems khong chud pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos ni spangs nas kyang / /chos min rjes su 'jug byed pa'i/ /byis pa 'chi ba dag dbang 'gro zhing / /mig chag bzhin
du bcom pa thob/ /gang zhig bya ba rnam spangs nas/ /mi bya ba dag byed pa dang / /bag med pa yis rlom byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi zag pa 'phel/ /gang gis zag pa 'phel
'gyur pa/ /de yi zag med rgyang ma na/ /gang zhig lus gtogs ldan pa dag /rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dang / /bya ba ma yin mi byed cing / /rgyun du bya ba byed
pa dang / /dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa de'i/ /zag pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur/ /gang gi zag pa zad gyur pa/ /des ni zag med thob par 'gyur/ /ji tsam mang du smra
byed pa/ /de dag dam chos 'dzin ma yin/ /gang dag 'di na thos nyung yang / /lus kyis chos dag mngon sum byas/ /gang dag chos la bag byed pa/ /de dag dam
chos 'dzin pa yin/ /gal te rigs bcas mang du smras kyang ni/ /bag med mi dag de ltar byed mi 'gyur/ /dper na phyugs rdzis gzhan gyi phyugs bgrangs ltar/ /de
dag dag sbyong skal pa thob ma yin/ /gal te rigs bcas nyung du smra byed kyang / /chos kyi rjes su chos la spyod pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spong byad pa/ /de
dag dge sbyong skal pa thob pa yin/ /bag yod bsngags pa rjod byed cing / /rtag tu bag med la smod pas/ /bag yod mchod sbyin brgya
pa yang / /lha rnams nang na gtso bor gyur/ /bya ba byas rung ma byas rung / /mkhas pa bag yod bsngags pa brjod/ /bag dang bcas pa'i mkhas pa yis/ /don gnyis
rab tu len par byed/ /tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang / /phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/ /de dag brtan pas rtogs pas na/ /mkhas pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /dge
slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'drel te/ /'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/ /dge slong bag yod
la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug par byed/ /rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /
bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /kun tu sbyor ba phra sbom dag /me yis bsregs pa bzhin du 'gro /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs
lta bas/ /kun tu sbyor ba kun zad pa/ /rim gyis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /'du byed nyer
zhi zhi ba yi/ /zhi ba'i go 'phangs so sor rtogs/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams
'gyur mi srid do/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod dang / /chos spyad legs par spyod byed pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /chos spyod pas ni bde ba 'thob/ /zhi phyir
bslab pa la brten dang / /rtsol ba dang ni brtson 'grus skyed/ /mi dran pa dang bag med dang / /brtson 'grus chung dang kun sdom med/ /gnyid dang snyom dang g.yeng ba ste/ /'di
dag bslab pa'i bar chad pas/ /khyed kyis yan lag de rtogs la/ /dran pa chud ni ma gzan gcig /dge slong tshul khrims bzang ba dang / /bag yod pa la dga' ba
yis| |kun rtogs legs par mnyam zhog ste/ /rang gi sems ni rjes su srungs/ /brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i
khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug
bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /bag yod pa'i tshoms te bzhi pa'o// //sdug pa rnams las mya ngan skye/ /sdug pa rnams las 'jigs pa skye/ /sdug pa dag
ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /sdug gu ma las mya ngan skye/ /sdug las sdug bsngal sdug las 'jigs/ /sdug gu ma
dag gzhan gyur na/ /yi mug 'gyur ba thob par byed/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa ji snyed pa/ /de dag sdug pa dag las
rten te 'byung / /sdug pa spangs na de dag yod mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'jig rten 'ga' na'ang sdug med pa/ /gang yin de dag bde zhing mya ngan med/ /de bas gdung
med rdul bral don gnyer bas/ /nam yang sdug pa byed pa mi bya'o/ /sdug pa ma mthong sdug bsngal la/ /mi sdug mthong na'ang de bzhin pas/ /nam yang sdug dang phrad mi bya/ /
mi sdug dang yang phrad mi bya/ /sdug pa dang ni bye bral dang / /mi sdug pa dang phrad pa yis/ /gang gis mi dag rgas byed pa'i/ /mya ngan mi bzad skye bar 'gyur/ /sdug pa shi bar gyur pa na/ /gnyen
'dun mdza' bshes mang po dag /yun ring dus su mya ngan dang / /sdug dang bral bas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /gang la sdug dang sdug min med/ /de la mdud pa yod
min pas/ /de ltas sdug nyid sdig can la/ /sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/ /sdug la bltas te don btang nas/ /bde sbyor rnams la mi 'jug cing / /bdag nyid
mi bde'i sbyor ldan dag /bde sbyor don ldan rnams la smon/ /gzugs sdug bde bas bsdams pa dag /lha mi so so'i ris dag tu/ /sdig pa byed cing yongs nyams nas/ /rga
dang 'chi ba'i dbang du 'gro /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /bag yod gzugs sdug spong byed pa/ /des ni spang dka' bdud zas dang / /sdig pa'i rtsa ba'ang
drungs nas phyung / /legs min legs pa'i tshul dang ni/ /sdug min sdug pa'i tshul gyis dang / /sdug bsngal bde ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bag med rnams ni mngon du
'joms/ /gal te bdag la dga' byed na/ /nyes par byed pas bde ba dag /bde blag kho nar mi 'thob pas/ /'di ni sdug la gzhug mi bya/ /gal te bdag la
dga' byed na/ /legs par byed pas bde ba dag /bde blag kho nar thob 'gyur bas/ /'di ni sdig pa gzhug mi bya/ /dper na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag /brtan pa'i 'obs
kyis bskor ba ltar/ /gal te bdag la dga' byed na/ /'di ni bsrungs pas legs par bsrung / /gal te bdag la dga' byed na/ /thun gsum gang yang rung ba la/ /mkhas pas
mel che bya ba yis/ /'di ni spa bas legs par sba/ /dper na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag /phyi nang srung bar byed pa ltar/ /dal 'byor chud ni mi zos pa/ /de ltar bdag ni bsrung
bar bya/ /sems can dmyal bar skya na yang / /dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong / /phyogs rnams kun tu sems kyis yongs brtags
kyang | |bdag las ches sdug 'ga' yang ma mthong ba/ /de ltar so sor gzhan la'ang rang sdug pas/ /de phyir bdag dgas gzhan la gnod mi bya/ /thams cad la
yang srog 'di sdug /thams cad chad pas 'jigs pa na/ /rang gi nyams las dpag gyis te/ /brdeg par mi bya gsad mi bya/ /rgyang thag bcad par sbyugs pa'i mi/ /ring
nas nye zho med 'ongs na/ /gnyen bshes mdza' bo lhags nas su/ /a la la zhes mngon par dga'/ /de bzhin bsod nams byas pa'i mi/ /'jig rten 'di nas pha
rol tu/ /phyin tshe gnyen bzhin bsod nams dag /'ongs nas mngon par dga' bar byed/ /de bas 'jig rten pha rol gyi/ /ched du bsod nams bsags par gyis/ /
bsod nams 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /lus can rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur/ /gang zhig legs spyad spyod byed pa'i/ /dge la lha rnams bstod par byed/ /'di na'ang smad
par mi 'gyur la/ /mtho ris su yang dga' ba 'thob/ /chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /ngo tsha shes shing bden par smra/ /rang ga bya ba byed pa la/ /skye
bo gzhan rnams dga' bar byed/ /rang gi don ni byed pa la/ /'di ltar gzhan rnams dga' 'gyur zhing / /mthong ba'i chos la bsngags pa dang / /pha rol tu yang bde 'gror
'gyur/ /gtams na gnang ba'i tshig smra dang / /mi rigs spyod las zlog pa la/ /dam pa rnams ni dga' bar byed/ /dam pa ma yin dga' mi 'gyur/ /de bas mchog

dang mchog min pa/ /shi 'phos bral bar gyur pa na/ /dam pa ma yin dmyal bar 'gro /dam pa mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sdug pa'i tshoms te lnga pa'o// //bsngags par 'gyur dang nor 'thob dang / /pha rol bde 'gror dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /bde ba gsum po don gnyer ba'i/ /mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ /'phags dang mthong
ba phun tshogs dang / /'jig rten zhi ba rten 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas gzhan 'di dag mthong ba yis/ /mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ /lus la yongs su gdung med par/ /tshul
khrims kyi ni bde ba 'thob/ /mtshan mo bde bar nyal ba dang / /sad pa na yang dga' bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims ldan pa dag /mkhas pas byas pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /'di dang pha
rol dag tu yang / /rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /rgan pa'i bar la tshul khrims dge /dad la rab tu gnas na legs/ /mi yi rin chen shes rab ste/ /bsod nams chom pos dbrog par
dka'/ /dge slong tshul khrims la gnas shing / /dbang po rnams kyang bsdams pa dang / /zas kyi tshod ni rig pa dang / /mi nyal ba la 'bad pa ste/ /de ltar
gnas par brtson pa dang / /nyin mtshan snyoms las mi byed pa/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /mi ni tshul khrims la gnas nas/ /sems
dang shes rab bsgom pa la/ /brtson zhing des nas dge slong gis/ /sdug bsngal bzad par thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir rtag tu tshul khrims dang / /ting 'dzin rjes su srung ba dang / /
lhag mthong la ni bslab pa dang / /shes bzhin so sor dran par bya/ /des ni kun sbyor zad byas nas/ /yid bral lhag ma med 'gyur te/ /lus zhig shes rab ldan pa yis/ /
bgrang du med pa'i mya ngan 'das/ /gang zhig tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab 'di gsum legs bsgoms te/ /shin tu dri med mthar phyin cing / /gdung med yang
srid zad gyur dang / /chags pa'i 'ching las rnam grol zhing / /lus spangs shes rab ldan pa dang / /bdud kyi yul las 'das pa dang / /nyi ma bzhin du lam me 'bar/ /
dge slong phyi dang nang nyid la/ /bag med rlom par byed pa yis/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnams/ /yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sprin gyis khebs
las char 'bab cing / /nam thang ba las char mi 'bab/ /de bas khebs pa sol cig dang / /'di ltar char ba 'bab ba mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mthong ba dang / /dge slong tshul khrims
sdom pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam/ myur ba kho nar rnam par 'dag/ me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi 'gro/ rtsa ba rgya spos tsan+dan rnams kyang min/ /dam pa'i dri ni rdzi phyogs
mi 'gro ste/ /phyogs rnams kun tu mi mchog dri yis khyab/ /rgya spos dang ni tsan+dan dang / /ut+pa la dang ma li ka /spos kyi rigs ni 'di dag pas/ /tshul khrims dri bsung phul du
phyin/ /rgya spos tsan+dan gang yin pa'i/ /dri bsung 'di ni chung du ma/ /tshul khrims ldan pa'i dri bsung gang / /des ni 'di dang mtho ris khyab/ /de ltar bag yod gnas bya zhing / /
tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya/ /yang dag shes pas rnam grol na/ /bdud kyi lam ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /'di ni bde bar 'gro lam ste/ /rnam par dag byed lam 'di la/ /
rab tu zhugs te bsgoms nas kyang / /bdud kyi 'ching ba spong bar gyis/ /tshul khrims kyi tshoms te drug pa'o// //lus kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing / /lus kyi
legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir/ /lus kyi nyes chen las bsrungs na/ /lus ni bsdam par byas par 'gyur/ /ngag gi nyes par spyad spangs shing / /ngag gi legs spyad spyad
pa'i phyir/ /ngag gi nyes chen las bsrungs na/ /ngag ni bsdam pa byas par 'gyur/ /yid kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing / /yid kyi legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir//
yid kyis nyes chen las bsrungs na/ /yid ni bsdams pa byas par 'gyur/ /lus kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing / /ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang / /yid kyi nyes par spyod
spang zhing / /skyon gzhan ldan pa gang yin spang / /lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing / /ngag gi dge ba phal chen bya/ /yid kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing / /tshad med bzhi dang ldan
par bya/ /lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing / /ngag dang yid kyis byas na ni/ /'di dang pha rol dag tu yang / /rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu lus ni bsdams pa'i
phyir/ /thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/ /de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/ /rtag tu ngag ni bsdams pa'i phyir/ /thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/ /de
ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/ /rtag tu yid ni bsdams pa'i phyir/ /thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/ /de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang
du song na'ang mya ngan med/ /brtan pa rnams kyis lus bsdam zhing / /brtan pa rnams kyis ngag kyang bsdam/ /brtan pa rnams kyis yid bsdam zhing / /brtan pas kun
tu bsdams byas na/ /de dag 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang du song yang mya ngan med/ /lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste/ /ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin/ /yid kyi sdom pa'ang
legs pa ste/ /thams cad du ni bsdams pa legs/ /kun tu bsdams pa'i dge slong ni/ /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par 'grol/ /ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid ni legs
bsdams te/ /lus kyis mi dge ba dag spyad mi bya/ /las lam gsum po 'di dag rnam sbyangs na/ /drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur/ /legs par spyad pa'i
tshoms te bdun pa'o// //gang dag byas bzhin ma byas zer ba dang / /brdzun du smra ba dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mi de gnyis ka 'dra ba pha rol tu/ /song
nas dman pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /skyes bu skyes pa'i kha nas ni/ /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa yis/ /tshig gi sta re skyes gyur nas/ /bdag nyid gcod par byed par 'gyur/ /
gang zhig smad 'os skye bo bstod byed dang / /bstod 'os skye bo rnam par smad byed pa/ /de ni kha yis 'thab khrol kun gsog cing / /'thab khrol can gang des ni bde mi 'thob/ /gang
'dir cho los rang nor pham byed pa/ /'thab khrol de ni cung zad tsam du zad/ /gang zhig bde bar gshegs la yid 'khrug pa/ /de 'dir 'thab khrol shin tu chen po yin/ /ngag
yid 'phags pas smad pa'i sdig bsten na/ /bye bar chu pur can dang stong phrag ni/ /bzhi bcu gcig tu chu bur rdol ba yi/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su
'gro bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i sems kyis ma nyes skyon brjod pa/ /bdag nyid bsad phyir dmyal ba spel bar zad/ /stobs ldan nyes med pa dag bzod byed cing / /de la sems
kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /bsam brlag gang zhig sdig can gyi/ /lta la brten nas 'phags pa ni/ /dgra bcom chos kyis 'tsho ba dang / /bstan pa spong bar byed pa dag/
smyig ma 'bru chags lta bur ni/ /de ni rang gi 'bras bus gsod/ /tshig bzang kho na smra bya yi/ /sdig pa can dag smra mi bya/ /sdig can gdung byed smra ba bas/ /tshig bzang
smra bar byed pa rung / /byis pa sdig can smra byed pa/ /smra ba'i tshe na 'ching 'gyur la/ /gal te smra na gzhan spong ba/ /de dag 'phags pa mi gsung ngo / /dge slong dag ni
bsdams pa dang / /dal bus smra zhing rlom pa med/ /gang zhig chos ldan don ston pa/ /de ni snyan par smra ba yin/ /legs par smra ba mchog ces 'phags pa gsung / /
snyan smra mi snyan ma yin de gnyis pa/ /bden smra rdzun pa ma yin de gsum pa/ /chos smra phal pa ma yin bzhi bde'o/ /tshig de rnams ni smra bya zhing / /gang gis bdag
kyang mi gdung la/ /pha rol la yang gnod med pa'i/ /tshig de legs par smra bar bya/ /gang gis mngon par dga' 'gyur zhing / /gang gis sdig pa mi skyed dang / /smras pas pa
rol dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /snyan tshig kho na smra bar bya/ /bden pa'i tshig ni bdud rtsi ste/ /bden pa'i tshig ni bla med yin/ /don dang chos la rab gnas pa/ /bden pa yin zhes/
dam pa gsung / /sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs tshig gang / /bden pa mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/ /tshig de bla na med pa yin/ /tshig gi tshoms
te brgyad pa'o// //chos gcig las ni rab 'das shing / /'jig rten pha rol bcom pa yi/ /lus can brdzun du smra ba yi/ /sdig pa mi bya ci yang med/ /lcags
sgong me lce 'bar 'dra ba/ /zos par gyur pa ches sla yi/ /tshul 'chal legs par mi sdom pas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms za mi rung / /khyod ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs
shing / /khyod la sdug bsngal mi sdug na/ /mngon sum dag gam lkog tu'ang rung / /sdig pa can gyis las mi bya/ /gal te sdig pa'i las byas sam/ /byed kyang rung ste khyod
kyis ni/ /kog ces langs te bros byas kyang / /sdug bsngal las ni thar mi 'gyur/ /gang du gnas na las kyis mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /bar snang
la med rgya mtsho'i nang nas med/ /ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang min/ /pha rol po la brtags kyang gang / /sdig ba can gyi las mthong ba/ /de dag
bdag gis mi bya ste/ /sdig byas las ni rjes su 'brang / /las gang shin tu mi bzad dang / /zol byed gzhal blugs 'chos pa dang / /mi la 'tshe bar byed pa dang / /gzhan la
byed du 'jug pa yi/ /las de mi yi rjes 'brang bas/ /de yis g.yang sar ltung bar byed/ /mi yis dge ba'am/ sdig pa yi/ /las ni gang dang gang byas pa'i/ /las rnams chud
zar me 'gyur te/ /de lta de ltar 'bras bur 'gyur/ /de yi tshogs pa ji srid par/ /de srid 'di ni rdung bar byed/ /de la gzhan dag rdung byed de/ /rdung byed de ni brtags par
'gyur/ /'di ni bdag rjes mi 'brang zhes/ /byis pas ma brtags byas pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyis 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni shes par 'gyur/ /gal te byis pas mi
shes par/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pa dag/ nam zhig na ni de nyid kyis/ /rnam smin tsha ba so sor sten/ /rang gi las kyis de'i 'og tu/ /me yis bsregs pa bzhin du
gdungs/ /byis pa shes rab chung du dag/ bdag la dgra bzhin byad pa yis/ /gang zhig 'bras bu tsher 'gyur ba'i/ /sdig can las ni sbyong bar byed/ /gang dag byas
bas gdung 'gyur zhing / /ma chi mas gdong yog du bzhin du/ /snam smin so sor sten pa yi/ /las de dag ni ma byas legs/ /gang zhig byas na mi gdung zhing / /dga' zhing yid
ni bde ba yis/ /rnam smin so sor sten pa yi/ /las de dag ni byas na legs/ /bdag nyid bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ /dgod bzhin sdig pa'i las byas pa'i/ /sdig pa'i las de'i rnam
smin dag/ du bzhin nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /des par sdig las 'phral du ni/ /'o ma lta bur 'gyur mi byed/ /thal bas g.yogs pa'i me lta bur/ /des ni byis pa sreg par
byed/ /sdig las 'phral du nges par ni/ /mtshon bzhin gcod par mi byed kyang / /sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni mngon par 'gyur/ /gang du de dag rnam smin ni/ /
tshab so sor sten pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni shes par 'gyur/ /lcags las g.ya' ni langs gyur pa/ /langs pa des ni de nyid za/ /de bzhin ma brtags
byas pa yi/ /rang gi las kyis ngan 'gror 'gro/ /las kyi tshoms te dgu pa'o// //dad dang ngo tsha tshul khrims sbyin pa ste/ /chos 'di ni rnams ni skyes bu dam pas
bsngags/ /'di yis lha yi 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur zhing / /lam 'di nyid kyis lha yul 'gro zhes gsungs/ /'jungs rnams lha yi 'jig rten mi 'gro zhing / /de yis byis pa sbyin
ba'i bsngags mi brjod/ /brtan rnams sbyin la rjes su yi rang ba/ /des ni de dag gzhan du bde ba myong / /'di na skyes bu'i nor mchog dad pa ste/ /'di na
chos la legs spyod pa de pa 'thog/ /bde na kho na ro bro rnams kyi phul/ /shes rab kyis 'tsho 'tsho ba'i mchog ces gsungs/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba yi/ /dgra bcom chos
la dang bskyed de/ /mkhas pas gus par mnyan na ni/ /de dang de yi shes rab 'thob/ /bag can gyis ni rgya mtsho dang / /dad pas chu bo rnams las sgrol/ /brtson 'grus kyis
ni sdug bsngal spong / /shes rab kyis ni yongs dag 'gyur/ /dge slong dad pa'i grogs ldan zhing / /shes rab kyis ni gtams pa dang / /mya ngan 'das la mngon dga'
bas/ /'ching ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur/ /gang gis dang dang tshul khrims dang / /shes rab nyid ni legs bsgoms shing / /mkhas pa skyon rnams spong ba de'i/ /legs
pa'i ngang tshul can zhes brjod/ /dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /gtong ldan 'jungs pa rnam spangs pa/ /de ni gang dang gar song ba/ /de dang der ni mchod par 'gyur//
mkhas gang 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na/ /dad dang shes rab stan byed pa/ /de dag de yi nor mchog ste/ /de yi nor gzhan phal par zad/ /'phags pa lta bar 'dod pa dang //
dam chos nyan par dga' ba dang / /ser sna'i dri ma rnams spangs pa/ /de ni dad pa can zhes bya/ /dad pa'i lam rgyags bskur bar bya/ /bsod nams chom pos dbrog mi nus/ /chom
rkun 'phrog par byed pa bzlog /dge spyong rnams kyis blangs nas dga'/ /mkhas pa dge sbyong 'ongs pa la/ /mngon par dga' bar byed 'gyur zhing / /skye bo rnams ni ci rigs
par/ /dad pa ji bzhin sbyin byed cig /gzhan gyi zas dang skom de la/ /gang zhig yin ni mi bde ba/ /des ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /ting 'dzin thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /
gang gis ta la'i mgo bcad ltar/ /de 'dra kun tu gcod byed pa/ /des ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /ting nge 'dzin dag thob par 'gyur/ /khron pa skam po ji lta bar/ /dad pa
med pa bsten mi bya/ /ji ste de la yongs brkos kyang / /'dam chu dring 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu mang rnam par dad pa dang / /bsil bar gyur cing rnyog med pa'i/ /mtsho la chu 'dod ji
lta bar/ /shes rab can gyis dad ldan pa sten/ /chags sam ma chags kyang rung ste/ /de yis thub sku mi nges pas/ /ma dad pa dag spang bar bya/ /dad pa rnams ni nye bar bsten/ /
dad pa'i tshems te bcu pa'o// //sdom la/ mi rtag 'dod dang sred pa dang / /bag yod de bzhin dga' ba dang / /tshul khrims legs spyod tshig dag dang / /
las dang dad pa de dag bcu/ /bram zes 'dod pa rab spang zhing / /brtson 'grus kyis ni rgyun chod cig/ 'dod pa rab tu ma spangs par/ /thub pa gcig
gis ma thob bo/ /kun tu rgyu ba zhan pa dag/ nyon mongs phyir yang kun gsog pas/ /brtson 'grus brtan po kho na yis/ /bya ba de nyid byed la rag/ zhan pa'i las ni ji snyed
dang / /kun nas nyon mongs dka' thub dang / /tshangs spyod yongs su ma dag de/ /don chen 'gyur snyam mi byed do/ /ji ltar mda' ni gzung nyes pas/ /lag pa chod par gyur pa
ltar/ /dge slong bsrung pa bya nyes dang / /dmyal bar nye bar khrid par byed/ /ji ltar mda' ni bzung legs pas/ /lag pa chod par mi 'gyur ltar/ /dge sbyong bsrung ba bya legs
na| |mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ /dge sbyong rnam par ma shes dang / /rgal bar dka' dang bzod dka' dang / /gang dag zhan pa 'gyod 'gyur ba'i/ /sdug bsngal mang
po de dag 'byung / /yang dang yang du 'gyod pa yi/ /kun rtog dbang du 'gro ba yi/ /sems ni zlog pa ma byas par/ /dge sbyong spyod pa ji ltar bya/ /nyes par rab byung nyes
dga' ba/ /khyim 'dug nyes rtsom byed pa dag/ sdug bsngal mnyam med sten pa dang / /yang srid sdug bsngal sogs par zad/ /tshem bu dur smrig gyon pa dang / /phal
