par rnam par grol rnams kyi/ /'gro ba gdags su med pa yin/ /gang zhig khong na 'khrug pa med pa dang / /gang zhig sred dang sred min las log pa/ /de dag 'jigs bral
bde zhing mya ngan med/ /lhas kyang blta zhing bsam du med par 'gyur/ /'di na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang / /rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/ /
skye bo skye bo'i sems la rab chags shing / /cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /'di na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang / /rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/ /skye bo
skye bo'i lus la rab chags shing / /cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /skye bo ci med yon tan rtogs pa dang / /skye bo ci yang med par gyur pa bde/ /skye bo skye bo'i sems
la rab chags shing / /cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /skye bo ci med yon tan rtogs pa dang / /skye bo ci yang med par gyur pa bde/ /skye bo skye bo'i lus la rab chags
shing / /cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /gzhan gyi dbang gyur kun sdug ste/ /rang dbang yod pa thams cad bde/ /sbyor ba shin tu spang dka' ba/ /thun mong gyur
pas brlag par zad/ /zhen par gyur pa'i mi nang na/ /zhen pa med par gnas pa dang / /zhen pa'i nang na ma zhen pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /nad kyis thebs pa'i
mi nang na/ /nad med par ni gnas pa dang / /nad pa'i nang na nad med pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /'tshe ba can gyi mi nang na/ /'tshe ba med par gnas pa dang / /
'tshe ba'i nang na 'tshe med pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /gnod sems can gyi mi nang na/ /gnod sems med par gnas pa dang / /gnod sems can nang gnod med pa/ /kye
ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /sha khon can gyi mi nang na/ /sha khon med par gnas pa dang / /sha khon can nang 'khon med pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /mi thi la dag rab
bsregs kyang / /nga la ci yang tshig pa med/ /nga la gang dag ci med pas/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /nga la ci yang med mod kyi/ /dga' ba za bar byed pas na/ /'od gsal
gyi ni lha bzhin du/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /'jig tshogs la ni mi rten pas/ /nga la ci yang med mod kyi/ /dga' ba za bar byed pas na/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar
'tsho| |len pa'i rkyen gyis phrad cing reg 'gyur gyi/ /len med ci dang phrad cing reg med pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i bde sdug gis/ /dgon pa'am grong du reg
par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'di na bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /skyes bu dam pa mtho dman mi 'gyur zhing / /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu yis mi 'khyal bar/ /skyes bu dam
pa kun tu 'gro bar byed/ /bde ba'i tshoms te sum cu pa'o// //ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ gzung bar dka' zhing yang ba dang //
gang du dga' bar 'gro ba yis/ /sems dul ba ni legs pa ste/ /sems dul ba yis bde ba 'dren/ /bdud kyi gzhi dag spong ba na/ /chu bo'i gnas
nas rab bton te/ /thang la bor ba'i nya lta bur/ /bdag gi sems ni yongs su g.yo/ /nyi ma las ni 'od zer ltar/ /bdag gi sems ni so sor rgyug/ de dag mkhas pas
des bzlog ste/ /lcags kyu yis ni glang chen bzhin/ /nga la don med spyod pa dang / /bltar med snying po med pa de/ /rtag tu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sems de la ni nga smra'o/ /
sems 'di sngon chad ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /dga' dgur spyod cing rgyu bar byed pa dag/ glang chen myos la mi yis lcags kyu ltar/ /de ni tshul bzhin bya bas de bzung ngo / /
khang khyim byed pa 'di yis ni/ /yang yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal can/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba du ma zhig/ da ltar phan chad khyod kyi phyung / /khang khyim byed pa khyod mthong bas/ /
khyim gyi gdung chen rnams bcom la/ /phyam rnams thams cad bcag nas su/ /phyin chad khyim byed mi gzhug go/ sems ni 'du byed dang bral nas/ /'di nyid la
ni zad par 'dod/ /sems ni g.yo zhing rdzun pa ste/ /ring du 'gro zhing bzlog dka' ba/ /mda' mkhan me yis srong ba ltar/ /yid gzhungs pa yis bsrang bar bya/ /gang
zhig lus med phug na gnas/ /gcig pu rgyu zhing ring 'gro ba'i/ /sems de 'dul bar byed pa ni/ /'jigs pa che las thar bar 'gyur/ /log pa'i smon ldan sems gang gis/ /
bdag nyid sdug bsngal byed 'gyur ba'i/ /de ltar 'khon gyis 'khon can dang / /dgra bos dgra la'ang byed mi 'gyur/ /yang dag smon ldan sems gang gis/ /bdag nyid bde bar byed
'gyur ba/ /de ltar pha dang ma dag dang / /gnyen gzhan gyis kyang byed mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms
pa| |'dod chags rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /'dod chags
rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /zhe sdang rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji
ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgom pa'i sems/ /zhe sdang rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs
nyes na| |char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /gti mug rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa
rnam par mi 'dzag par/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /gti mug rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /
char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /nga rgyal rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi
'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /nga rgyal rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes pa/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin
sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /chags pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms
pa'i sems/ /chags pa rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /sred pa rnams
kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /sred pa rnams kyis yong mi
choms/ /chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/ /yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/ /gal te yid rab gdug pa yis/ /smras sam yang na byas kyang rung / /de yis de ni sdug
bsngal 'thob/ /'khor los mgo bo bcad pa bzhin/ /chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/ /yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/ /gal te yid rab dang pa yis/ /smras sam yang na byas kyang
rung / /de yi de ni bde ba 'thob/ /grib ma rjes su 'brang ba bzhin/ /brtsad pa ched cher 'dzin pa dang / /sems ni nyon mongs gyur pa yis/ /glags skabs tshol bar byed pa yis/ /legs
bshad legs par mi shes so/ /sdang ba'am yang na 'khrug pa'am/ /dad pa med pa'i sems dag gis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yi/ /dam chos kun shes mi nus so/ /
gang gis bag med sems dang ni/ /khro ba rnam par btul ba dang / /'di na gnod sems rab spangs pa/ /des ni legs par bshad pa shes/ /sems kyi brtan pa med pa yis/ /
dam chos rnam par shes mi 'gyur/ /dad pa 'gyur ldog byed pa yi/ /shes rab yongs su rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /kun rtog la chums rten pa yi/ /lha ngan sum cu rtsa drug gi/ chu bo'i
rgyun ni gang yin pa/ /yid kyi rgyun las rab tu 'bab/ /dga' sems dbang po phal pa dang / /sems kyi rjes 'brang zhan pa yi/ /mi de'i grags 'grib 'bras lhags pa'i/ /ljon
shing la ni bya bzhin no/ /sems khyod phung khrol 'dod la dga' ma byed/ /brtson sems bag yod pa la gnas par gyis/ /bag med byas pas dmyal bar btsos pa dang / /lcags
gong mid pas khyod ni ma du zhig/ ldang ba'i dus tshe 'dug par byed pa dang / /lang tsho stobs ldan mi 'bad khyim 'dug dang / /bsam pa rdzogs tshe le lo
byed pa yi/ /mi yi shes rab lam rtogs mi 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs rnam rtog zhib mor rnam rtog pas/ /nang na gnas pa'i yid ni g.yen yang spyo/ /yid kyi rnam rtog de
dag ma shes na/ /'khrul sems yang dang yang du rgyug par byed/ /gang zhig dran ldan rnam 'byed brtson pa dang / /rnam par rtog la mkhas pas de shes na/ /nang na gnas
pa'i yid ni g.yen spyo ba/ /thams cad ma lus blo yis rab tu spong / /lus 'di bum pa 'dra bar rtogs byas shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /
shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprang de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /'jig rten 'di dag bum pa 'drar rtogs shing / /de bzhin chos rnams
smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /lus 'di dbu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing //
grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /'jig rten 'di dag
dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /gang
gis byang chub yan lag bdun/ /sems kyis legs par bsgoms pa dang / /gang zhig len la mi dga' zhing / /len pa rab tu spangs pa dang / /zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/ /
'jig rten dag na mya ngan 'das/ /gang zhig g.yag rnga'i rtse mo ltar/ /rang gi sems ni rjes srung zhing / /'byung po rnams la brtser ldan pa/ /de yi bde ba yongs mi nyams/ /gang
phyir glang po'i glang po che/ /mche ba bzang po'i glang chen dang / /sems dang sems mi mnyam pas na/ /de phyir gcig pu nags su dgyes/ /gang gi yid la gnod med cing / /
'byung po kun la brtse ba dang / /'byung po rnams la byams byed pa/ /de la nam yang 'khon mi 'byung / /gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing / /'byung po kun la brtse ba dang //
srog chags kun la byams byed pa/ /de la nam yang 'khon mi 'byung / /gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing / /'byung po rnams la brtse ba dang / /sems can kun la byams
byed pa/ /de la nam yang 'khon mi 'gyur/ /mdza' bshes kun dang grogs kun dang / /'byung po kun la brtse ba dang / /byams pa'i sems ni bsgom byas na/ /bde ba shin tu
'phel bar 'gyur/ /gal te gang zhig srog chags 'ga' la'ang sdang med sems/ /byams par byed na de yis de ni dge ba yin/ /sems can
thams cad la ni yid kyis brtse byas na/ /bsod nams phal cher 'phags pas rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/ /mi gang dga' ba'i sems dang ni/ /zhum pa med pa'i yid
kyis su/ /dge ba'i chos la sgom byed pa/ /grub pa dang ni bde ba 'thob/ /yang dag shes pas rnam grol zhing / /skyo ba nye bar zhi gyur pa/ /de yi yid ni zhi gyur cing / /lus
dang ngag gi las kyang zhi/ /ji ltar rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /chos rnams legs par mthong ba ltar/ /sil snyan yan lag lnga pas kyang / /de ltar dga' ba byed mi
'gyur/ /gang yid ting 'dzin la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dod pas rtse mi byed/ /gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/ /skyob pa bde bar nyal bar 'gyur/ /gang yid ting
'dzin la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dod pas rtsen mi byed/ /gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/ /thub pa kye ma'o dga' bar 'gyur/ /gang gi sems ni brag lta bur/ /rab
tu g.yo ba med 'dug pa/ /chags pa'i gnas la mi chags te/ /khro ba'i gnas la 'khrug med par/ /gang yid de ltar gyur pa de/ /sdug bsngal thob par ga la
'gyur| |skur ba mi gdab gnod mi bya/ /so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/ /zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/ /bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing / /lhag pa'i sems la rnal 'byor
bya| |'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /sems kyi rtags la mkhas pa dang / /rab tu dben pa'i ro rnyed dang / /rab drang sems pa'i 'grus skyong can/ /zang zing med pa'i dga' ba myong /
gang zhig yid gzhungs dben dga' dben gnas pas/ /rtag tu rang gi lus kyis spyod lam dang / /smra dang yid ni srung bar byed pa de/ /mya ngan spong zhing sdug bsngal 'thob mi
'gyur| |ma bsrungs pa yi sems dang ni/ /log par lta bas bcom pa dang / /gnyid dang rmugs pas zil non pa/ /bdud kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bas sems ni bsrung
byas te| |yang dag lta bas mdun bdar cing / /yang dag kun rtog spyod yul can/ /yang dag skye dang 'jig pa shes/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa zil gnon pa'i/ /dge slong sdug
bsngal zad pa 'thob/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu sems can dmyal bar 'tshed/ /
bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu dud 'gro rnams su 'tshed/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba
dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag/ gcig tu yi dwags rnams su 'tshed/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /
sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba dag / gcig tu mi yi nang du dga'/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /
skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba dag/ gcig tu mtho ris rnams su dga'/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba
dag /gcig tu mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /sems kyi tshoms te sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/ /'drangs par
byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/ /rtag tu nyer zhi dran dang ldan pa yi/ /skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' bar byed/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/ /'drangs par
byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/ /skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' byed kyi/ /bkur sti nor dang grags 'dod rnams la min/ /dge slong 'dod pa kun spangs shing / /mdun
na gnas pa'i rdul bsal ba/ /bdag med thub pa brtan pa yis/ /gzhan la smra bar bya mi dgos/ /skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/ /mi bzad rjod pa'i
tshig de thos gyur kyang / /dge slong sdang sems bral la ji mi snyam/ /g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ /skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/ /mi bzad rjod
pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang / /dge slong yid legs bzhag la ji mi snyam/ /g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ /bzo yis mi 'tsho yang zhing bdag la dga'/ /
dbang po dul zhing kun las rnam grol zhing / /khyim la ma chags bag med 'dod sred spangs/ /gcig pu spyod byed de ni dge slong yin/ /'tsho gtsang snyom las med pa yi/ /grogs
po mthun pa bsten bya zhing / /so sor mgo bsha' bya ba dang / /spyod yul cho ga mkhas par bya/ /lag pa legs bsdams rkang pa legs bsdams dang / /tshig rnams legs
bsdams dbang po legs bsdams shing / /gcig pu nang du mnyam par 'jog la dga'/ /chog shes de ni dge slong yin zhes gsung / /dge slong chos la kun dga' zhing / /
chos dga' chos la sems pa dang / /chos la rjes su dran pa dag/ chos las yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge slong khang stong zhugs nas su/ /nang la lta bar byed pa dang //
chos rnams legs par mthong ba dag/ lha yi dga' dang ldan par 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar phung po la/ /skye dang 'jig par legs rtogs pa/ /de lta de ltar de yis ni/ /
dga' dang mgu ba nyid kyang 'thob/ /dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/ /sdug bsngal zad par thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis
rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong 'dod chags dag /zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong
zhe sdang dag/ zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong gti mug dag/ zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji
ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong nga rgyal dag/ zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gi rab tu mi g.yos
ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong chags pa dag /zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong sred pa dag/ zad
pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /gang la kun tu gsog med cing / /gang la bdag gir byed med pa/ /gang dag med na'ang mi gdung ba/ /de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/ /re zhig
gzhan la slong ba tsam/ /ji ga dge slong min pa snyam/ /grong ba'i chos ni 'dzin byed pa/ /jig dge slong min pa snyam/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dag/ rab spangs tshangs
par spyod ldan zhing / /sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa/ /de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pa/ /des ni blta
bas mi ngoms pa'i/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad de/ /'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang
thob par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pa/ /des ni kun sbyor kun zad pa/ /rim gyis mngon sum byed par 'gyur/ /dge slong
gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pas/ /bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'dren te/ /'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/ /dge slong gang zhig byams
gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pas/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de/ /rlung gis ljon shing lom bzhin/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs
rgyas bstan la rab dad pas/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /sems dga' yid ni bzang ba dang / /dga' dang mi dga' zil gnon pa'i/ /
dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/ /sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /lus zhi ngag ni zhi ba dang / /sems zhi legs par mnyam bzhag cing / /'jig rten zang zing spangs pa
yi| |dge slong nyer zhi yin zhes brjod/ /ting 'dzin med la shes rab med/ /shes rab med la ting 'dzin med/ /shes rab ting 'dzin ldan pa de/ /
dge slong yin zhes brjod par bya/ /de bas ting 'dzin shes rab la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis 'jug bya ste/ /de bzhin shes rab dge slong de'i/ /dang por bya ba 'di yin no/ /
chog shes dbang po bsdam bya zhing / /so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/ /zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/ /bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing / /lhag pa'i sems la rnal
'byor bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /gang gi lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med gyur pa/ /de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims can/ /ngo tsha'i yid ldan dge slong
yin| |gang gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /phyogs kyi chos bdun legs bsgom pa/ /de ni dge ba'i chos can de/ /mnyam gzhag dge slong yin zhes gsung / /'di na
gang zhig bdag nyid kyi/ /sdug bsngal zad pa rab shes la/ /dge zhing shes rab ldan pa de/ /zag med dge slong yin zhes gsung / /zag pa zad pa ma thob na/ /tshul
khrims brtul zhugs tsam dag gam/ /yang na thos pa mang po'am/ /dben pa dag tu gnas kyang rung / /ting 'dzin thob par gyur kyang ngal/ /rdeng drod chod pa'i dge
slong min/ /phung po la ni bdag zer ba'i/ /'jig rten 'di dag gdung ba ste/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba ni/ /'phags pas bsten pa mngon du bya/ /ji lta ji ltar bsam byas pa/ /
de lta de ltar gzhan du 'gyur/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /sred pa la chags srid la dga'/ /srid la mngon chags srid la dga'/ /srid pa nyid la mngon par dga'//
dga' bya gang yin de sdug bsngal/ /spyi g.ya' gang yin de bde bas/ /srid pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/ /'di na tshangs par spyod pa ste/ /dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa/ /srid pas
srid las nges 'byung zer/ /de dag thams cad srid pa las/ /nges 'byung min zhes brjod par bya/ /dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa/ /srid pas srid las nges byung zer/ /de dag thams
cad srid pa las/ /rnam grol min zhes brjod par bya/ /len pa'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal byung / /sdug bsngal las ni len pa byung / /len pa thams cad yongs zad na/ /sdug
bsngal rab tu 'byung ba med/ /len pa thams cad na srid pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no
zhes de ltar de dag la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mthong na/ /sred pa'i sred pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur zhing / /srid pa med pas mngon par mi dga' bar
'gyur ro/ /de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong skyob pa ni gzhan du len pa med cing yang srid med par 'gyur te/ bdud zil gyis non pa dang /
g.yul las rgyal ba dang / srid pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa 'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /nye bar zhi zhing
sems zhi ba/ /de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /nye bar zhi zhing sems zhi ba/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching
las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/ /de ni yang srid med pa ste/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam
par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos
po bcad pa dang / /srid pa'i sred pa gtubs gyur pa/ /de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /srid pa'i
sred pa bcad gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa
pa dang / /'dod chags zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /zhe sdang zad pa rjes thob
pa| |de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /gti mug zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes
brjod| |gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /nga rgyal zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs
brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /chags pa zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dab rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma
dkrugs pa dang / /sred pa zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig gshe ba dang ni gsod pa dang / /'ching dang grong gi tsher ma thul ba dang / /gang zhig
ri bo bzhin gnas mi bkri zhing / /sdug des mi g.yo de ni dge slong yin/ /skur pa mi 'debs sgro 'dogs mi byed cing / /'jig rten 'di kun rdzun rtogs dge slong gang / /de ni
pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /'dod chags langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /
de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sprul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /zhe sdang langs pa 'dul ba'i
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sprul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /gti mug langs pa 'dul ba'i
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sprul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /nga rgyal langs pa 'dul ba'i dge
slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang pa la sman bzhin du/ /chags pa langs pa 'dul ba'i
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /khro ba langs pa 'dul ba'i
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /sred pa langs pa 'dul ba'i
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /'dod chags ma lus drungs
'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /zhe sdang ma lus drungs 'byin
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /gti mug ma lus drungs 'byin
dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /nga rgyal ma lus drungs 'byin dge
slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /chags pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge
slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /sred pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge
slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad spong byed cing / /'dod sbyor 'ching ba rnams
bsal dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs shing sdig med pa/ /yid gnyis zug rngu
bcad pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /rtog pa rnam bsal nang gi ma lus la/ /
rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /nags sbyor byed pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /rtsa
ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /rims nad bcas pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /
rtsa ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /bags la nyal ba 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /rtsa
ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /khrims ldan gang yin dge slong de/ /stong nyid
gang ldan bsam gtan de/ /rtag tu byed gang rnal 'byor de/ /mya ngan 'das gang bde ba de/ /dge slong dga' dang mi dgas mi brjod cing / /bas mtha'i gnas mal
dag tu sten pa dang / /de ni bag yod gnas shing sred pa yi/ /'dod chags phra rgyas legs par 'byin par byed/ /dge slong gi tshoms te sum cu gnyis pa'o// //
gang zhig brgyan kyang chos spyod dul ba dang / /zhi zhing yang dag sdom la tshangs bar spyod/ /'byung po kun la chad pas mi gcod de/ /bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong de/ /gcer
bur spyod pas ma yin ral bas ma yin rdzab kyis min/ /kha zas mi za ba yis ma yin thang la nyal ba'am/ /rdul dang dri mas ma yin tsog pur 'dug la 'bad pa yis/ /mi rnams
dag par mi 'gyur som nyi rnams las rgal mi 'gyur/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob par/ /bar ma dor ni rnam
par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /tshor ba zad pa ma thob par/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang
rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed cing / /byis pa mtha' gcig la lta ba/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa//
byis pa'i skye bo blo ngan rnams/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /go 'phang dam pa ma thob par/ /bar ma
dor ni rnam par nyams/ /blo ngan na khyod kyi ral pa ci/ /khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/ /khyod nang thibs por 'dug bzhin du/ /phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/ /blo ngan khyod
kyi ral pa ci/ /khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/ /khyod nang dri ma ldan bzhin du/ /phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/ /rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/ /
ral bas ma yin rus kyis min/ /gang zhig bden pa'i chos ldan pa/ /gtsang ma de yin bram ze yin/ /rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/ /ral pas ma yin
rus kyis min/ /gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag/ sdig ba rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /bram ze yin zhes nges par brjod/ /mgo bo bregs
tsam dge sbyong min/ /oM zhes zer ba bram zer min/ /gang zhig dge ba'i chos ldan pa/ /gtsang ma de yin bram ze de/ /mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/ /oM zhes
zer ba bram ze min/ /gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag /sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir te/ /dge sbyong bram ze de yin no/ /skye bo phal cher
'dir 'khru ba/ /chu yis dag par mi 'gyur te/ /gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag/ sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /dge sbyong
bram ze de yin no/ /gang zhig sdig chos rab spangs shing / /rtag tu dran ldan spyod byed pa/ /kun sbyor zad pa'i sangs rgyas de/ /'jig rten dag na bram ze yin/ /bram ze
gang zhig sdig pa'i chos spangs shing / /bdag nyid tshul 'chos med cing rnyog med gnas/ /rig byed mthar phyin tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /dus su smra byed de ni tshangs pa smra/ /
gang zhig rgyu la mi gnas nga rgyal med/ /gang zhig chags med bdag med re ba med/ /'khrug bcom bdag nyid mya ngan 'das phyogs te/ /bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong
de| |gang zhig ma yi mngal skyes nas/ /gal te 'dzin pa dang bcas nas/ /de ming bu zhes smra bar bstan/ /bram ze yin par nga mi smra/ /yongs su 'dzin med len med de/ /
bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid kyis nyes byas mi byed cing / /gang zhig gnas gsum legs bsdams de/ /bram ze yin par
ngas gsungs so/ /gang gi tshig dag mi rtsub cing / /go byed yid 'ong smra ba dang / /gang gis nyon mongs mi skyed de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig gsod
'ching gshe ba dang / /sdang ba min la bzod byed de/ /bzod pa'i brtul zhugs stobs tshogs can/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /khro ba med cing tshul khrims can//
brtul zhugs ldan zhing sems khral med/ /dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig rab byung khyim pa dang / /de bzhin gnyis kar
mi 'dre zhing / /'dod chung khyim nas ma byung de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/ /'das pa rnams la gdung med
pa| |'khrig pa'i sbyor bral g.yul rgyal de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/ /'das la gdung med rdul bral zhing / /zhi ba mya ngan
med pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'dod chung gzhan mi gso/ /dul zhing snying por rab gnas la/ /zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/ /bram ze
yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig pha rol tshu rol dang / /pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing / /chos rnams kun gyi mthar phyin de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang
zhig pha rol tshu rol dang / /pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing / /gang zhig gnas gsum ma chags de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig thung dang ring ba dang //
phra spom dge dang mi dge dang / /'jig rten cung zad mi len de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'di nyid rab shes shing / /rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa dang //
'dod chags bral zhing mi ldan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dang / /gnyis ka yis kyang mi gos pa/ /gos med rdul bral zhi
pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa'i las/ /chags gang yin de rab 'das shing / /chags las rab 'das rnam grol de/ /bram ze yin par
ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sngon dang phyi ma dang / /dbus kyang yod pa ma yin pa/ /rdul bral 'ching ba las grol te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la chu
ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /gang zhig sdig la mi gnas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar
ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod la mi gnas te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs
de| |bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dad pa ltar/ /gang zhig sdig pas mi gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /
zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dad pa ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dad
pa ltar/ /sred la dga' ba yongs spangs te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /gang zhig sdig pas mi
gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos de//
bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs
so| |gang zhig 'dug nas rdul bral ba/ /sems shing zag zad bya ba byas/ /dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /shes rab zab cing
yid gzhungs la/ /lam dang lam min rnams la mkhas/ /gang zhig don mchog rjes thob de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /mi ni gang yang rung ba dag/ slong mo
tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / /bdag med su la'ang gnod mi byed/ /brtan ldan tshangs par spyod pa can/ /kun shes spyad phyir chos ston de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so//
gang zhig 'dod pa legs spangs shing / /khyim med par ni rab byung ste/ /'dod pa'i zag pa yongs zad de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa
yig 'byung po chad pas mi gcod cing / /gsod med gsod du mi 'jug de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig mi mthun mthun byed cing / /chad pas
gcod pa dang du len/ /'byung po rnams la brtse phan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal 'chang
bar 'joms pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sred pa'i rdzong 'di dang / /'khor ba'i klung las rab brgal cing / /rgal nas pha rol 'gro bar sems/ /yid nyid
kyis ni mi bkri zhing / /gang zhig len pa las log de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /pha rol na yang sred med cing / /sred pa'i sred pa
yongs zad de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /pha rol la yang chags med cing / /chags med rnam par bral ba de/ /bram ze yin
par ngas gsungs so/ /dga' dang mi dga' spangs pa dang / /bsil bar gyur cing zag pa med/ /'jig rten kun zil gnon brtan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /mi
yi sbyor ba spangs nas su/ /lha yi sbyor ba rab 'das shing / /sbyor ba kun dang rnam bral de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lha dang dri za dang / /mi yi 'gro ba mi
shes shing / /zhi ba 'gro ba mi shes de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis chos rnams mi shes pa'am/ /ma mthong ba ni med gyur la/ /shes bya mtha' yas lta ba
de| |bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis sngon gyi gnas rtogs shing / /mtho ris ngan song mthong ba dang / /de nas skye ba zad thob pa'i/ /thub pa
mngon shes la brtson pa/ /sdug bsngal tha ma rab shes de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /sems kyi rnam grol shes pa dang / /'dod chags kun las grol ba dang / /rig
pa gsum dang ldan pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis sems can 'chi 'pho dang / /skye ba thams cad rtogs gyur pa/ /thogs med spyan ldan sangs rgyas de//
bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig kun sbyor kun 'das shing / /yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / /dga' med dran ldan ston pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so//
thub pa rnam rgyal drang srong che/ /khyu mchog rab mchog glang po che/ /bkrir med khrus byas sangs rgyas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig srid 'das kun zil
gnon| |chu bo las brgal rnam par 'dren/ /rnam grol pha rol phyin pa de/ /bram ze yin pas ngas gsungs so/ /sdig can rnam par mi sems shing / /mi sgom smra bar mi
byed par/ /'dug nas rdul bral sems pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig phyag dar khrod 'chang zhing / /ngo tsha shes shing 'dod mi lta/ /shing drung dag tu
gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir/ /zhi ba 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/ /drang po sgom par byed pa de/ /bram ze yin par
ngas gsungs so/ /gang la cung zad gnas med cing / /kun shes yid gnyis zug rdu med/ /'chi med go 'phang mthong ba de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lus
med phug na gnas/ /gcig pu rgyu zhing ring du 'gro/ gdul par dka' ba'i sems 'dul de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig gzugs med pa ltar
med mtha' yas la/ /shin tu bltar med phra zhing gzhi mngon rtogs/ /rtag dran kun sbyor zad rgyu sangs rgyas pa/ /'jig rten 'di na de ni bram ze yin/ /gang gis sog mig
'ching gtubs te/ /chings ma rgyang thag bcad nas su/ /yongs su gdung spangs sangs rgyas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis rnyed 'dod sdig can dang / /sog
mig chings ma gtubs gyur cing / /sred pa rtsar bcas drungs phyung de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /brtson pas chu bo'i rgyun bcad cing / /'dod pa thams cad rab
bcom dang / /'du byed rnams kyi zad shes pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sgra can gnyis dang / /yul 'khor 'khor
dang bcas bcom pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /mi bzad pa yi stag
bsad pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /gang zhig bram ze rdeg pa blun/ /skrod par byed pa de ngan pas/ /bram ze rnams la brdeg mi bya/ /bram ze bskrad bar mi bya'o/ /gang
zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/ /rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /de la bkur zhing phyag bya ste/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/ /
rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /de la bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bstan pa'i chos rnams
rnam shes na/ /de la bkur zhing phyag byas ste/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na/ /de la
bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe sha za ba ku la/ /gcig po las kyang shin
tu 'das/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe des mthong tshor ba rnams/ /thams cad nub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams
kyi| |pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe de yis mthong bas na/ /rkyen rnams thams cad nub par gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe de yis
mthong bas na/ /kun sbyor thams cad nub par gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyis/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe skye dang rga ba dang / /'chi ba rnams las shin tu 'das/ /
nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ /mtshan mo zla ba snang ba ltar/ /rgyal rigs go chas chas pa gsal/ /bram ze sems par byed na gsal/ /nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ /
mtshan mo zla ba snang byed ltar/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas gzi brjid can/ /nyin dang mtshan du gsal bar byed/ /ji ltar mi sdug pa las yid ldog pa/ /de 'dra bram ze rnams la cung
zad med/ /ji lta ji ltar de yi yid ldog pa/ /de lta de ltar kun rdzob bden par zad/ /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis chos rnams rgyur bcas rab shes
pa| |chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis sdug bsngal rgyur bcas rab
shes pa/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis tshor ba zad pa 'thob
'gyur pa/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas 'bad pa na/ /gang gis
rkyen rnams zad par 'thob 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis
zag pa dad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /ji ltar mkha'
la nyi ma shar ba ltar/ /'jig rten thams cad snang byed 'dug 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /blo
yis kun sbyor rnams las rab grol te/ /bdud sdo rnam par bsal nas 'dug 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bram ze'i tshoms te sum
cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //sdom la/ de bzhin gshegs dang thos dang bdag/ bsgre dang mdza' bshes lnga pa'o/ /mya ngan 'das dang mthong ba dang / /sdig
dang phrugs dang bde ba dang / /sems dang dge slong cho mas dag dang / /bram ze yang ni tha ma yin/ /ched du brjod pa'i tshoms dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA pra b+ha ka ra dang / lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas
gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa dzA na pu ru Sha sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
te| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ lnga po 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sbyin pa dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dge slong dag /
skyes bu dam pa ni dad pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin/ gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas dang / dus su gzhan dag la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /dge slong
dag/ dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ dad pas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/ nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba yin/
nor gyi yo byad mang ba yin/ bdag dbang pa'i slong che ba yin/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / mdzed dang / bde ba'i tshogs mang ba yin/ bran dang / bran mo
dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin te/ dge slong dag/
dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang
zhe na/ /gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/
bu dang / chung ma dag dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang gus par
byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ dge slong dag/ gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ rang gi lag pa nas sbyin/
pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por gyur pa nas mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag
gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i khyim gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la'ang sems 'jug pa yin/ zas kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang /
theg pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / gos kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / mal cha'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rgya
chen dag la'ang sems 'jug pa yin no/ /dge slong dag/ rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge song dag/ dus su byin
pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ dus su byin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin pa nas/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen
mtshams mang po'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i nor dag kyang dus su thob pa dang / mang zhing mthun pa mngon du byung ba yin te/ dge slong dag/ dus su byin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam
par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ gzhan la mi gnod par
sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin pa nas/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i longs spyod gang dag
brtson 'grus brtsams pas thob pa lags/ mthus bsgrubs pa rdul zhing dri ma chags chags su bsgrubs pa/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyis thob pa de dag la'ang rgyal po'am/
rkun po'am/ me'am/ chu'am/ mi 'dza' ba bgo skal la spyod pa'am/ gang las kyang bar chad mi 'byung ba yin te/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin
pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di la 'dod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs nas/ 'di
ltar ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dad cing gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas/ /dus su gnod pa med par mkhas pa sbyin pa byed/ /sbyin pa rgya che
ba dang | chen po 'dir byin nas/ /kun bged byed pa de ni bzang 'gror 'gro ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha rmA ga ra dang / lo ts+tsha
ba ban+de bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis// //rgya gar skad du/ nan+da pra pra dz+yA sU tra/ bod skad du/ /dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i
mdo/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang / sham thabs man bas te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / ser skya'i
gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshur
gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/ /de nas rigs
kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo/ ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
gis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu sel ba yin no/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mtshang
'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo'i nu pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no/ /lo tog thams cad kyis gzhi
lta bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin no/ /yin tan thams cad kyi go
'phang gi gnas yin no/ /sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no/ /'byung po thams cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no/ /srog chags thams cad la mi 'jigs pa
sbyin pa yin no/ /sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa bzang po yin no/ /skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no/ /kun tu tshol bas phongs pa dang / sdug bsngal
gyis nyam thag pa rnams kyi bstis yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba yin no/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis
bsngags pa yin no/ /thar pa 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no/ /sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen par bya ba yin no/ /snod du gyur pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin no//
ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yin no/ /mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo 'byed pa yin no/ /lha'i 'gro ba rnams kun tu 'grengs pa yin no/ /sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu
gcod pa yin no/ /sred pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo/ de ni rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta
ba'i khyim yin no/ /thar pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no/ /rgyun nye bar gcod pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa yin
no| |phra rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no/ /lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba yin no/ /bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yin no/ /'khor ba'i
'khor lo ldog par byed pa yin no/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa yin no/ /nu zho'i rgya mtsho skems pa yin no/ /rus pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin no/ /phung po'i khur 'joms pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no/ /khyim gyi gzeb tu bcing pa rnams rnam par
grol bar byed pa yin no/ /gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin no/ /theg tshom rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyur pa rnams gcod pa yin no/ /rga shis
'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no/ /sdug pa dang / bral bzad par byed pa yin no/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses pa rnams kyi bde ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i 'gram
yin no/ /'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i
khams las rnam par rgal par byed pa yin no/ /de dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te/ dga' bo/ de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'o/ /'jig rten
thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin no/ /gti mug gi mug pa'i sgron ma yin no/ /rgyud dag par byed pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /
lam stor ba rnams la lam kun tu ston pa yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no/ /mdud pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa
thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no/ /mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib ba'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no/ /le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la rtsom par byed pa yin no/ /
tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams
mchog tu dga' ba yin no/ /nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed
pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no/ /gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /
skyo ba pa med pa rnams kyi skye ba pa yin no/ /'jigs pas 'brel ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs par byed pa yin no/ /skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyi bde
ba'i yo byad yin no/ /'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te/ /dga' bo/ de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lha dang / mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa
yin no/ /mi'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa yin no/ /khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam
'dran pa yin no/ /skra'i khur 'dreg pa yin no/ /gos dur smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no/ /rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no/ /'di ni drang
spong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no/ /bdud sdig to can rnams kyi grags pa 'joms pa yin no/ /lha dang / mi rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo/ rab tu byung ba
ni de lta bu yin na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bo/ rab tu byung ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags par bde ba yin na/
dga' bo/ gzhan yang / dal ba thob pa ni bskal pas byed ba brgyar yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed pa
par dka' ba yin no/ /dga' bo/ thar bar 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang / gzhan yang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa rnams
kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo / /de bzhin du khyim bdag dang / bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung
ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni khyim par mchis la sbyin pa dag stsal/ bsod nams dag
byi zhing / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzigs cha dang / snun gyi
gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can las lo ba rgyar 'di lta
ste| chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ dga' bo/ de ni rab tu byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i
sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/ /dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / /dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ /ngal mi mnyes ma byed cig /
dga' bo/ dper na/ sa chen po 'di chu gcig pur rgya mtshor gyur la/ de na rus spal zhar ba gcig kyang yod/ de na gnya' shing bug gcig pa gcig kyang rgya la rus spal
zhar ba de/ 'di skad du/ gnya' shing gi bu ga der mgrin pa chud par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing / gnya' shing bu ga can de'ang rlung gis bskyod nas phyogs phyogs su rgyug par
byed pa na/ dga' bo/ brgya la rkyen zhig gis rus spal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo/ mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no/ /dal ba
yun sum tshogs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ khyod kyis mi nyid shin tu rnyed pa dka' ba dang / bde bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed na/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis rab
tu byung / /dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur na/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ dper na/ 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi mig gnam du bstan te yungs
kar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed na/ dga' bo/ brgya la rkyen zhig gis der yungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur gyi/ dga'
bo| mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ mi nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang / de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs
pa'ang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/ /dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal
ba bye ba stong dang ni/ /brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang / /sangs rgyas sgra ni mi thos na/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba ga la zhig/ u du ma bA ra'i me tog ni/ /shing las shin tu
rnyed dka' ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste/ /khyed kyis nga ni rnyed gyur na/ /dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / /dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dga' bo ston pa
mngon gyur pa/ /ngal mi mnyes ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad
pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rtsa ngas de ben+d+ra rak+Shi tas zhus chen bgyis pa// //rgya gar skad
du| de ba tA sU tra/ bod skad du/ lha'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha mdog bzang po zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba der srong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas lha de'i mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad
snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe lha des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /mtshon cha rnon po de gang lags/ /ha la ha la'i dug gang lags/ /rab tu
'bar ba'i me gang lags/ /mun pa rab gang de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po yin/ /'dod chags ha la ha la'i dug/
zhe sdang rab tu 'bar ba'i me/ /mun pa rab gnag ma rig pa'o/ /lhas gsol pa/ mi yis zin pa de gang lags/ /gang 'dir por ba de gang lags/ /mi shigs go cha ci
zhig lags/ /'di na mtshon du ci rno lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis gang byin zin pa yin/ /khyim du gang bzhag 'dir
bor yin/ /mi shigs go cha bzod pa yin/ /'di na mtshon du shes rab rno/ /lhas gsol pa/ chom rkun zhes bgyi de gang lags/ /dam pa rnams kyi nor gang lags/ /
lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /bslus shes bgyi ba gang dag lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rnam rtog chom rkun mkhas pa yin/ /tshul khrims dam
pa rnams kyi nor/ /gang dag tshul khrims log lhung byas/ /de dag 'jig rten bslus pa yin/ /lhas gsol pa/ /bde zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ /dbang phyug dam pa de
gang lags/ /rtag tu rnam par brgyan pa gang / /mtho ba tsams gang lags bka' stsal gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dod chung bde bar shes
par bya/ /chog shes dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /khrims ldan rtag tu rnam par brgyan/ /tshul khrims nyams pa mtho ba tsams yin/ /lhas gsol pa/ rtsa lag mnyes
gshin de gang lags/ /bsam pa sdang ba'i dgra gang lags/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad de gang lags/ /mchog tu bde ba de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ /rtsa lag mnyes gshin bsod nams yin/ /sdig pa bsam pa sdang ba'i dkra/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog /lhas gsol
pa| sdug la mi phan de gang lags/ /phan yang mi sdug gang zhig lags/ /gnod pa bgyid pa'i nad gang lags/ /sman pa'i mchog gcig de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ /'dod pa sdug kyang mi phan pa/ /thar pa phan mi sdug pa/ /'dod chags gnod pa med pa'i nad/ /sman pa'i mchog gcig sangs rgyas yin/ /lha sa gsol
ba| gang gis 'jig rten 'di bsgribs lags/ /gang gis 'jig rten dbang du bgyis/ /gang gis mdza' bshes 'byed par bgyid/ /gang gis mtho ris mchi mi 'gyur/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mi shes pas ni 'jig rten bsgribs/ /gti mug gis ni dbang du byas/ /zhen pas mdza' bshes 'byed par byed/ /chags pas
mtho ris 'gro mi 'gyur/ /lhas gsol pa/ gang gis mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang gis dgra rnams zhi bar bgyid/ /gang gis mtho ris 'thob par bgyid//
gang gis thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gtong bas mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/ /byams pas dgra rnams zhi bar byed/ /tshul
khrims kyis ni mtho ris thob/ shes pas thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha sa gsol pa/ rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /shin tu bsgrim pa bgyis
gyur na| |skyes pa'am bud med gang gi'ang rung / /dbrog par mi tshugs ci zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /shin
tu bsgrib pa byas gyur kyang / /skyes pa'am bud med gang gi'ang rung / /dbrog par mi tshugs tshul khrims so/ /lha sa gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di ni gang gis 'ching / /gang
gis 'jig rten rnam par grol/ /gang zhig rnam par spangs pas na/ /mya ngan 'das zhes bgyi bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dod pas 'jig rten
'ching par byed/ /'dod pa med pas rnam par grol/ /sred pa rnam par spangs pas na/ /mya ngan 'das zhes brjod pa yin/ /lha sa gsol pa/ rlung dmar gyis kyang mi shigs
shing / /zhugs kyis mi 'tshig de ci lags/ /dog sa gtam par bgyid pa yi/ /chab kyis mi 'drul ci zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rlung
dmar gyis kyang mi shigs shing / /mes kyang mi 'tshig bsod nams yin/ /sa rnams khebs par byed pa yi/ /chus kyang mi 'drul bsod nams so/ /lha sa gsol pa/
su zhig shin tu bslus gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'di nas pha rol mchis/ /da dung bdag gi dogs pa 'di/ /khyod kyis bsal bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| gang gis longs spyod yod bzhin du/ /bsod nams bsags pa ma byas pa/ /de ni shin tu bslus gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'di nas pha rol song / /lha sa gsol pa/ 'jigs
pa kun las 'das gyur cing / /rgal ba'i 'jig rten mthu ldan pa'i/ /bram ze mya ngan yongs 'das pa/ /kye ma bdag gis ring nas mthong / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas lha de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas rjes su yi rangs ste de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /lha'i mdo rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ alpa de ba tA sU tra/ bod skad du/ lha'i mdo nyung du/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas lha zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha des bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus
pa| tshul khrims gang lags spyod pa gang / /yon tan gang lags las gang gis/ /gnas pa ji ltar shes rab gang / /skye bo gang dag mtho ris mchi//
lha la thugs pa rtse nyer bzung nas/ /ston pas de la lung bstan pa/ /skye bo mtho ris gang 'gro ba/ /lha khyod nga la rab tu nyon/ /srog gcod pa las phyir ldog cing / /khrims
bzung yang dag sdom la dga'/ /gang dag 'byung po mi 'tshe ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ gang dag ma byin len spong zhing / /sbyin pa gtong la rtag dga' ste/ /rku ba spong
zhing mi rku ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad mi 'gro/ log par g.yem pa rnam par spong / /bdag gi chung mas chog sems pa/ /skye bo de dag mtho
ris 'gro/ /gzhan gyi don la rku byed dang / /bdag gi phyir dang 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /rdzun gyi tshig rnams mi smra ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ grogs po rtag par 'byed
byed pa/ /phra ma'i tshig rnams rab spong zhing / /gang dag 'dun par rab dga' ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ rgyags la rten cing zhe gcod pa/ /tshig rtsub dag ni rnam
spong zhing / /'jam po'i tshig tu gang smra ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ don med gnas dang ldan pa yi/ /kyal ba'i tshig rnams rab spong zhing / /gang yang dus su chos
smra ba/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro| grong ngam 'on te dgon pa na/ /gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa la/ /de la chags sems gang med la/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ byams pa'i
sems kyis mi 'tshe zhing / /gnod par sems pa med pa yis/ /skye bo kun la mi gnod pa/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ las dang las kyi rnam smin dang / /gnyis ka la yang gang
dad cing / /yang dag lta ba yang dag 'dzin/ /skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /dkar po chos kyi lam bcu ste/ /gang dag yang dag 'dzin 'gyur
ba| |skye bo de dag mtho ris 'gro /bram ze mya ngan 'das pa dang / /dgra dang 'jigs pa kun 'das shing / /'jig rten chags med brgal ba ni/ /mang po yod par ma mthong ngo //
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lha'i mdo nyung du rdzogs so// //
zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ tsan+d+ra sU tra/ bod skad du/ zla ba'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa can na 'gro ba po'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang
po sgra gcan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od kyis bkab par gyur to/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de skrag cing
dngangs la mi dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas lha des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ kun las rnam par rab grol ba'i/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gnod pa dag dang phrad gyur pa/ /
bdag gi skyabs ni mdzad par gsol/ /'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la/ /zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams/ /zla ba thar
mdzod sgra gcan las/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba/ /nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing / /lam mer 'dug la dkar ba
dang / /rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /bar snang dag la ma bzang bar/ /skye dgu'i sgron de myur du thong / /de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de/ /lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur la/ /
nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ /zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed/ /de nas rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan rings pa bas kyang rings par zla
ba'i dkyil 'khor gtong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod/ /lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur la/ /nad pa bzhin du brtad pa
yis| |rings par zla ba gtong bar byed/ sgra gcan gyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di brjod pas/ /gal te zla ba ma btang na/ /bdag gi mgo bo tshal bdun 'gas/ /
gson yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos smras pa/ kye ma bden pa gzigs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba rmad/ /de dag gis ni tshigs su
bcad/ /brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gtong / /zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ kU TA gA ra sU tra/ bod skad du/ khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyen
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag dar bgyis pas
dge ba'i rtsa ba cir 'gyur lags/ dkyil 'khor bgyis pas cir 'gyur lags/ /skyabs su mchi ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyi dge bas
ni cir 'gyur lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba'i sug las kyis ni cir 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'khor bar
bas par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la/ bas ma 'tshal pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gzugs bgyis pas ni cir 'gyur lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ phyag dar byas pa'i phan yon ni lngar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ kun
dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes pa'i las byas shing
bsags pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bo/ kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byed na de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'byung ba'i lus kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga
smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du dkyil 'khor zlum po byed na de nub kyi bal glang spyod kyi gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus
zhig nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems dad pas dkyil 'khor zla gam lta bu
byed na de shar gyi lus 'phags gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la
la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems dad pas dkyil 'khor shing rta'i dbyibs lta bur byed na dzam+bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus
zhig nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / gang chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs
su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos nas yongs su srung bar byed na/ kun dga' bo/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i bsod nams ni dpag tu med cing grangs med par nga smra ste/
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mtha' gzung bar mi nus par nga smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo'i sems thugs su chud nas ljags pad+ma dmar po'i 'dab ma dri ma med cing lo ma 'jam pa dang / mtshal dmar po dang / shing mya ngan
'tshang gi lo ma dang / zangs kyi glegs ma srab mo dang 'dra la chu zheng gab pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dbu'i skra mtshams la thug pa'i bar thams cad du brkyang nas kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa smra ba la lce 'di lta bu mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ ma lags so/ /kun
dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bden pa gsung ba yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag 'tshal bar byed na sems can de
dag ngas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /sems can de rnams la ni nga thugs khral chung ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni shin tu rab tu gnas pa yin no/ /de shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i phyir thal mo sbyar ba'ang chud za bar mi 'gyur na sbyin pa la sogs
pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo/ ltos shig/ skyes bu zhig la rang gi gzar bu bkrus pa tsam mam/ phor bu bkrus pa tsam pa'am/ phru ldog bkrus pa tsam gang yin pa
de'ang yod la/ gal te de 'di snyam du/ 'di na gnas pa'i srog chags thams cad 'dis bde bar gyur snyam du sems shing gtor khung du 'bor bar byed na/ kun dga' bo/ 'on kyang
bsod nams skye ba'i sgor 'gyur bar nga smra na mir gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo/ gsum po 'di dag ni bar gyi bskal pa dag yin no/ /gsum gang zhe na/ mtshan gyi
bar gyi bskal pa dang / nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang / mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de la gang gis nyi ma gcig cig srog gcod pa spong zhing yang dag par blangs
te| gnas par byed na de mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig gis a ru ra gcig tsam yang dge 'dun la dbul bar byed na de nad kyi bar gyi bskal par mi
skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig gis zas nal tse gang tsam dge 'dun la phul na de mu ge'i bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum po
'di dag bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur bar byed pa yin no/ /
gsum po gang dag ce na/ kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi
'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no/ /chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / dge 'dun la bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur
zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
tan bstan pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /khyod kyi dzam+bu'i gling gi gling mthong ngam/ kye btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gling ni zheng du ni
dpag tshad bdun stong / chur yang dpag tshad bdun stong ste/ byang gi zhing ni che/ lho'i ni shing rta'i dbyibs so/ /de rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna
bdun gyis bkang ste rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs
su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug /gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug
cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o//
kun dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gling lta zhog gi /kun dga' bo/ shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zheng du'ang dpag tshad brgyad stong / chur yang dag tshad brgyad stong
kun nas zla ba gam pa lta bu zhig yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am/ de rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed
pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/
srog shing kha ba tsam 'dzugs su 'jug /gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug /sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di nyid da bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gling lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi
lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog gi/ kun dga' bo/ nub kyi ba glang spyod ces bya ba'i gling zheng du dpag tshad dgu stong / chur yang dpag tshad dgu stong pa kun nas zla ba nya ba
lta bu zhig yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam du byed du 'jug/ srog shing khab tsam
'dzugs su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gling lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags

po'i gling lta'ang zhog/ nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog gi /kun dga' bo/ byang gi sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba'i gling zheng du dpag tshad khri/ chur yang dpag tshad khri pa kun nas gru bzhi
pa zhig yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am /rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir
mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing ni khab tsam 'dzugs su
'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdungs yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga'
bo| 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gling lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog/ nub kyi ba glang spyod
kyi gling yang lta zhog/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta'ang zhog gi/ kun dga' bo/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de rigs kyi
bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi
'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing khab tsam 'dzugs su
'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun
dga' bo/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu rab tu mang bar nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gling lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog//
nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta'ang zhog/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba lta'ang zhog gi/ kun dga'
bo| stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rigs kyi du'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul
bar byed pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam
byed du 'jug/ srog shing ni khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung
yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu rab tu mang bar nga smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa dpag tu med pa/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/ bzod pa dpag tu med pa/ brtson 'grus dpag
tu med pa/ bsam gtan dpag tu med pa/ shes rab dpag tu med pa/ byams pa nas/ btang snyoms kyi bar du dpag tu med de/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do/ /khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo rdzogs
so|| ||zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba rat+na rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //'phags pa gnas 'jog gi mdo zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas
dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra
ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas drang srong chen po ser skya nyin re zhing rkang pas 'gro la 'chag cing rjes su 'chag pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der ched du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das
dang yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par bsnyen pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ bram ze gnas 'jog phyogs gcig tu
'dug par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnas 'jog/ khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar skem zhing mdog mi sdug/ ag tshom dang / skra
dang / sen mo dang / spu ring zhing lus rtsub la gcom chung ngur smra/ gnas 'jog gis gsol pa/ gau ta ma/ bdag ni dgung zlar smyung ba bgyid pas 'di ltar skem zhing
mdog ngan/ ag tshem dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / spu ring zhing lus rtsub la gcom chung ngur smra ba lags so/ da/ nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du drang srong gnas 'jog la
smra ba /gnas 'jog/ khyod 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas shing cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la yang nan tan gyis sgrub bam/ gnas 'jog gis
gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma/ gang 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la nan tan gyis sgrub pa de cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze/ de ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'dod pa la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /gnas 'jog gis gsol pa/ gau ta ma/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
bsnyen gnas zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ gau ta ma/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la bsnyen pas lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'dod pa la nye bar spyod par 'gyur/
gnas 'jog/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas par 'dod pas nang par langs nas
dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba shes pa zhig gi drung du song ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar
nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba 'di dus 'di nas bzung ste/ gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang / sang nyi ma shar
gyi bar du srog gcod pa spong zhing srog gcod pa las slar log ste/ dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la/ sems can
dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung du na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /ji
ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar log nas dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/ sems
can dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu ni srog chags phra mo grog spur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa'ang spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar log pa de
bzhin du bdag che ge mo'ang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang / sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spang zhing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/ dbyug pa spangs shing
mtshon cha spangs te/ ngo tsha dang ldan pa zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la sems can dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung du na srog chags phra mo grog spur yan chad
kyi srog gcod pa'ang spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/ /rjes su
sgrub bo/ rjes su bgyid do/ /ji ltar srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos
pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang / glu gar dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / phreng ba dang / spos nyug pa dang / rgyan dang / kha dog 'chang ba dang / khri stan mthon po
dang / khri stan chen po dang / dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho'i
bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar log pa de bzhin du bdag che ge mo'ang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di
dang / sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra
bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/ /rjes su sgrub bo/ rjes su bgyid do/ /de ltar lan gnyis/ de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /gnas 'jog/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i yan
lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas yin te/ da ltar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas pa ni lha dang / mi'i 'dod
pa la nye bar spyod par 'gyur te/ gnas 'jog/ khyod 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas par gyis shig/ cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la'ang
nan tan gyis sgrubs shig /lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'dod pa'ang spyad par gyis shig/ gnas 'jog /ji ltar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la gnas pa'i rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan de'i bsod nams 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams sam/ bsod nams rnams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam
par smin pa'i tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngo zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /gnas 'jog/ dper na/ chu bo chen po lnga po gcig tu
gzhol bar 'bab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / ya mun dang / mtsho ldan dang / khyim ldan dang / sa ste/ chu de dag la 'di tsam mo zhes chu'am/ chu bum ba brgya 'am/ chu bum
